# file closed: ./Universe/StarRoutines.asm
 709  8D5C              ;    include "Universe/move_object-MVEIT.asm"
 710  8D5C                  include "./ModelRender/draw_object.asm"
# file opened: ./ModelRender/draw_object.asm
   1+ 8D5C              JumpIfObjectIsPlanet:   MACRO target
   2+ 8D5C ~                                    ld a,(UbnkHullCopy)
   3+ 8D5C ~                                    bit 7,a
   4+ 8D5C ~                                    jp  nz,target
   5+ 8D5C                                      ENDM
   6+ 8D5C
   7+ 8D5C              SetMaxVisibility:       MACRO
   8+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		a,MaxVisibility					; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
   9+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		(LastNormalVisible),a			; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  10+ 8D5C                                      ENDM
  11+ 8D5C
  12+ 8D5C              JumpIfObjectOutsideFov: MACRO target
  13+ 8D5C ~            LL10CheckXInFoV:
  14+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  15+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  16+ 8D5C ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  17+ 8D5C ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  18+ 8D5C ~                                    bit     7,h
  19+ 8D5C ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  20+ 8D5C ~            LL10CheckYInFoV:
  21+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKyLo)                                                                                     ;         .
  22+ 8D5C ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  23+ 8D5C ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  24+ 8D5C ~                                    bit     7,h
  25+ 8D5C ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  26+ 8D5C                                      ENDM
  27+ 8D5C
  28+ 8D5C              LL10AddGunNode:         MACRO
  29+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		a,(GunVertexAddr)	            ; Hull byte6, node gun*4 (Probably should be from bank            ;         hl = z / 8
  30+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		c,a                                                                                               ;         if zhi = 0
  31+ 8D5C ~                                    ld      b,0                             ; bc now - GunNode                                                ;                                              ;             GOTO LL13
  32+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		a,$FF						    ; flag on node heap at gun                                        ;          else
  33+ 8D5C ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray                ; flag node on node heap                                          ;
  34+ 8D5C ~                                    add     hl,bc                           ; at position UBnkNodeArray[GunNode]
  35+ 8D5C ~            MakeBothGunNodesVisible:
  36+ 8D5C ~                                    ld      (hl),a                          ; made both gun line notes visible always
  37+ 8D5C ~                                    inc     hl                              ;
  38+ 8D5C ~                                    ld      (hl),a                          ;
  39+ 8D5C                                      ENDM
  40+ 8D5C
  41+ 8D5C              JumpIfTooFarAway:       MACRO   target
  42+ 8D5C ~                                    ld		hl,(UBnKzlo)                    ; hl = z position, by this point it must be positive
  43+ 8D5C ~                                    ShiftHLDiv8                             ; z position / 8
  44+ 8D5C ~                                    ld      a,h                             ;
  45+ 8D5C ~                                    IfANotZeroGoto target                       ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  46+ 8D5C                                      ENDM
  47+ 8D5C
  48+ 8D5C              DisplayObject:
  49+ 8D5C              LL9:										; Draw object in current bank                                  ;;;; Display object LL9
  50+ 8D5C                 ; DEBUG JumpIfObjectIsPlanet LL25
  51+ 8D5C              ; .................................................................................................................................
  52+ 8D5C              LL9NotPlanet:
  53+ 8D5C                  SetMaxVisibility
  53+ 8D5C 3E 1F       >                        ld		a,MaxVisibility					; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
  53+ 8D5E 32 02 92    >                        ld		(LastNormalVisible),a			; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  54+ 8D61              ;LL9TestRemoveShip:
  55+ 8D61              ;    JumpOnMemBitSet UbnkNweb,7,EraseOldLines; if bit 7 is set goto EraseOldLines                         ;;;;    goto EraseOldLines
  56+ 8D61              ; .................................................................................................................................
  57+ 8D61              LL9NoEraseLines:
  58+ 8D61                  JumpOnMemBitSet UBnkexplDsp,5,DoExplosionOrClear7 ; mask for bit 5, exploding, display explosion state|missiles  EE28 bit5 set, explosion ongoing
  58+ 8D61 3A 2A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)
  58+ 8D64 CB 6F       >                        bit 	5,a
  58+ 8D66 C2 91 8D    >                        jp      nz,DoExplosionOrClear7
  59+ 8D69                  JumpOnBitClear a,7,DoExplosionOrClear7  ; we now have it in A so EE28 bit7 clear, else Start blowing up!                      ;;;;
  59+ 8D69 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
  59+ 8D6B CA 91 8D    >                        jp      z,DoExplosionOrClear7
  60+ 8D6E E6 3F        	and		$3F								; clear bits 7,6                                               ;;;; else
  61+ 8D70 32 2A C0     	ld		(UBnkexplDsp),a					; INWK+31                                                      ;;;;    clear bit 7 & 6 of INKW31
  62+ 8D73              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  63+ 8D73              LL9ZeroAccelRotCtr:
  64+ 8D73                  ldWriteZero UBnkAccel                   ; byte #28 accel (INF),Y                                       ;;;;    set UBnkAccel & UBnkrotZCounter to 0
  64+ 8D73 AF          >               xor      a
  64+ 8D74 32 27 C0    >               ld       (UBnkAccel),a
  65+ 8D77 32 29 C0     	ld		(UBnkrotZCounter),a				; byte #30 rotz counter (INF),Y                                ;;;;
  66+ 8D7A CD 05 CD     	call	EraseOldLines					; EE51 \ if bit3 set erase old lines in XX19 heap              ;;;;    gosub erase old lines (EE51)
  67+ 8D7D              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  68+ 8D7D              LL9SetExploRad:
  69+ 8D7D              	ldWriteConst 18,UbnKEdgeHeapCounter		; Counter for explosion radius                                 ;;;;    set explosion raidus XX19[1] to 18
  69+ 8D7D 3E 12       >               ld       a,18
  69+ 8D7F 32 F7 C2    >               ld       (UbnKEdgeHeapCounter),a
  70+ 8D82              	ldCopyByte ExplosionCtAddr,UbnkEdgeHeapBytes ; Hull byte#7 explosion of ship type e.g. &2A           ;;;;    set XX19 [2] to Explosion type for ship (i.e nbr of
  70+ 8D82 3A 06 C3    >               ld       a,(ExplosionCtAddr)
  70+ 8D85 32 F5 C2    >               ld       (UbnkEdgeHeapBytes),a

  72+ 8D8B 3A 13 C0         ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                                                                                   ;;;;    set a to z pos sign
  73+ 8D8E C3 99 8D     	jp      ObjectInFront                                                                                  ;;;;    goto DoExplosion
  74+ 8D91              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  75+ 8D91              DoExplosionOrClear7:	                                                                                   ;;;;
  76+ 8D91              EE28:										; bit5 set do explosion, or bit7 clear, dont kill.             ;;;;   DoExplosion:If z ccordinate sign is +ve
  77+ 8D91              EE49:
  78+ 8D91              	JumpOnMemBitSet UBnKzsgn,7,TestToRemove ; if zSign is negative then its behind so see if we remove
  78+ 8D91 3A 13 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  78+ 8D94 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
  78+ 8D96 C2 07 8E    >                        jp      nz,TestToRemove
  79+ 8D99              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  80+ 8D99              ObjectInFront:
  81+ 8D99              LL10:										; LL10	 object in front of you                                   ; if object z is > FarInFront
  82+ 8D99                  JumpIfMemGTENusng UBnKzhi,FarInFront,TestToRemove  ; LL14		\ test to remove object                               ;    else if abs(x) > z or abs(y) > z
  82+ 8D99 3A 12 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnKzhi)
  82+ 8D9C FE C0       >                        cp     FarInFront
  82+ 8D9E D2 07 8E    >                        jp	  nc,TestToRemove
  83+ 8DA1              LL10CheckFov:
  84+ 8DA1                  JumpIfObjectOutsideFov TestToRemove     ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  84+ 8DA1             >LL10CheckXInFoV:
  84+ 8DA1 2A 0B C0    >                        ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  84+ 8DA4 ED 5B 11 C0 >                        ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  84+ 8DA8 B7          >                        or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  84+ 8DA9 ED 52       >                        sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  84+ 8DAB CB 7C       >                        bit     7,h
  84+ 8DAD CA 07 8E    >                        jp      z,TestToRemove                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  84+ 8DB0             >LL10CheckYInFoV:
  84+ 8DB0 2A 0E C0    >                        ld		hl, (INWKyLo)                                                                                     ;         .
  84+ 8DB3 B7          >                        or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  84+ 8DB4 ED 52       >                        sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  84+ 8DB6 CB 7C       >                        bit     7,h
  84+ 8DB8 CA 07 8E    >                        jp      z,TestToRemove                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  85+ 8DBB              LookAtGunNode:
  86+ 8DBB                  LL10AddGunNode                                                                                                ;         NodeHeap[GunVertex, GunVertex+1] = 255

  86+ 8DBE 4F          >                        ld		c,a                                                                                               ;         if zhi = 0

  86+ 8DC1 3E FF       >                        ld		a,$FF						    ; flag on node heap at gun                                        ;          else

  86+ 8DC8 23          >                        inc     hl                              ;
  86+ 8DC9 77          >                        ld      (hl),a                          ;
  87+ 8DCA              LL10TestTooFarAway:                         ; if zhi / 8 > 0 then its too far
  88+ 8DCA                  JumpIfTooFarAway SkipToAsFar            ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  88+ 8DCA 2A 11 C0    >                        ld		hl,(UBnKzlo)                    ; hl = z position, by this point it must be positive
  88+ 8DCD             >                        ShiftHLDiv8                             ; z position / 8
  88+ 8DCD CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8DCF CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8DD1 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8DD3 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8DD5 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8DD7 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8DD9 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ;
  88+ 8DDA             >                        IfANotZeroGoto SkipToAsFar                       ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  88+ 8DDA FE 00       >				cp	0
  88+ 8DDC C2 F2 8D    >				jp	nz,SkipToAsFar
  89+ 8DDF              LL10CloseEnoughToDraw:
  90+ 8DDF              ; if zhi /16
  91+ 8DDF 7C               ld      a,h                             ; get zHi shifted again
  92+ 8DE0 CB 1F            rr      a                               ; bring in hi bit0 from last shiftHLRight1
  93+ 8DE2 CB 3F            srl     a                               ;
  94+ 8DE4 CB 3F            srl     a                               ;
  95+ 8DE6 CB 3F            srl     a                               ; zhi is now max 31
  96+ 8DE8 32 8E C0         ld      (UBnkVisibility),a              ; set XX4 to result, If this occurs then it’s a guaranteed call to LL17 to draw.
  97+ 8DEB              ;    Note the use of hop for jump/branch instrunction Rather than hop being calc logic
  98+ 8DEB              ;    The original did a bransh on positive but 3 shift right logicalks means bit 7 can never be set
  99+ 8DEB              ObjectDrawForwards:
 100+ 8DEB CD 9A 8E         call    DrawForwards
 101+ 8DEE C9               ret
 102+ 8DEF C3 EB 8D         jp      ObjectDrawForwards              ; LL17 guaranteed hop to Draw wireframe
 103+ 8DF2              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
 104+ 8DF2              SkipToAsFar:
 105+ 8DF2              ; IF we are here then the ship may just be a dot, if its exploding thought that overrides dot
 106+ 8DF2              LL13:                                       ; hopped to as far
 107+ 8DF2              LL13DrawIfNearerThanDotDist:
 108+ 8DF2              ; if dot_distance >= z_hi then we can still draw ship
 109+ 8DF2                  JumpIfMemGTEMemusng DotAddr,UBnKzhi,ObjectDrawForwards

 109+ 8DF5 21 12 C0    >                        ld   hl,UBnKzhi
 109+ 8DF8 BE          >                        cp   (hl)
 109+ 8DF9 D2 EB 8D    >                        jp	  nc,ObjectDrawForwards
 110+ 8DFC              LL13DrawIfExplodingTest:
 111+ 8DFC              ; if exploding then draw ship
 112+ 8DFC 3A 2A C0         ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)                 ; INWK+31	\ exploding/display state|missiles
 113+ 8DFF E6 20            and     $20                             ; mask bit 5 exploding
 114+ 8E01 C2 EB 8D         jp      nz,ObjectDrawForwards           ; LL17 hop over to Draw wireframe or exploding
 115+ 8E04              LL13TooFarPlotPoint:
 116+ 8E04 C3 19 8E         jp      ShipPlotPoint                   ; SHPPT	\ else ship plot point, up.

 118+ 8E07              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................

 120+ 8E07              ;;;   if bit5 of INWK31 is set								  ::LL14
 121+ 8E07              ;;;      clear bit 3 of INWK31
 122+ 8E07              ;;;      goto DO Explosion (DOEXP )
 123+ 8E07              ;;;   end if

 126+ 8E07              ;;;      goto Clear Lines from X19
 127+ 8E07              ;;;   else

 132+ 8E0C C2 05 CD    >                        jp      nz,EraseOldLines

   9+ 8E8E
  10+ 8E8E              CheckIfExplodingCall:
  11+ 8E8E              ; DEBUG TODO turn into MACRO later
  12+ 8E8E              ; Sets Z flag to true if only some faces are visible
  13+ 8E8E              ; Clears Z flag if exploding so all faces should be rendered
  14+ 8E8E 3A 2A C0             ld      a,(explDsp)                 ; INWK+31                                                                               ;;; If bit 5 of exploding state is clear

  17+ 8EDD              .set_length:
  18+ 8EDD ED 53 CC 8E  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 8EE1              .write_dma:
  20+ 8EE1 21 C5 8E     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 8EE4 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 8EE6 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 8EE8 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 8EEA C9           	ret
  25+ 8EEB
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
 715  8EEB                  INCLUDE	"./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm"
# file opened: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm
   1+ 8EEB
   2+ 8EEB 83 C3 C7 CB  memcopy        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   2+ 8EEF 7D
   3+ 8EF0 00 00        memcopy_astrt  		DB $00,$00
   4+ 8EF2 00 40        memcopy_length 		DB $00,$40
   5+ 8EF4 14 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   6+ 8EF7 00 00        memcopy_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   7+ 8EF9 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   8+ 8EFD              memcopy_cmd_len	  	equ $ - memcopy
   9+ 8EFD
  10+ 8EFD              memcopy_dma:
  11+ 8EFD              ; "memcopy_dma, hl = target address de = source address to copy, bc = length"
  12+ 8EFD              .set_target:
  13+ 8EFD 22 F7 8E     	ld		(memcopy_bstrt),hl
  14+ 8F00              .set_source:
  15+ 8F00 ED 53 F0 8E  	ld		(memcopy_astrt),de
  16+ 8F04              .set_length:
  17+ 8F04 ED 43 F2 8E  	ld		(memcopy_length),bc
  18+ 8F08              .write_dma:
  19+ 8F08 21 EB 8E     	ld 		hl, memcopy
  20+ 8F0B 06 12        	ld 		b, memcopy_cmd_len
  21+ 8F0D 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  22+ 8F0F ED B3        	otir
  23+ 8F11 C9           	ret
  24+ 8F12
# file closed: ./Hardware/memcopy_dma.asm

 178+ 8F3A              c_KeyBoardLen 			equ $ - Keys
 179+ 8F3A 00 00 00...  RawKeys					DS	8
 180+ 8F42 FE FE FE FD  KeyAddrTab				DW	$FEFE, $FDFE, $FBFE, $F7FE, $EFFE, $DFFE, $BFFE, $7FFE
 180+ 8F46 FE FB FE F7
 180+ 8F4A FE EF FE DF
 180+ 8F4E FE BF FE 7F
 181+ 8F52              ; Now keyboard map lists each game key and the corresponding address in the Keys table to get the value. This way redefining keys is just a case
 182+ 8F52              ; of updating this table with the respective location to look up
 183+ 8F52              ; key list sequence is in table above
 184+ 8F52 21 8F 22 8F  KeyboardMap             DW  Keys+KeyCode_Front        ,Keys+KeyCode_Aft          ,Keys+KeyCode_Left         ,Keys+KeyCode_Right        ,Keys+KeyCode_RollLeft
 184+ 8F56 23 8F 24 8F
 184+ 8F5A 2C 8F
 185+ 8F5C 2B 8F 1C 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_RollRight    ,Keys+KeyCode_Dive         ,Keys+KeyCode_Climb        ,Keys+KeyCode_Accellerate  ,Keys+KeyCode_Decellerate
 185+ 8F60 17 8F 1D 8F
 185+ 8F64 18 8F

 187+ 8F74 38 8F 34 8F

 188+ 8F7A 1B 8F 31 8F                          DW  Keys+KeyCode_HomeCursor   ,Keys+KeyCode_Launch       ,Keys+KeyCode_BuyCargo     ,Keys+KeyCode_SellCargo    ,Keys+KeyCode_Equip
 188+ 8F7E 39 8F 16 8F
 188+ 8F82 15 8F

 197+ 8FBA 36

 199+ 8FC0 3E 4C 4B 4A                       DB ">","L","K","J","H"
 199+ 8FC4 48

 201+ 8FCA

 203+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Front         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Front
 204+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Aft           equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Aft
 205+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Left          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Left
 206+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Right         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Right
 207+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_RollLeft      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_RollLeft

 225+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_BuyCargo      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_BuyCargo
 226+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_SellCargo     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_SellCargo
 227+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Equip         equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Equip
 228+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_GalacticChrt  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GalacticChrt
 229+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_LocalChart    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_LocalChart
 230+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_MarketPrices  equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_MarketPrices
 231+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Status        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Status
 232+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Inventory     equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Inventory
 233+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_GameSkip      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_GameSkip
 234+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Save          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Save
 235+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Freeze        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Freeze
 236+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Resume        equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Resume
 237+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Recentre      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Recentre
 238+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Quit          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Quit
 239+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_PlanetData    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_PlanetData
 240+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_CursorUp      equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorUp
 241+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_CursorDown    equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_CursorDown
 242+ 8FCA              addr_Pressed_Find          equ KeyboardMap+c_Pressed_Find
 243+ 8FCA
 244+ 8FCA
 245+ 8FCA              init_keyboard:
 246+ 8FCA 21 12 8F     	ld		hl,Keys
 247+ 8FCD 11 28 00     	ld		de, c_KeyBoardLen
 248+ 8FD0 3E 00        	ld		a,0
 249+ 8FD2 CD D7 8E     	call	memfill_dma
 250+ 8FD5 C9           	ret
 251+ 8FD6
 252+ 8FD6              scan_keyboard:
 253+ 8FD6 21 3A 8F     	ld		hl,RawKeys
 254+ 8FD9 11 42 8F     	ld		de,KeyAddrTab
 255+ 8FDC AF           	xor		a
 256+ 8FDD FD 2E 08     	ld		iyl,8
 257+ 8FE0 DD 21 12 8F      ld      ix,Keys
 258+ 8FE4              .PortReadLoop:
 259+ 8FE4 1A           	ld		a,(de)							; Set up BC as port to read
 260+ 8FE5 4F           	ld		c,a
 261+ 8FE6 13           	inc		de
 262+ 8FE7 1A               ld      a,(de)
 263+ 8FE8 47           	ld		b,a
 264+ 8FE9 13           	inc		de
 265+ 8FEA ED 78        	in		a,(c)							; read port to a
 266+ 8FEC 77           	ld		(hl),a							; set raw keys to value
 267+ 8FED 23           	inc		hl								; and ready for next element
 268+ 8FEE 06 05        	ld		b,5								; loop all bits (there are only 5 keys to a group)
 269+ 8FF0              .ProcessBitsLoop:
 270+ 8FF0 CB 47        	bit		0,a								; is bit set
 271+ 8FF2 28 07            jr      z,.SetKeyPressed
 272+ 8FF4 08               ex      af,af'
 273+ 8FF5 AF               xor     a
 274+ 8FF6 C3 02 90         jp      .SetKey
 275+ 8FF9 20 0B        	jr		nz,.SkipKeySet
 276+ 8FFB              .SetKeyPressed:
 277+ 8FFB 08           	ex		af,af'
 278+ 8FFC DD 7E 00         ld      a,(ix+0)
 279+ 8FFF 3C               inc     a
 280+ 9000 E6 03            and     $3                              ; so bit 0 set is pressed, bit 1 set is repeat pressed, i.e. 0 = no, 1 = yes 2,3 = held
 281+ 9002              .SetKey:
 282+ 9002 DD 77 00     	ld		(ix+0),a							; Key Pressed
 283+ 9005 08           	ex		af,af'
 284+ 9006              .SkipKeySet:
 285+ 9006 DD 23        	inc		ix								; move to next key
 286+ 9008 CB 3F        	srl		a								; move next key into bit 0
 287+ 900A 10 E4        	djnz	.ProcessBitsLoop				; Process all key group bits
 288+ 900C FD 2D            dec     iyl
 289+ 900E 20 D4            jr      nz,.PortReadLoop				; Read next input port
 290+ 9010 C9           	ret
 291+ 9011
 292+ 9011              GetKeyStateAddressDE: MACRO
 293+ 9011 ~                                  ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 294+ 9011 ~                                  add     hl,a
 295+ 9011 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 296+ 9011 ~                                  ld      e,a
 297+ 9011 ~                                  inc     hl
 298+ 9011 ~                                  ld      a,(hl)
 299+ 9011 ~                                  ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 300+ 9011                                    ENDM
 301+ 9011
 302+ 9011
 303+ 9011              ; call with a = c_Pressed key, will then read mapping
 304+ 9011              wait_for_key_a_press:
 305+ 9011                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 305+ 9011 21 52 8F    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 305+ 9014 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 305+ 9016 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 305+ 9017 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 305+ 9018 23          >                      inc     hl
 305+ 9019 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 305+ 901A 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 306+ 901B D5               push    de
 307+ 901C              wait_for_key_press_loop:
 308+ 901C CD D6 8F         call    scan_keyboard
 309+ 901F E1               pop     hl                              ; get key address into hl
 310+ 9020 E5               push    hl
 311+ 9021 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 312+ 9022                  JumpIfANENusng  1,wait_for_key_press_loop         ; will also loop if held down when entering this routine
 312+ 9022 FE 01       >                cp     1
 312+ 9024 C2 1C 90    >                jp      nz,wait_for_key_press_loop
 313+ 9027 E1               pop     hl                              ; tidy up rogue push, less t states than detecting if we want to push or not
 314+ 9028 C9               ret
 315+ 9029
 316+ 9029              wait_for_key_a_held:
 317+ 9029                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 317+ 9029 21 52 8F    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 317+ 902C ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 317+ 902E 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 317+ 902F 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 317+ 9030 23          >                      inc     hl
 317+ 9031 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 317+ 9032 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 318+ 9033 D5               push    de
 319+ 9034              wait_for_key_a_held_loop:
 320+ 9034 CD D6 8F         call    scan_keyboard
 321+ 9037 E1               pop     hl
 322+ 9038 E5               push    hl
 323+ 9039 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 324+ 903A                  JumpIfALTNusng  2,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 324+ 903A FE 02       >                        cp      2
 324+ 903C DA 34 90    >                        jp		c,wait_for_key_a_held_loop
 325+ 903F E1               pop     hl
 326+ 9040 C9               ret
 327+ 9041
 328+ 9041              get_key_a_state:                            ; reads a mapped key and sets a to key staus, e.g. 0 1 or >=2 DOES NOT SCAN KEYBOARD
 329+ 9041                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 329+ 9041 21 52 8F    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 329+ 9044 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 329+ 9046 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 329+ 9047 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 329+ 9048 23          >                      inc     hl
 329+ 9049 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 329+ 904A 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 330+ 904B EB               ex      de,hl
 331+ 904C 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 332+ 904D C9               ret
 333+ 904E
 334+ 904E              is_key_pressed:                             ; returns z is set if pressed
 335+ 904E                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 335+ 904E 21 52 8F    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 335+ 9051 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 335+ 9053 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9054 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 335+ 9055 23          >                      inc     hl
 335+ 9056 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 335+ 9057 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 336+ 9058 EB               ex      de,hl
 337+ 9059 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 338+ 905A FE 01            cp      1
 339+ 905C C9               ret
 340+ 905D
 341+ 905D              is_key_held:                                ; returns z is set if held
 342+ 905D                  GetKeyStateAddressDE
 342+ 905D 21 52 8F    >                      ld      hl,KeyboardMap                  ; work our address to read from
 342+ 9060 ED 31       >                      add     hl,a
 342+ 9062 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9063 5F          >                      ld      e,a
 342+ 9064 23          >                      inc     hl
 342+ 9065 7E          >                      ld      a,(hl)
 342+ 9066 57          >                      ld      d,a                             ; now de = address in keypress list
 343+ 9067 EB               ex      de,hl
 344+ 9068 7E               ld      a,(hl)                          ; a = keystate
 345+ 9069 E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 346+ 906B FE 02            cp      2
 347+ 906D C9               ret
 348+ 906E
 349+ 906E              is_any_key_pressed:
 350+ 906E 21 12 8F         ld      hl,Keys
 351+ 9071 06 28            ld      b,40
 352+ 9073 0E 00            ld      c,0
 353+ 9075              .KeyReadLoop:
 354+ 9075 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 355+ 9076 FE 01            cp      1
 356+ 9078 CA 82 90         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 357+ 907B 23               inc     hl
 358+ 907C 0C               inc     c
 359+ 907D 10 F6            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 360+ 907F 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 361+ 9081 C9               ret
 362+ 9082              .KeyPressed:
 363+ 9082 79               ld      a,c
 364+ 9083 C9               ret
 365+ 9084
 366+ 9084              is_any_key_held:
 367+ 9084 21 12 8F         ld      hl,Keys
 368+ 9087 06 28            ld      b,40
 369+ 9089 0E 00            ld      c,0
 370+ 908B              .KeyReadLoop:
 371+ 908B 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 372+ 908C E6 02            and     2                               ; clear out bit 1 which elimiates state 3, so it can now be 2 (held) or 0 (not pressed or one off)
 373+ 908E FE 02            cp      2
 374+ 9090 CA 9A 90         jp      z,.KeyPressed
 375+ 9093 23               inc     hl
 376+ 9094 0C               inc     c
 377+ 9095 10 F4            djnz    .KeyReadLoop
 378+ 9097 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 379+ 9099 C9               ret
 380+ 909A              .KeyPressed:
 381+ 909A 79               ld      a,c
 382+ 909B C9               ret
 383+ 909C
 384+ 909C
 385+ 909C 00 00 00...  InputString             DS  30              ; used for a 30 character input buffer
 386+ 90BA 00                                   DB  0               ; end of string marker as a safety
 387+ 90BB 00           InputCursor             DB  0
 388+ 90BC 00           EnterPressed            DB  0               ; zero notpressed FF pressed
 389+ 90BD 00           InputChanged            DB  0
 390+ 90BE              InputLimit              EQU 20
 391+ 90BE
 392+ 90BE              keyboard_copy_input_to_de:
 393+ 90BE 21 9C 90         ld      hl,InputString
 394+ 90C1 3A BB 90         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 395+ 90C4 FE 00            cp      0
 396+ 90C6 28 05            jr      z,.NoString
 397+ 90C8 4F               ld      c,a
 398+ 90C9 06 00            ld      b,0
 399+ 90CB ED B0            ldir
 400+ 90CD              .NoString
 401+ 90CD 3E 00            ld      a,0
 402+ 90CF 12               ld      (de),a
 403+ 90D0 C9               ret
 404+ 90D1
 405+ 90D1              initInputText:
 406+ 90D1 AF               xor     a
 407+ 90D2 32 BB 90         ld      (InputCursor),a
 408+ 90D5 32 BC 90         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 409+ 90D8 32 BD 90         ld      (InputChanged),a
 410+ 90DB 21 9C 90         ld      hl,InputString
 411+ 90DE 06 1E            ld      b,30
 412+ 90E0              .wipeloop:
 413+ 90E0 77               ld      (hl),a
 414+ 90E1 23               inc     hl
 415+ 90E2 10 FC            djnz    .wipeloop
 416+ 90E4 C9               ret
 417+ 90E5
 418+ 90E5              InputName:
 419+ 90E5 AF               xor     a
 420+ 90E6 32 BD 90         ld      (InputChanged),a
 421+ 90E9 CD 6E 90         call    is_any_key_pressed
 422+ 90EC FE FF            cp      $FF
 423+ 90EE C8               ret     z
 424+ 90EF              .KeyPressed:
 425+ 90EF 4F               ld      c,a
 426+ 90F0 3A BB 90         ld      a,(InputCursor)                 ; No key so we can now look at if we are at the end of the buffer
 427+ 90F3 FE 14            cp      InputLimit                      ; move to variable later and then cp (hl)
 428+ 90F5 28 0B            jr      z,.DeleteOrEnterOnly            ;
 429+ 90F7 21 A2 8F         ld      hl,ASCII_Map
 430+ 90FA 79               ld      a,c
 431+ 90FB ED 31            add     hl,a
 432+ 90FD 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 433+ 90FE FE 41            cp      "A"
 434+ 9100 30 15            jr      nc,.AlphaPressed
 435+ 9102              .DeleteOrEnterOnly                          ; CAPS and Symbol act as delete for now
 436+ 9102 FE 30            cp      "0"                             ; if 0 was preseed check caps shift too
 437+ 9104 28 3B            jr      z,.CheckShiftDelete             ; for now we will ignore the shift and just assume delete
 438+ 9106 FE 3E            cp      ">"         ; ENTER
 439+ 9108 28 24            jr      z,.EnterPressed
 440+ 910A FE 23            cp      "#"         ; CAPS
 441+ 910C 28 33            jr      z,.CapsPressed
 442+ 910E FE 5E            cp      "^"         ; SYMBOLSHIFT
 443+ 9110 28 2F            jr      z,.SymbolPressed
 444+ 9112 FE 20            cp      " "         ; space
 445+ 9114 28 2B            jr      z,.SpacePressed
 446+ 9116 C9               ret
 447+ 9117              .AlphaPressed:
 448+ 9117 47               ld      b,a
 449+ 9118 3A BB 90         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 450+ 911B 4F               ld      c,a
 451+ 911C 21 9C 90         ld      hl,InputString
 452+ 911F ED 31            add     hl,a
 453+ 9121 78               ld      a,b
 454+ 9122 70               ld      (hl),b
 455+ 9123 79               ld      a,c
 456+ 9124 21 BB 90         ld      hl,InputCursor
 457+ 9127 34               inc     (hl)
 458+ 9128 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 459+ 912A 32 BD 90         ld      (InputChanged),a
 460+ 912D C9               ret
 461+ 912E              .EnterPressed:
 462+ 912E 3A BB 90         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 463+ 9131 3C               inc     a
 464+ 9132 21 9C 90         ld      hl,InputString
 465+ 9135 ED 31            add     hl,a
 466+ 9137 AF               xor     a
 467+ 9138 77               ld      (hl),a
 468+ 9139 3D               dec     a
 469+ 913A 32 BC 90         ld      (EnterPressed),a
 470+ 913D 32 BD 90         ld      (InputChanged),a
 471+ 9140 C9               ret
 472+ 9141              .CheckShiftDelete:
 473+ 9141              .CapsPressed:                               ; act as a delete key for now
 474+ 9141              .SymbolPressed:
 475+ 9141              .SpacePressed:
 476+ 9141 3A BB 90         ld      a,(InputCursor)
 477+ 9144 FE 00            cp      0
 478+ 9146 C8               ret     z
 479+ 9147 3D               dec     a
 480+ 9148 32 BB 90         ld      (InputCursor),a
 481+ 914B 21 9C 90         ld      hl,InputString
 482+ 914E ED 31            add     hl,a
 483+ 9150 AF               xor     a
 484+ 9151 77               ld      (hl),a
 485+ 9152 3E FF            ld      a,$FF
 486+ 9154 32 BD 90         ld      (InputChanged),a
 487+ 9157 C9               ret
 488+ 9158
 489+ 9158              MovementKeyTest:
 490+ 9158              ;DBG1:jp dbg1
 491+ 9158              ;dbx1:
 492+ 9158 AF               xor     a
 493+ 9159 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 494+ 915C 3A D8 92         ld      a,(MenuIdMax)
 495+ 915F E6 FC            and     $FC
 496+ 9161 20 28            jr      nz,CursorKeys
 497+ 9163              ClimbDiveKeys:
 498+ 9163 2A 60 8F         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Climb)
 499+ 9166 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 500+ 9167                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanDiveKey
 500+ 9167 FE 00       >				cp	0
 500+ 9169 CA 77 91    >				jp	z,ScanDiveKey
 501+ 916C 3A D6 92         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 502+ 916F F6 80            or      $80
 503+ 9171 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 504+ 9174 C3 B0 91         jp      ScanLeftKey
 505+ 9177              ScanDiveKey:
 506+ 9177 2A 5E 8F         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Dive)
 507+ 917A 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 508+ 917B                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 508+ 917B FE 00       >				cp	0
 508+ 917D CA B0 91    >				jp	z,ScanLeftKey
 509+ 9180 3A D6 92         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 510+ 9183 F6 40            or      $40
 511+ 9185 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 512+ 9188 C3 B0 91         jp      ScanLeftKey
 513+ 918B              CursorKeys:
 514+ 918B 2A 9C 8F         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorUp)
 515+ 918E 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 516+ 918F                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanCursorDownKey
 516+ 918F FE 00       >				cp	0
 516+ 9191 CA 9F 91    >				jp	z,ScanCursorDownKey
 517+ 9194 3A D6 92         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 518+ 9197 F6 80            or      $80
 519+ 9199 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 520+ 919C C3 B0 91         jp      ScanLeftKey
 521+ 919F              ScanCursorDownKey
 522+ 919F 2A 9E 8F         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_CursorDown)
 523+ 91A2 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 524+ 91A3                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanLeftKey
 524+ 91A3 FE 00       >				cp	0
 524+ 91A5 CA B0 91    >				jp	z,ScanLeftKey
 525+ 91A8 3A D6 92         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 526+ 91AB F6 40            or      $40
 527+ 91AD 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 528+ 91B0              ScanLeftKey:
 529+ 91B0 2A 5A 8F         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollLeft)
 530+ 91B3 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 531+ 91B4                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRightKey
 531+ 91B4 FE 00       >				cp	0
 531+ 91B6 CA C2 91    >				jp	z,ScanRightKey
 532+ 91B9 3A D6 92         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 533+ 91BC F6 20            or      $20
 534+ 91BE 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 535+ 91C1 C9               ret
 536+ 91C2              ScanRightKey:
 537+ 91C2 2A 5C 8F         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_RollRight)
 538+ 91C5 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 539+ 91C6                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanHomeKey
 539+ 91C6 FE 00       >				cp	0
 539+ 91C8 CA D4 91    >				jp	z,ScanHomeKey
 540+ 91CB 3A D6 92         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 541+ 91CE F6 10            or      $10
 542+ 91D0 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 543+ 91D3 C9               ret
 544+ 91D4              ScanHomeKey:
 545+ 91D4 2A 7A 8F         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_HomeCursor)
 546+ 91D7 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 547+ 91D8                  IfAIsZeroGoto ScanRecentreKey
 547+ 91D8 FE 00       >				cp	0
 547+ 91DA CA E6 91    >				jp	z,ScanRecentreKey
 548+ 91DD 3A D6 92         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 549+ 91E0 F6 08            or      $08
 550+ 91E2 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 551+ 91E5 C9               ret
 552+ 91E6              ScanRecentreKey:
 553+ 91E6 2A 96 8F         ld      hl,(addr_Pressed_Recentre)
 554+ 91E9 7E               ld      a,(hl)
 555+ 91EA                  ReturnIfAIsZero
 555+ 91EA FE 00       >                 cp     0
 555+ 91EC C8          >                 ret    z
 556+ 91ED 3A D6 92         ld      a,(CursorKeysPressed)
 557+ 91F0 F6 04            or      $04
 558+ 91F2 32 D6 92         ld      (CursorKeysPressed),a
 559+ 91F5 C9               ret
 560+ 91F6
 561+ 91F6
# file closed: ./Hardware/keyboard.asm

  42+ 91F6              ; Ship Data
  43+ 91F6              ;;;;	.XX21	\ -> &5600 \ Table of pointers to ships' data given to XX0
  44+ 91F6              ;;;;00 7F			 EQUW &7F00 \ type  1 is #MSL  Missile data on page off bottom of screen
  45+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  2 is #SST  Space Station, Coriolis or Dodo.
  46+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  3 is #ESC  Escape capsule
  47+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  4 is #PLT  Plate, alloys
  48+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  5 is #OIL  Cargo cannister
  49+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  6 is       Boulder
  50+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  7 is #AST  Asteroid
  51+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  8 is #SPL  Splinter, rock.
  52+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type  9 is #SHU  Shuttle
  53+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 10 is       Transporter
  54+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 11 is #CYL  Cobra Mk III,  Boa
  55+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 12 is       Python
  56+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 13 is       Last of three traders
  57+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 14 is #ANA  Anaconda
  58+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 15 is #WRM  Worm with Anaconda
  59+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 16 is #COP  Viper
  60+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 17 is       First pirate
  61+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 18 is
  62+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 19 is #KRA  Krait small pirate
  63+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 20 is #ADA  Adder
  64+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 21 is
  65+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 22 is
  66+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 23 is
  67+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 24 is #CYL2 Last strong pirate
  68+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 25 is #ASP  Asp Mk II
  69+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 26 is #FER  Fer de Lance
  70+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 27 is
  71+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 28 is	Last of three bounty hunters
  72+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 29 is #THG  Thargoid
  73+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 30 is #TGL  Thargon
  74+ 91F6              ;;;;00 00			 EQUW 0     \ type 31 is #CON  Constrictor
  75+ 91F6              ;;;;	.E%	\ -> &563E \ Hull NEWB bits are escpod, cop, inno, ?, pirate, angry, hunter, trader.
  76+ 91F6              ;;;;			\ NEWB examples
  77+ 91F6              ;;;;\ 21			EQUB &21    \ 0010 0001    9 Shuttle has no escape pod, inno, trader.
  78+ 91F6              ;;;;\ 61			EQUB &61    \ 0110 0001   10 Tansporter no escape pod, Cop, inno, trader.
  79+ 91F6              ;;;;\ A0			EQUB &A0    \ 1010 0000   11 Cobra has Escape pod, inno, not a trader.
  80+ 91F6              ;;;;\ C2			EQUB &C2    \ 1100 0010   16 Viper has Escape pod, Cop, hunter.
  81+ 91F6              ;;;;\ 8C			EQUB &8C    \ 1000 1100   19 Krait pirate has escape pod, is pirate and angry.

   1+ 91F6              ;	PAGE 0 Map to variable anmes

   8+ 91F6              ;	08		SC1					Screen Hi
   9+ 91F6              ;	09							XX16 Matrix
  10+ 91F6              ;	0A							XX16+1
  11+ 91F6              ;	0B							XX16+2
  12+ 91F6              ;	0C							XX16+3
  13+ 91F6              ;	0D                          XX16+4
  14+ 91F6              ;	0E                          XX16+5
  15+ 91F6              ;	0F							XX16+6
  16+ 91F6              ;	10		varP				XX16+7

  18+ 91F6              ;	12                          XX16+9

 722  9615                  INCLUDE "./Variables/random_number.asm"
# file opened: ./Variables/random_number.asm
   1+ 9615              doRandom2:									; .DORND2	\ -> &3F85 \ Restricted for explosion dust.
   2+ 9615              doRND2:
   3+ 9615 A7           	and		a								; fast clear carry  leave bit0 of RAND+2 at 0.
   4+ 9616              doRandom:									;.DORND	\ -> &3F86 \ do random, new A, X.
   5+ 9616              ; "doRandom, Random Seed update, new value in A & B)"
   6+ 9616 3A 6A 92     doRND:                  ld		a,(RandomSeed)					; Get Seed 0
   7+ 9619 CB 17                                rl		a								; Rotate L including carry
   8+ 961B 4F                                   ld		c,a								; c =  double lo
   9+ 961C 21 6C 92     .AddSeed2:              ld		hl,RandomSeed2
  10+ 961F 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)							; RAND+2
  11+ 9620 32 6A 92     .SaveAtoSeed:           ld		(RandomSeed),a					; and save RAND
  12+ 9623 08           .SaveBtoSeed2:          ex		af,af'
  13+ 9624 79                                   ld		a,c
  14+ 9625 32 6C 92                             ld		(RandomSeed2),a
  15+ 9628 08                                   ex		af,af'
  16+ 9629 3A 6B 92                             ld		a,(RandomSeed1)
  17+ 962C 4F                                   ld		c,a								; C = Seed1
  18+ 962D 21 6D 92     .AddSeed3:              ld		hl,RandomSeed3
  19+ 9630 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)
  20+ 9631 32 6B 92                             ld		(RandomSeed1),a
  21+ 9634 08                                   ex		af,af'
  22+ 9635 79                                   ld		a,c
  23+ 9636 32 6D 92                             ld		(RandomSeed3),a
  24+ 9639 08                                   ex		af,af'
  25+ 963A C9                                   ret
  26+ 963B
  27+ 963B              fillHeapRandom4Points:                      ; counter Y, 4 rnd bytes to edge heap
  28+ 963B 06 04        	ld		b,4
  29+ 963D 21 00 C2     	ld		hl,UbnkLineArray				; line data
  30+ 9640              FillRandom:                                 ; Writes random bytes hl = start address, b = nbr bytes to fill
  31+ 9640              EE55:
  32+ 9640 CD 16 96     	call	doRND							; get random
  33+ 9643 77           	ld		(hl),a							; (XX19),Y
  34+ 9644 23           	inc		hl
  35+ 9645 10 F9        	djnz	FillRandom						; 3to6 = random bytes for seed
  36+ 9647 C9               ret
  37+ 9648
# file closed: ./Variables/random_number.asm

   1+ 9648 47 41 4C 41  GALAXYSEED DB "GALAXYSEED"
   1+ 964C 58 59 53 45
   1+ 9650 45 44
   2+ 9652 21 7A 93     copy_galaxy_to_system:  ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
   3+ 9655 11 B8 92                             ld		de,SystemSeed
   4+ 9658 ED A0        copy_seed:		        ldi
   5+ 965A ED A0                                ldi
   6+ 965C ED A0                                ldi
   7+ 965E ED A0                                ldi
   8+ 9660 ED A0                                ldi
   9+ 9662 ED A0                                ldi
  10+ 9664 C9                                   ret
  11+ 9665
  12+ 9665 21 B8 92     copy_system_to_galaxy:  ld		hl,SystemSeed
  13+ 9668 11 7A 93                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  14+ 966B 18 EB                                jr		copy_seed
  15+ 966D
  16+ 966D 21 7A 93     copy_galaxy_to_working: ld		hl,GalaxySeeds
  17+ 9670 11 AE 93                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  18+ 9673 18 E3                                jr		copy_seed
  19+ 9675
  20+ 9675 21 AE 93     copy_working_to_galaxy: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  21+ 9678 11 7A 93                             ld		de,GalaxySeeds
  22+ 967B 18 DB                                jr		copy_seed
  23+ 967D
  24+ 967D 21 AE 93     copy_working_to_system: ld		hl,WorkingSeeds
  25+ 9680 11 B8 92                             ld		de,SystemSeed
  26+ 9683 18 D3                                jr		copy_seed
  27+ 9685
  28+ 9685 21 B8 92     copy_system_to_working: ld		hl,SystemSeed
  29+ 9688 11 AE 93                             ld		de,WorkingSeeds
  30+ 968B 18 CB                                jr		copy_seed
  31+ 968D
  32+ 968D              next_system_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  33+ 968D CD 90 96     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  34+ 9690              .NextStep:
  35+ 9690 CD 93 96     		call	process_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  36+ 9693              process_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  37+ 9693 3A B8 92     		ld		a,(SystemSeed)				; QQ15
  38+ 9696 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  39+ 9697 21 BA 92     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  40+ 969A 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 + QQ152
  41+ 969B 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo
  42+ 969C 3A B9 92     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)
  43+ 969F 21 BB 92     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  44+ 96A2 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  45+ 96A3 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  46+ 96A4 3A BA 92     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+2)
  47+ 96A7 32 B8 92     		ld		(SystemSeed+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150
  48+ 96AA 3A BB 92     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)
  49+ 96AD 32 B9 92     		ld		(SystemSeed+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151
  50+ 96B0 3A BD 92     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+5)
  51+ 96B3 32 BB 92     		ld		(SystemSeed+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153
  52+ 96B6 3A BC 92     		ld		a,(SystemSeed+4)
  53+ 96B9 32 BA 92     		ld		(SystemSeed+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152
  54+ 96BC B7           		or		a
  55+ 96BD 78           		ld		a,b
  56+ 96BE 21 BA 92     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+2				; hl -> qq+2
  57+ 96C1 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  58+ 96C2 32 BC 92     		ld		(SystemSeed+4),a
  59+ 96C5 79           		ld		a,c
  60+ 96C6 21 BB 92     		ld		hl,SystemSeed+3				; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  61+ 96C9 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  62+ 96CA 32 BD 92     		ld		(SystemSeed+5),a
  63+ 96CD C9           		ret
  64+ 96CE
  65+ 96CE              next_working_seed:							;.TT20	\ -> &2B0E  \ TWIST on QQ15 to next system
  66+ 96CE CD D1 96     		call	.NextStep					; This logic means we hard code x4
  67+ 96D1              .NextStep:
  68+ 96D1 CD D4 96     		call	working_seed				; This logic means we hard code x2
  69+ 96D4              working_seed:								; TT54	\ -> &2637 \ Twist seed for next digram in QQ15
  70+ 96D4              ; x = a + c
  71+ 96D4 3A AE 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds)			; QQ15
  72+ 96D7 B7           		or		a							; clear carry flag
  73+ 96D8 21 B0 93     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2			; hl -> qq+2 [c]
  74+ 96DB 86           		add		a,(hl)						; a= QQ15 [a]+ QQ15 [c]
  75+ 96DC 47           		ld		b,a							; partial sum lo [x]
  76+ 96DD              ; y = b + d	+ carry
  77+ 96DD 3A AF 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+1)          ; [b]
  78+ 96E0 21 B1 93     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 [d] we don't inc as it affects carry)
  79+ 96E3 8E           		adc		a,(hl)						; note add with carry
  80+ 96E4 4F           		ld		c,a  						; c = QQ1+QQ3+carry bit parial sum hi
  81+ 96E5 3A B0 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+2)
  82+ 96E8 32 AE 93     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+0),a			; copy qq152 to qq150 [a] = [c]
  83+ 96EB 3A B1 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
  84+ 96EE 32 AF 93     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+1),a			; copy qq153 to qq151 [b] = [d]
  85+ 96F1 3A B3 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
  86+ 96F4 32 B1 93     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+3),a			; copy qq155 to qq153 [d] = [f]
  87+ 96F7 3A B2 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+4)
  88+ 96FA 32 B0 93     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+2),a			; copy qq154 to qq152 [c] = [e]
  89+ 96FD B7           		or		a
  90+ 96FE 78           		ld		a,b
  91+ 96FF 21 B0 93     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+2		    ; hl -> qq+2
  92+ 9702 86           		add	    a,(hl)
  93+ 9703 32 B2 93     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+4),a			; e = x + [c]
  94+ 9706 79           		ld		a,c
  95+ 9707 21 B1 93     		ld		hl,WorkingSeeds+3			; HL -> QQ+3 )we don't inc as it affects carry)
  96+ 970A 8E           		adc		a,(hl)
  97+ 970B 32 B3 93     		ld		(WorkingSeeds+5),a			; f = y + [d] + carry
  98+ 970E C9           		ret
  99+ 970F
 100+ 970F 32           working_distX	DB 50
 101+ 9710 32           working_distY	DB 50
 102+ 9711 00           current_distY	DB 0
 103+ 9712
 104+ 9712 AF           find_present_system:    xor		a
 105+ 9713 32 D1 92                             ld		(XSAV),a
 106+ 9716              .CounterLoop:
 107+ 9716 3A B9 92     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+1)				; QQ15+1 \ seed Ycoord of star
 108+ 9719 4F           	ld		c,a
 109+ 971A              .calcLocaldy:
 110+ 971A 3A 79 93     	ld		a,(PresentSystemY)
 111+ 971D 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 112+ 971E 79           	ld		a,c
 113+ 971F 90           	sub		b
 114+ 9720 CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 115+ 9722 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedy
 116+ 9724              .negativedy:
 117+ 9724 ED 44        	neg
 118+ 9726              .positivedy:
 119+ 9726 32 11 97     	ld		(current_distY),a				; save cuirrent_dist Y as we need it maybe
 120+ 9729 ED 5B 0F 97  	ld		de,(working_distX)
 121+ 972D BA           	cp		d
 122+ 972E 30 24        	jr		nc,.toofar
 123+ 9730              .calcLocaldx:
 124+ 9730 3A BB 92     	ld		a,(SystemSeed+3)				; QQ15+3 \ seed Xcoord of star
 125+ 9733 4F           	ld		c,a
 126+ 9734 3A 78 93     	ld		a,(PresentSystemX)
 127+ 9737 47           	ld		b,a								; so b holds Y ccord
 128+ 9738 79           	ld		a,c
 129+ 9739 90           	sub		b
 130+ 973A CB 7F        	bit		7,a
 131+ 973C 28 02        	jr		z,.positivedx
 132+ 973E              .negativedx:
 133+ 973E ED 44        	neg
 134+ 9740              .positivedx:
 135+ 9740 4F           	ld		c,a
 136+ 9741 BB           	cp		e
 137+ 9742 30 10        	jr		nc,.toofar
 138+ 9744              .Nearer:									; we have a closer system
 139+ 9744 3A 11 97     	ld		a,(current_distY)
 140+ 9747 47           	ld		b,a								; we have c to recall Y into b
 141+ 9748 ED 43 0F 97  	ld		(working_distX),bc
 142+ 974C C5           	push	bc
 143+ 974D CD 85 96     	call 	copy_system_to_working
 144+ 9750 C1           	pop		bc
 145+ 9751 78           	ld		a,b								;
 146+ 9752 B1           	or		c								;
 147+ 9753 C8           	ret		z								; if we have distance 0 then bang on
 148+ 9754              .toofar:
 149+ 9754 CD 8D 96     	call	next_system_seed
 150+ 9757 3A D1 92     	ld		a,(XSAV)
 151+ 975A 3D           	dec		a
 152+ 975B FE 00        	cp		0
 153+ 975D C8           	ret		z
 154+ 975E 32 D1 92     	ld		(XSAV),a
 155+ 9761 18 B3        	jr		.CounterLoop
 156+ 9763
 157+ 9763
 158+ 9763              get_planet_data_working_seed:
 159+ 9763 3A AF 93     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+1)
 160+ 9766 E6 07        		and		7
 161+ 9768 32 BA 93     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 162+ 976B 3A B0 93     		ld		a, (WorkingSeeds+2)
 163+ 976E CB 3F        		srl	a
 164+ 9770 CB 3F        		srl	a
 165+ 9772 CB 3F        		srl	a
 166+ 9774 CB 3F        		srl	a								; c/8
 167+ 9776 E6 07        		and		7
 168+ 9778 32 BB 93     		ld		(DisplayGovernment),a
 169+ 977B CB 3F        		srl	a
 170+ 977D FE 00        		cp		0
 171+ 977F 20 08        		jr		nz,.CanBeRich
 172+ 9781              .Fedual:
 173+ 9781 3A BA 93     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 174+ 9784 F6 02        		or		2							; Adjust Eco for Anarchy and Feudal, set bit 1.
 175+ 9786 32 BA 93     		ld		(DisplayEcononmy),a
 176+ 9789              .CanBeRich:
 177+ 9789 3A BA 93     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 178+ 978C EE 07        		xor		7							; flip economy so Rich is now 7
 179+ 978E 32 BC 93     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Flipped Eco, EcoEOR7, Rich Ind = 7
 180+ 9791 47           		ld		b,a
 181+ 9792 3A B1 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 182+ 9795 E6 03        		and		3
 183+ 9797 80           		add		a,b
 184+ 9798 32 BC 93     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek Level += seed d & 3
 185+ 979B 3A BB 93     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 186+ 979E CB 3F        		srl		a 							; gov/2
 187+ 97A0 47           		ld		b,a
 188+ 97A1 3A BC 93     		ld		a,(DisplayTekLevel)
 189+ 97A4 80           		add		a,b
 190+ 97A5 32 BC 93     		ld		(DisplayTekLevel),a			; Tek += gov /2
 191+ 97A8 CB 27        		sla		a
 192+ 97AA CB 27        		sla		a							; Onto Population (TL-1)*= 4
 193+ 97AC 47           		ld		b,a
 194+ 97AD 3A BA 93     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 195+ 97B0 80           		add		a,b                  		; TechLevel*4 + Eco   7-56
 196+ 97B1 47           		ld		b,a
 197+ 97B2 3A BB 93     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)
 198+ 97B5 3C           		inc		a  							; +Government, 0 is Anarchy + 1
 199+ 97B6 32 BD 93     		ld		(DisplayPopulation),a
 200+ 97B9 3A BA 93     		ld		a,(DisplayEcononmy)
 201+ 97BC EE 07        		xor		7							; Onto productivity
 202+ 97BE C6 03        		add		3							;  (Flipped eco +3)
 203+ 97C0 57           		ld		d,a
 204+ 97C1 3A BB 93     		ld		a,(DisplayGovernment)		; Government, 0 is Anarchy
 205+ 97C4 C6 04        		add		4
 206+ 97C6 5F           		ld		e,a
 207+ 97C7 ED 30        		mul									; ; DE = d*e, Productivity part 1. has hsb in A, lsb in P.
 208+ 97C9 3A BD 93     		ld		a,(DisplayPopulation)		; then we use d for radius
 209+ 97CC 57           		ld		d,a
 210+ 97CD ED 30        		mul
 211+ 97CF CB 23        		sla		e
 212+ 97D1 CB 1A        		rr		d
 213+ 97D3 CB 23        		sla		e
 214+ 97D5 CB 1A        		rr		d
 215+ 97D7 CB 23        		sla		e
 216+ 97D9 CB 1A        		rr		d							; de * 8
 217+ 97DB ED 53 BF 93  		ld		(DisplayProductivity),de
 218+ 97DF              .DoRadius:
 219+ 97DF 3A B1 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+3)
 220+ 97E2 4F           		ld		c,a
 221+ 97E3 3A B3 93     		ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)
 222+ 97E6 E6 0F        		and		$0F							;  lower 4 bits of w2_h determine planet radius
 223+ 97E8 C6 0B        		add		11							;  radius min = 256*11 = 2816 km
 224+ 97EA 47           		ld		b,a							;
 225+ 97EB ED 43 C3 93  		ld		(DisplayRadius),bc
 226+ 97EF C9           		ret
 227+ 97F0
# file closed: ./Variables/galaxy_seed.asm

# file opened: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

  37+ 9936
  38+ 9936              getTableText:
  39+ 9936              ; ">getTableText, hl = indexlist, a = textnbr, returns with hl = porinter to head of text"
  40+ 9936              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  41+ 9936 D5           	push	de								; save DE as we will likley need it in caller
  42+ 9937 ED 31        	add		hl,a							; 0 based ref, and its 2 bytes
  43+ 9939 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  44+ 993B 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
  45+ 993C 23           	inc		hl
  46+ 993D 56           	ld		d,(hl)							; de = indexed address
  47+ 993E EB           	ex		de,hl							; flip it to hl
  48+ 993F D1           	pop		de								; retrieve de
  49+ 9940 C9           	ret										; return with hl as start entry
  50+ 9941
  51+ 9941
  52+ 9941              ;               CF      ZF      Result
  53+ 9941              ;               -----------------------------------
  54+ 9941              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  55+ 9941              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  56+ 9941              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  57+ 9941              ;               1       1       Impossible
  58+ 9941              getRankIndex:
  59+ 9941              ; ">getRank, de = kill count, returns a = index,hl destroyed"
  60+ 9941              ; ">Note for ranking first 2 bytes are target rank"
  61+ 9941 7A           	ld		a,d
  62+ 9942 B3           	or		e
  63+ 9943 FE 00        	cp		0
  64+ 9945 C8           	ret		z								; quicks skip for 0 kills
  65+ 9946 AF           	xor 	a
  66+ 9947 21 95 98     	ld		hl,RankingTable
  67+ 994A              .testLoop:
  68+ 994A 4E           	ld		c,(hl)
  69+ 994B 23           	inc		hl
  70+ 994C 46           	ld		b,(hl)							; bc = ranking
  71+ 994D E5           	push	hl
  72+ 994E 60           	ld		h,b
  73+ 994F 69           	ld		l,c
  74+ 9950 CD 11 A3     	call	compare16HLDE
  75+ 9953 38 06        	jr		c,.HLLTDE
  76+ 9955              .HLGTEDE									; Found the correct rank
  77+ 9955 E1           	pop		hl
  78+ 9956 23           	inc		hl								; move to next value
  79+ 9957 23           	inc		hl
  80+ 9958 3C           	inc		a								; we canloop forever as if kills was $FFFF then hits nutter rank but also +1 = 0000 as its 16 bit
  81+ 9959 18 EF        	jr		.testLoop
  82+ 995B              .HLLTDE:									; HL < Kills so found correct rank
  83+ 995B E1           	pop		hl
  84+ 995C C9           	ret
  85+ 995D
# file closed: ./Tables/text_tables.asm

 180+ 9DDE
 181+ 9DDE              CapitaliseString:
 182+ 9DDE              ; ">CapitaliseString hl = address"
 183+ 9DDE              .CapLoop:
 184+ 9DDE 23           	inc		hl
 185+ 9DDF 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 186+ 9DE0 FE 00        	cp		0
 187+ 9DE2 C8           	ret		z
 188+ 9DE3 FE 5B        	cp		'Z'+1
 189+ 9DE5 30 F7        	jr		nc,.CapLoop
 190+ 9DE7 FE 41        	cp		'A'
 191+ 9DE9 38 F3        	jr		c,.CapLoop
 192+ 9DEB              .LowerCase:
 193+ 9DEB C6 20        	add		a,'a'-'A'
 194+ 9DED 77           	ld		(hl),a
 195+ 9DEE 18 EE        	jr		.CapLoop
 196+ 9DF0
 197+ 9DF0              WordIndexToAddress:
 198+ 9DF0 21 61 9C     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 199+ 9DF3 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 200+ 9DF5 ED 31        	add		hl,a
 201+ 9DF7 D5           	push	de
 202+ 9DF8 5E           	ld		e,(hl)
 203+ 9DF9 23           	inc		hl
 204+ 9DFA 56           	ld		d,(hl)
 205+ 9DFB EB           	ex		de,hl
 206+ 9DFC D1           	pop		de
 207+ 9DFD C9           	ret
 208+ 9DFE
 209+ 9DFE
 210+ 9DFE              expandTokenToString:
 211+ 9DFE              ; ">expandTokenToString a = texttoken"
 212+ 9DFE 21 87 9D     	ld		hl,TextTokens
 213+ 9E01 CD 36 99     	call	getTableText
 214+ 9E04 11 BD 9D     	ld		de,TextBuffer
 215+ 9E07              .ReadLoop:
 216+ 9E07 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 217+ 9E08 FE 00        	cp		0
 218+ 9E0A 28 1B        	jr		z,.ReadDone
 219+ 9E0C E5           	push	hl
 220+ 9E0D D5           	push	de
 221+ 9E0E 21 61 9C     	ld		hl,WordIdx
 222+ 9E11 CD 36 99     	call	getTableText
 223+ 9E14 D1           	pop		de
 224+ 9E15              .WordExpandLoop:
 225+ 9E15 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
 226+ 9E16 FE 00        	cp		0
 227+ 9E18 28 05        	jr		z,.AddSpace
 228+ 9E1A              ;.GetChar:
 229+ 9E1A 12           	ld		(de),a
 230+ 9E1B 13           	inc		de
 231+ 9E1C 23           	inc		hl
 232+ 9E1D 18 F6        	jr		.WordExpandLoop
 233+ 9E1F              .AddSpace:
 234+ 9E1F 3E 20        	ld		a,' '
 235+ 9E21 12           	ld		(de),a
 236+ 9E22 13           	inc		de
 237+ 9E23 E1           	pop		hl
 238+ 9E24 23           	inc		hl
 239+ 9E25 18 E0        	jr		.ReadLoop
 240+ 9E27              .ReadDone:
 241+ 9E27 1B           	dec		de
 242+ 9E28 AF           	xor		a
 243+ 9E29 12           	ld		(de),a
 244+ 9E2A C9           	ret

  12+ 9EA4              NamingLoop:
  13+ 9EA4 3A B3 93     	ld		a,(WorkingSeeds+5)	; a = first byte of name seed
  14+ 9EA7 E6 1F        	and 	$1F					; Keep bottom 5 bits only
  15+ 9EA9 FE 00        	cp		0					; 0 = skip 2 chars
  16+ 9EAB 28 12        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
  17+ 9EAD C6 0C        	add		a,12
  18+ 9EAF CB 27        	sla		a					; phrase = (a+12)*2
  19+ 9EB1 21 2B 9E     	ld		hl,name_digrams
  20+ 9EB4 ED 31        	add		hl,a
  21+ 9EB6 ED A0        	ldi
  22+ 9EB8 7E           	ld		a,(hl)
  23+ 9EB9 FE 3F        	cp		'?'
  24+ 9EBB 28 02        	jr		z,.SkipPhrase
