  86+ 9EC5              ;ExpandToken:
  87+ 9EC5              ;	DE = target
  88+ 9EC5              ;	a = token
  89+ 9EC5              ;
  90+ 9EC5              ;PlanetDigram:
  91+ 9EC5              ;	cp		&A0							; >- 160
  92+ 9EC5              ;	jr		c,MorePage4
  93+ 9EC5              ;	and		$7F							; 128 to 159 now 0 to 31
  94+ 9EC5              ;	asl		2							; Multiply by 2
  95+ 9EC5              ;	ld		hl, name_digrams2
  96+ 9EC5              ;	add		hl,a
  97+ 9EC5              ;	ld		a,(hl)
  98+ 9EC5              ;	call	ProcessTextToken
  99+ 9EC5              ;	inc		hl
 100+ 9EC5              ;	ld		a,(hl)
 101+ 9EC5              ;	cp		'?'
 102+ 9EC5              ;	ret		z
 103+ 9EC5              ;	call	ProcessTextToken
 104+ 9EC5              ;	ret
 105+ 9EC5              ;MorePage4:
 106+ 9EC5              ;	sub		$A0
 107+ 9EC5              ;ExtraTokenCheck:
 108+ 9EC5              ;	push	de							; save target address
 109+ 9EC5              ;	push	bc
 110+ 9EC5              ;	ld		b,a
 111+ 9EC5              ;	ld		hl,varV
 112+ 9EC5              ;	ld		(VarV),0400
 113+ 9EC5              ;	ld		(varV),a
 114+ 9EC5              ;	ld
 115+ 9EC5              ;
 116+ 9EC5              ;		.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 117+ 9EC5              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 118+ 9EC5              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 119+ 9EC5              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 120+ 9EC5              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 121+ 9EC5              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 122+ 9EC5              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 123+ 9EC5              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 124+ 9EC5              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 125+ 9EC5              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 126+ 9EC5              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 127+ 9EC5              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 128+ 9EC5              ;
 129+ 9EC5              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 130+ 9EC5              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 131+ 9EC5              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 132+ 9EC5              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 133+ 9EC5              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 134+ 9EC5              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 135+ 9EC5              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 136+ 9EC5              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 137+ 9EC5              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 138+ 9EC5              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 139+ 9EC5              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 140+ 9EC5              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 141+ 9EC5              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 142+ 9EC5              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 143+ 9EC5              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 144+ 9EC5              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 145+ 9EC5              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 146+ 9EC5              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 147+ 9EC5              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 148+ 9EC5              ;C8                      INY
 149+ 9EC5              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 150+ 9EC5              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 151+ 9EC5              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 152+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 153+ 9EC5              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 154+ 9EC5              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 155+ 9EC5              ;98                      TYA
 156+ 9EC5              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 157+ 9EC5              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 158+ 9EC5              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 159+ 9EC5              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 160+ 9EC5              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 161+ 9EC5              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 162+ 9EC5              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 163+ 9EC5              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 164+ 9EC5              ;68                      PLA
 165+ 9EC5              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 166+ 9EC5              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 167+ 9EC5              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 168+ 9EC5              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 169+ 9EC5              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 170+ 9EC5              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 171+ 9EC5              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 172+ 9EC5              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 173+ 9EC5              ;
 174+ 9EC5              ;
 175+ 9EC5              ;
 176+ 9EC5              ;
 177+ 9EC5              ;
 178+ 9EC5              ;
 179+ 9EC5              ;		.TT27	\ -> &36E0 \ process flight text Token in Acc
 180+ 9EC5              ;;AA                      TAX		\ copy token to count down
 181+ 9EC5              ;;F0 DE                   BEQ csh		\ Acc = 0, up to Cash
 182+ 9EC5              ;30 74                   BMI TT43	\ if token is >  127 down, page4 token or digram
 183+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX
 184+ 9EC5              ;F0 BC                   BEQ tal		\ Acc == 1, up, print Galaxy number.
 185+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX
 186+ 9EC5              ;F0 A3                   BEQ ypl		\ Acc == 2, up, present planet in QQ2.
 187+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX
 188+ 9EC5              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over, else X == 0
 189+ 9EC5              ;4C 0A 33                JMP &330A \ cpl \ Acc = 3 print Planet name for seed QQ15
 190+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX
 191+ 9EC5              ;F0 8A                   BEQ cmn		\ Acc == 4, up, commander name.
 192+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX
 193+ 9EC5              ;F0 B5                   BEQ fwl		\ Acc == 5, up, fuel followed by cash.
 194+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX
 195+ 9EC5              ;D0 05                   BNE  P%+7	\ hop over, else X == 0
 196+ 9EC5              ;A9 80                   LDA #&80	\ Acc == 6, set bit 7 TT27m
 197+ 9EC5              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 198+ 9EC5              ;60                      RTS
 199+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX 		\ skip Acc ==7
 200+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX
 201+ 9EC5              ;D0 03                   BNE P%+5	\ hop over to continue Acc 9to127
 202+ 9EC5              ;86 72                   STX &72	 \ QQ17	\ else Acc ==8, QQ17 set to X = 0
 203+ 9EC5              ;60                      RTS
 204+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX 		\ continue 9to127 tokens
 205+ 9EC5              ;F0 38                   BEQ crlf	\ Acc == 9, down, colon on right.
 206+ 9EC5              ;C9 60                   CMP #&60	\ discard X, look at Acc = token >= 96
 207+ 9EC5              ;B0 66                   BCS ex   	\ extra >= #&60, far down
 208+ 9EC5              ;C9 0E                   CMP #14		\ < 14 ?
 209+ 9EC5              ;90 04                   BCC P%+6	\ goes to Token < 14 or > 31
 210+ 9EC5              ;C9 20                   CMP #32		\ < 32 ?
 211+ 9EC5              ;90 28                   BCC qw   	\ 14 <= token A < 32 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 212+ 9EC5              ;		\ Token  < 14 or > 31
 213+ 9EC5              ;A6 72                   LDX &72	 	\ QQ17
 214+ 9EC5              ;F0 3D                   BEQ TT74 	\ if QQ17 = 0 Upper case, jmp TT26, print character.
 215+ 9EC5              ;30 11                   BMI TT41 	\ if bit7 set
 216+ 9EC5              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17 has bit6 set too
 217+ 9EC5              ;70 30                   BVS TT46 	\ If only bit6 set, clear bit6 and print as Upper
 218+ 9EC5              ;	.TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase
 219+ 9EC5              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 220+ 9EC5              ;90 06                   BCC TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 221+ 9EC5              ;C9 5B                   CMP #&5B	\ >= ascii 'Z'+1
 222+ 9EC5              ;B0 02                   BCS TT44 	\ jmp TT26, print character
 223+ 9EC5              ;69 20                   ADC #&20	\ else Upper to lowercase
 224+ 9EC5              ;	.TT44	\ print character as is with TT26
 225+ 9EC5              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC \ TT26 \ print character
 226+ 9EC5              ;
 227+ 9EC5              ;	.TT41	\ QQ17 bit7 set
 228+ 9EC5              ;24 72                   BIT &72		\ QQ17
 229+ 9EC5              ;70 17                   BVS TT45	\ bit6 set too, Nothing or lower.
 230+ 9EC5              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ < ascii 'A'
 231+ 9EC5              ;90 22                   BCC TT74 	\ print as is using TT26
 232+ 9EC5              ;48                      PHA 		\ else store token Acc
 233+ 9EC5              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 234+ 9EC5              ;09 40                   ORA #&40	\ set bit6 in QQ17 so subsequent ones lower
 235+ 9EC5              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 236+ 9EC5              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore token
 237+ 9EC5              ;D0 EC                   BNE TT44	\ guaranteed up, print as Uppercase with TT26.
 238+ 9EC5              ;
 239+ 9EC5              ;	.qw	\ Acc = 14to31 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 240+ 9EC5              ;69 72                   ADC #&72	\ A+=114 becomes 128to145 page4 digram
 241+ 9EC5              ;D0 32                   BNE ex		\ guaranteed down, extra.
 242+ 9EC5              ;
 243+ 9EC5              ;	.crlf	\ Acc == 9,  colon on right
 244+ 9EC5              ;A9 15                   LDA #21		\ on right
 245+ 9EC5              ;85 2C                   STA &2C		\ XC
 246+ 9EC5              ;D0 97                   BNE TT73	\ guaranteed up, print colon.
 247+ 9EC5              ;
 248+ 9EC5              ;	.TT45	\ QQ17 bits 7,6 set. Nothing or lower.
 249+ 9EC5              ;E0 FF                   CPX #&FF	\ if QQ17 = #&FF
 250+ 9EC5              ;F0 63                   BEQ TT48	\ rts
 251+ 9EC5              ;C9 41                   CMP #&41	\ >= ascii 'A' ?
 252+ 9EC5              ;B0 D0                   BCS TT42	\ Uppercase to lowercase, up.
 253+ 9EC5              ;	.TT46	\ clear bit6 QQ17 and print as is using TT26
 254+ 9EC5              ;48                      PHA 		\ push token
 255+ 9EC5              ;8A                      TXA 		\ QQ17 copy
 256+ 9EC5              ;29 BF                   AND #&BF	\ clear bit6
 257+ 9EC5              ;85 72                   STA &72	 	\ QQ17
 258+ 9EC5              ;68                      PLA 		\ pull token
 259+ 9EC5              ;	.TT74	\ TT26, print character.
 260+ 9EC5              ;4C FC 1E                JMP &1EFC	\ TT26
 261+ 9EC5              ;
 262+ 9EC5              ;	.TT43	\ Token > 127 page4 token or planet digram.
 263+ 9EC5              ;C9 A0                   CMP #&A0	      \ >= #160 ?
 264+ 9EC5              ;B0 14                   BCS TT47	      \ more page4, subtract #160
 265+ 9EC5              ;29 7F                   AND #&7F	      \ else token 128to159  -> 0 to 31
 266+ 9EC5              ;0A                      ASL A		      \ *= 2
 267+ 9EC5              ;A8                      TAY 		      \ digram index = 0to62
 268+ 9EC5              ;B9 80 08                LDA &0880,Y \ QQ16,Y  \ ALLEXEGEZACEBISOUSESARMAINDIREA?ER  etc.
 269+ 9EC5              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 270+ 9EC5              ;B9 81 08                LDA &0881,Y \ QQ16+1,Y \ 2nd character of diagram. Flight copied down from docked code.
 271+ 9EC5              ;C9 3F                   CMP #&3F	      \ is second letter '?'
 272+ 9EC5              ;F0 40                   BEQ TT48    	      \ rts, name has odd-number of letters.
 273+ 9EC5              ;4C 9A 33                JMP &339A   \ TT27    \ process text token
 274+ 9EC5              ;
 275+ 9EC5              ;	.TT47	\ more page4, subtract #160
 276+ 9EC5              ;E9 A0                   SBC #&A0	\ -= 160
 277+ 9EC5              ;	.ex	\ -> &342D \ extra, token >= 96 or Acc = 128to145 or -=160
 278+ 9EC5              ;AA                      TAX 		\ copy of word index
 279+ 9EC5              ;A9 00                   LDA #0		\ page 4 words lo  #QQ18 MOD 256
 280+ 9EC5              ;85 22                   STA &22		\ V
 281+ 9EC5              ;A9 04                   LDA #4		\ page 4 words hi  #QQ18 DIV 256
 282+ 9EC5              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 283+ 9EC5              ;A0 00                   LDY #0
 284+ 9EC5              ;8A                      TXA 		\ token = word index
 285+ 9EC5              ;F0 13                   BEQ TT50	\ if X=0 then Y offset to word correct
 286+ 9EC5              ;	.TT51	\ counters Y letter, X token
 287+ 9EC5              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 288+ 9EC5              ;F0 07                   BEQ TT49	\ exit as word ended
 289+ 9EC5              ;C8                      INY 		\ letter count
 290+ 9EC5              ;D0 F9                   BNE TT51	\ loop Y
 291+ 9EC5              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1 \ next page as Y reached 256
 292+ 9EC5              ;D0 F5                   BNE TT51    	\ guaranteed, loop Y letter
 293+ 9EC5              ;	.TT49	\ word ended
 294+ 9EC5              ;C8                      INY
 295+ 9EC5              ;D0 02                   BNE TT59    	\ next word
 296+ 9EC5              ;E6 23                   INC &23	  \ V+1	\ next page as Y reached 256
 297+ 9EC5              ;	.TT59	\ next word
 298+ 9EC5              ;CA                      DEX 		\ token count
 299+ 9EC5              ;D0 ED                   BNE TT51	\ loop X token
 300+ 9EC5              ;	.TT50	\ token X = 0, counter Y offset to word correct
 301+ 9EC5              ;98                      TYA
 302+ 9EC5              ;48                      PHA 		\ store Yindex
 303+ 9EC5              ;A5 23                   LDA &23		\ V+1
 304+ 9EC5              ;48                      PHA 		\ correct pointer hi
 305+ 9EC5              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y 	\ (V),Y
 306+ 9EC5              ;49 23                   EOR #&23	\ decode '#'
 307+ 9EC5              ;20 9A 33                JSR &339A \ TT27 \ process text token to next depth
 308+ 9EC5              ;68                      PLA 		\ restore this depth's Vhi
 309+ 9EC5              ;85 23                   STA &23		\ V+1
 310+ 9EC5              ;68                      PLA
 311+ 9EC5              ;A8                      TAY 		\ restore this depth's Yindex
 312+ 9EC5              ;C8                      INY 		\ next letter
 313+ 9EC5              ;D0 02                   BNE P%+4	\ not zero so skip next page
 314+ 9EC5              ;E6 23                   INC &23		\ V+1
 315+ 9EC5              ;B1 22                   LDA (&22),Y	\ (V),Y
 316+ 9EC5              ;D0 E6                   BNE TT50    	\ loop Y for next letter of page4 token
 317+ 9EC5              ;	.TT48 	\ rts
 318+ 9EC5              ;60                      RTS 		\ end of flight token printing TT27
 319+ 9EC5              ;
 320+ 9EC5              ;
 321+ 9EC5              ;
# file closed: ./Tables/name_digrams.asm

 730  9EC5                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhldesigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
   1+ 9EC5              addhldesigned:
   2+ 9EC5 CB 7C                bit     7,h
   3+ 9EC7 20 03                jr      nz,.noneghl
   4+ 9EC9 CD 17 A3             call    negate16hl
   5+ 9ECC              .noneghl:
   6+ 9ECC CB 7A                bit     7,d
   7+ 9ECE 20 03                jr      nz,.nonegde
   8+ 9ED0 CD 1E A3             call    negate16de
   9+ 9ED3              .nonegde:
  10+ 9ED3 19                   add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  11+ 9ED4 AF                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  12+ 9ED5 CB 7C                bit     7,h
  13+ 9ED7 C8                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  14+ 9ED8 CD 17 A3             call    negate16hl
  15+ 9EDB 3E FF                ld      a,$FF
  16+ 9EDD C9                   ret
  17+ 9EDE
# file closed: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
 731  9EDE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ 9EDE
   2+ 9EDE              ; a = value to add
   3+ 9EDE              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
   4+ 9EDE              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
   5+ 9EDE              addINWKbasigned:
   6+ 9EDE 21 0B C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
   7+ 9EE1 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
   8+ 9EE2 78           		ld		a,b
   9+ 9EE3 ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
  10+ 9EE5 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
  11+ 9EE6 E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
  12+ 9EE8 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
  13+ 9EE9 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
  14+ 9EEA E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
  15+ 9EEC              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
  16+ 9EEC              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
  17+ 9EEC              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
  18+ 9EEC              addhlcsigned:
  19+ 9EEC 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
  20+ 9EED 23                   inc     hl
  21+ 9EEE 56                   ld      d,(hl)
  22+ 9EEF 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
  23+ 9EF0 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
  24+ 9EF1 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
  25+ 9EF2 A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
  26+ 9EF3 CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
  27+ 9EF5 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
  28+ 9EF7              .negativecalc:
  29+ 9EF7 7C                   ld      a,h
  30+ 9EF8 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ 9EFA 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
  32+ 9EFB DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
  33+ 9EFD 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
  34+ 9EFF ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ 9F01 DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
  36+ 9F03 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
  37+ 9F04 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
  38+ 9F05 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  39+ 9F07 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
  40+ 9F09 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
  41+ 9F0B A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
  42+ 9F0C 77                   ld      (hl),a
  43+ 9F0D 2B                   dec     hl
  44+ 9F0E 72                   ld      (hl),d
  45+ 9F0F 2B                   dec     hl
  46+ 9F10 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
  47+ 9F11 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  48+ 9F12 D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
  49+ 9F13              .nocarry:
  50+ 9F13 CD 17 A3             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
  51+ 9F16 B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
  52+ 9F17 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  53+ 9F18 73                   ld      (hl),e
  54+ 9F19 23                   inc     hl
  55+ 9F1A 72                   ld      (hl),d
  56+ 9F1B 23                   inc     hl
  57+ 9F1C 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
  58+ 9F1D EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
  59+ 9F1E C9                   ret
  60+ 9F1F              .postivecalc:
  61+ 9F1F DD 68                ld      ixl,b
  62+ 9F21 06 00                ld      b,0
  63+ 9F23 19                   add     hl,de
  64+ 9F24 EB                   ex      de,hl
  65+ 9F25 DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
  66+ 9F27 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
  67+ 9F28 2B                   dec     hl
  68+ 9F29 72                   ld      (hl),d
  69+ 9F2A 2B                   dec     hl
  70+ 9F2B 73                   ld      (hl),e
  71+ 9F2C C9                   ret
  72+ 9F2D
  73+ 9F2D              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
  74+ 9F2D              ;MVT1
  75+ 9F2D              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
  76+ 9F2D              ;    A = sign bit => T
  77+ 9F2D              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
  78+ 9F2D              ;    if negative thn its not an add
  79+ 9F2D              ;
  80+ 9F2D              ;        and h, 7F
  81+ 9F2D              ;        b = 0
  82+ 9F2D              ;        c = varS
  83+ 9F2D              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
  84+ 9F2D              ;        retain carry
  85+ 9F2D              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
  86+ 9F2D              ;        and 7F
  87+ 9F2D              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
  88+ 9F2D              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
  89+ 9F2D              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
  90+ 9F2D              ;
  91+ 9F2D              ;    else
  92+ 9F2D              ;MV10.
  93+ 9F2D              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
  94+ 9F2D              ;        or      sign bit
  95+ 9F2D
  96+ 9F2D
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
 732  9F2D                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
   1+ 9F2D              ; Note its big endian
   2+ 9F2D 2A DF 95     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ 9F30 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ 9F31 22 DF 95                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ 9F34 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ 9F37 2A E1 95                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ 9F3A ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ 9F3C 22 E1 95                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ 9F3F C9                                   ret
  10+ 9F40
  11+ 9F40 2A DF 95     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ 9F43 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ 9F44 B5                                   or      l
  14+ 9F45 2A E1 95                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ 9F48 B4                                   or      h
  16+ 9F49 B5                                   or      l
  17+ 9F4A C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ 9F4B B7                                   or      a
  19+ 9F4C 2A DF 95                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ 9F4F ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ 9F51 22 DF 95                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ 9F54 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ 9F57 2A E1 95                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ 9F5A ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ 9F5C 22 E1 95                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ 9F5F                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ 9F5F CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ 9F61 C2 65 9F    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ 9F64 C9                                   ret
  28+ 9F65 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ 9F68 22 DF 95                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ 9F6B 22 E1 95                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ 9F6E C9                                   ret
  32+ 9F6F

 733  9F6F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ 9F6F              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ 9F6F 2A CD 92                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ 9F72 3A CC 92                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ 9F75 C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ 9F77 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ 9F7A 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ 9F7B                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ 9F7B CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ 9F7D CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ 9F7F CB 20                                sla b
   9+ 9F81 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ 9F83 EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ 9F84 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ 9F85 EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ 9F86              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ 9F86 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ 9F88 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ 9F8A CB 20                                sla b
  15+ 9F8C 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ 9F8E 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ 9F90 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ 9F91 D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ 9F93 C9                                   ret
  20+ 9F94
  21+ 9F94
  22+ 9F94              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ 9F94 ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ 9F94 ~                                    and     $80
  28+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ 9F94 ~                                    and     $7F
  31+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ 9F94 ~                                    and     $7F
  34+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ 9F94 ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ 9F94 ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ 9F94 ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ 9F94                                      ENDM
  40+ 9F94
  41+ 9F94
  42+ 9F94
  43+ 9F94                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ 9F94              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ 9F94 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ 9F95 3A CC 92    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ 9F98 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ 9F99 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ 9F9A E6 80       >                        and     $80
  44+ 9F9C 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ 9F9D 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ 9F9E E6 7F       >                        and     $7F
  44+ 9FA0 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ 9FA1 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ 9FA2 E6 7F       >                        and     $7F
  44+ 9FA4 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ 9FA5 ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ 9FA7 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ 9FA8 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ 9FA9 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ 9FAA 2A CD 92     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ 9FAD CD B6 9F                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ 9FB0 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ 9FB1                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ 9FB1 B7          >				or a
  49+ 9FB2 DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ 9FB4 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ 9FB5 C9                                   ret
  52+ 9FB6
  53+ 9FB6
  54+ 9FB6 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ 9FB7 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 9FB9 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ 9FBA AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ 9FBB                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ 9FBB FA D3 9F    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ 9FBE 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ 9FBF B2                                   or      d
  61+ 9FC0                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ 9FC0 FA C5 9F    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ 9FC3 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ 9FC4 C9                                   ret
  64+ 9FC5 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ 9FC6 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ 9FC8 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ 9FC9 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ 9FCA E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ 9FCC 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ 9FCD 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ 9FCE 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ 9FD0 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ 9FD1 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ 9FD2 C9                                   ret
  75+ 9FD3 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ 9FD4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ 9FD6 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ 9FD7 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ 9FD8 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ 9FDA 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ 9FDB B7                                   or      a
  82+ 9FDC ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ 9FDE 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ 9FE0 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ 9FE1 B4                                   or      h
  86+ 9FE2 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ 9FE3 C9                                   ret
  88+ 9FE4              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ 9FE4 AF          >                xor a
  88+ 9FE5 95          >                sub l
  88+ 9FE6 6F          >                ld l,a
  88+ 9FE7 9F          >                sbc a,a
  88+ 9FE8 94          >                sub h
  88+ 9FE9 67          >                ld h,a
  89+ 9FEA 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ 9FEB EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ 9FED B4                                   or      h
  92+ 9FEE 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ 9FEF C9                                   ret
  94+ 9FF0
  95+ 9FF0
  96+ 9FF0                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ 9FF0                  ;
  98+ 9FF0                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ 9FF0                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ 9FF0                  ;
 101+ 9FF0                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ 9FF0                  ;         carry reset
 103+ 9FF0                  ;
 104+ 9FF0                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ 9FF0 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ 9FF1 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ 9FF2 ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ 9FF4 EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ 9FF5 ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ 9FF7
 111+ 9FF7 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ 9FF8 85                                   add a,l
 113+ 9FF9 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ 9FFA EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ 9FFB
 116+ 9FFB 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ 9FFC CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ 9FFE C9                                   ret
 119+ 9FFF
 120+ 9FFF
 121+ 9FFF
 122+ 9FFF                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ 9FFF                 ;
 124+ 9FFF                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ 9FFF                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ 9FFF                 ;
 127+ 9FFF                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ 9FFF                 ;         carry reset
 129+ 9FFF                 ;
 130+ 9FFF                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ 9FFF
 132+ 9FFF
 133+ 9FFF
 134+ 9FFF 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A000 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A001 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A002 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A003 E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A004 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A005              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A005 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A007 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A008 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A00A
 145+ A00A AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A00B 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A00C 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A00D
 149+ A00D 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A00E 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A00F ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A011
 153+ A011 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A012 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A013
 156+ A013 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A014 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A015 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A016 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A017
 161+ A017 D1                                   pop de
 162+ A018 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A01A
 164+ A01A EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A01B ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A01D EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A01E
 168+ A01E C9                                   ret
 169+ A01F
 170+ A01F              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A01F              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A01F              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A01F              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A01F              ;         carry reset
 175+ A01F              ; maths is
 176+ A01F              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A01F              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A01F              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A01F              ;
 180+ A01F              ;
 181+ A01F              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A01F C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A020 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A021 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A022 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A023 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A024 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A025 ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A027 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A028 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A02A 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A02B 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A02C 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A02D ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A02F 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A030 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A031 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A032 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A033                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A033 AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A034 C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A035 C9                                   ret
 203+ A036
 204+ A036              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 205+ A036              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 206+ A036              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 207+ A036              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 208+ A036              ;         carry reset
 209+ A036              ;
 210+ A036              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 211+ A036 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 212+ A037 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 213+ A038 32 36 A0                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 214+ A03B 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 215+ A03C ED 27 80                             test    $80
 216+ A03F 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 217+ A041 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 218+ A043 57                                   ld      d,a
 219+ A044 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 220+ A046 32 36 A0                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 221+ A049 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 222+ A04A ED 27 80                             test    $80
 223+ A04D 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 224+ A04F E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 225+ A051 67                                   ld      h,a
 226+ A052 3A 36 A0                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 227+ A055 EE 80                                xor     $80
 228+ A057 32 36 A0                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 229+ A05A CD 1F A0     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 230+ A05D 3A 36 A0     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 231+ A060 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 232+ A063 C8                                   ret     z
 233+ A064 AF           .Negateghl: 				xor 	a
 234+ A065 95                                   sub 	l
 235+ A066 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 236+ A067 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 237+ A068 94                                   sub 	h
 238+ A069 67                                   ld 		h,a
 239+ A06A C9                                   ret
 240+ A06B
 241+ A06B AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 242+ A06C 32 36 A0                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A06F 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A070 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A073 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 246+ A075 E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A077 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A078 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A07A 32 36 A0                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A07D CD 1F A0     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 251+ A080 3A 36 A0     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 252+ A083 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 253+ A086 C8                                   ret     z
 254+ A087 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 255+ A088 95                                   sub 	l
 256+ A089 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 257+ A08A 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 258+ A08B 94                                   sub 	h
 259+ A08C 67                                   ld 		h,a
 260+ A08D C9                                   ret
 261+ A08E
 262+ A08E
# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 734  A08E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A08E              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A08E              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A08E
   4+ A08E              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A08E ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A08E ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A08E ~            			mul
   8+ A08E              			ENDM
   9+ A08E
  10+ A08E              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A08E ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A08E ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A08E ~            			mul
  14+ A08E ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A08E              			ENDM
  16+ A08E
  17+ A08E
  18+ A08E              asm_squa:
  19+ A08E E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A090              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A090              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A090              asm_squa2:
  23+ A090 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A091 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A092 ED 30        	mul
  26+ A094 ED 53 71 92  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A098 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A099 C9           	ret

 735  A09A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A09A              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A09A              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A09A              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A09A              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A09A              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A09A              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A09A 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A09D 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A09E 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A09F              .sqrloop:
  11+ A09F CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A0A1 CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A0A3 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A0A4 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A0A5 ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A0A7 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A0A9 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A0AA 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A0AB 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A0AD              .sqrbit:
  21+ A0AD 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A0AE EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A0AF B7           	or a
  24+ A0B0 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A0B2              .sqrfi:
  26+ A0B2 CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A0B4 CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A0B6 CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A0B8 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A0BA 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A0BC C9           	ret
  32+ A0BD
  33+ A0BD
  34+ A0BD              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A0BD 3A CC 92     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A0C0 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A0C1 3A CD 92     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A0C4 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A0C5 CD 9A A0     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A0C8 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A0C9 32 CC 92     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A0CC C9           	ret
  43+ A0CD
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 736  A0CD                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A0CD              ; Divide 8-bit values
   2+ A0CD              ; In: Divide E by divider C
   3+ A0CD              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
   4+ A0CD              ;
   5+ A0CD              ;;;Div8:
   6+ A0CD              ;;;    xor a
   7+ A0CD              ;;;    ld b,8
   8+ A0CD              ;;;Div8_Loop:
   9+ A0CD              ;;;    rl e
  10+ A0CD              ;;;    rla
  11+ A0CD              ;;;    sub c
  12+ A0CD              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  13+ A0CD              ;;;    add a,c
  14+ A0CD              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  15+ A0CD              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  16+ A0CD              ;;;    ld b,a
  17+ A0CD              ;;;    ld a,e
  18+ A0CD              ;;;    rla
  19+ A0CD              ;;;    cpl
  20+ A0CD              ;;;    ret
  21+ A0CD
  22+ A0CD              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  23+ A0CD              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  24+ A0CD              ;;         A is a copy of E
  25+ A0CD              ;;         HL is the remainder
  26+ A0CD              ;;         BC is not changed
  27+ A0CD              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  28+ A0CD              ;140 bytes
  29+ A0CD              ;145cc
  30+ A0CD
  31+ A0CD              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  32+ A0CD ~                                rla
  33+ A0CD ~                                adc     hl,hl
  34+ A0CD ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A0CD ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  36+ A0CD ~                                add     hl,bc
  37+ A0CD                                  ENDM
  38+ A0CD
  39+ A0CD              DEequDEDivBC:
  40+ A0CD AF               xor a
  41+ A0CE ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  42+ A0D0 7A               ld a,d
  43+ A0D1                  MacroDEDivBC
  43+ A0D1 17          >                    rla
  43+ A0D2 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  43+ A0D4 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  43+ A0D6 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  43+ A0D8 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  44+ A0D9                  MacroDEDivBC
  44+ A0D9 17          >                    rla
  44+ A0DA ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  44+ A0DC ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  44+ A0DE 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  44+ A0E0 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  45+ A0E1                  MacroDEDivBC
  45+ A0E1 17          >                    rla
  45+ A0E2 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  45+ A0E4 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc

  68+ A159
  69+ A159
  70+ A159
  71+ A159              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  72+ A159              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  73+ A159              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  74+ A159              ; Our use
  75+ A159              ; BC = A0
  76+ A159              ; DE = 0C
  77+ A159              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
  78+ A159              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
  78+ A159 B9          >                        cp     c
  78+ A15A D2 85 A1    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
  79+ A15D 47                                   ld      b,a
  80+ A15E 59                                   ld      e,c
  81+ A15F 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  82+ A161 16 00                                ld      d,0
  83+ A163 C3 70 A1                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
  84+ A166 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
  85+ A167 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  86+ A169 21 CC 92                             ld      hl,varQ
  87+ A16C 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  88+ A16D 16 00                                ld      d,0
  89+ A16F 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90+ A170              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
  91+ A170 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
  92+ A173 78                                   ld      a,b
  93+ A174 06 10                                ld      b,16
  94+ A176 CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
  95+ A178 17                                   rla			; ...
  96+ A179 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
  97+ A17B ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
  98+ A17D 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  99+ A17F 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 100+ A180 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 101+ A181 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 102+ A183 47                                   ld   b,a
 103+ A184 C9                                   ret
 104+ A185 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 105+ A188 C9                                   ret
 106+ A189
 107+ A189              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 108+ A189 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 109+ A18B AF                                   xor a
 110+ A18C CB 21        div8_loop:	            sla c
 111+ A18E 17                                   rla
 112+ A18F BA                                   cp d
 113+ A190 38 02                                jr c,div8_skip
 113+ A192
 114+ A192 0C                                   inc c
 115+ A193 92                                   sub d
 116+ A194 10 F6        div8_skip:	            djnz div8_loop
 117+ A196 C9                                   ret
 118+ A197              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 119+ A197 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 120+ A199 AF                                   xor a
 121+ A19A CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 122+ A19C CB 14                                rl	h
 123+ A19E              ;    add hl,hl
 124+ A19E 17                                   rla
 125+ A19F B9                                   cp c
 126+ A1A0 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 127+ A1A2 2C                                   inc l
 128+ A1A3 91                                   sub c
 129+ A1A4 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 130+ A1A6 C9                                   ret
 131+ A1A7              ;
 132+ A1A7              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 133+ A1A7              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 134+ A1A7              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 135+ A1A7              ;
 136+ A1A7              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 137+ A1A7 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 138+ A1A7 ~            					rla				; ...
 139+ A1A7 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 140+ A1A7 ~            					jr	1F
 141+ A1A7 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 142+ A1A7 ~            1:
 143+ A1A7 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 144+ A1A7              					ENDM
 145+ A1A7
 146+ A1A7
 147+ A1A7
 148+ A1A7              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 149+ A1A7 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 150+ A1AA 78                               ld a,b
 151+ A1AB 06 08                            ld b,8
 152+ A1AD 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 153+ A1AE ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 154+ A1B0 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 155+ A1B2 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 156+ A1B4 19                               add hl,de
 157+ A1B5 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 158+ A1B7 17                               rla
 159+ A1B8 2F                               cpl
 160+ A1B9 47                               ld b,a
 161+ A1BA 79                               ld a,c
 162+ A1BB 48                               ld c,b
 163+ A1BC 06 08                            ld b,8
 164+ A1BE 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 165+ A1BF ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 166+ A1C1 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 167+ A1C3 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 168+ A1C5 19                               add hl,de
 169+ A1C6 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 170+ A1C8 17                               rla
 171+ A1C9 2F                               cpl
 172+ A1CA 41                               ld b,c
 173+ A1CB 4F                               ld c,a
 174+ A1CC C9                               ret
 175+ A1CD
 176+ A1CD
 177+ A1CD
 178+ A1CD              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 179+ A1CD ~            				   rla
 180+ A1CD ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 181+ A1CD ~            				   add	hl,de
 182+ A1CD ~            				   jr	c,1F
 183+ A1CD ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 184+ A1CD ~            1:
 185+ A1CD              				   ENDM
 186+ A1CD
 187+ A1CD
 188+ A1CD              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 189+ A1CD              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 190+ A1CD              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 191+ A1CD              ;min: 738cc
 192+ A1CD              ;max: 898cc
 193+ A1CD              ;avg: 818cc
 194+ A1CD              ;144 bytes
 195+ A1CD AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 196+ A1CE 67                                   ld h,a
 197+ A1CF 6F                                   ld l,a
 198+ A1D0 93                                   sub e
 199+ A1D1 5F                                   ld e,a
 200+ A1D2 9F                                   sbc a,a
 201+ A1D3 92                                   sub d
 202+ A1D4 57                                   ld d,a
 203+ A1D5 78                                   ld a,b
 204+ A1D6                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 204+ A1D6 17          >				   rla
 204+ A1D7 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 204+ A1D9 19          >				   add	hl,de
 204+ A1DA 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 204+ A1DC ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 204+ A1DE             >1:
 205+ A1DE                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 205+ A1DE 17          >				   rla
 205+ A1DF ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 205+ A1E1 19          >				   add	hl,de
 205+ A1E2 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 205+ A1E4 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 205+ A1E6             >1:
 206+ A1E6                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 206+ A1E6 17          >				   rla
 206+ A1E7 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 206+ A1E9 19          >				   add	hl,de
 206+ A1EA 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 206+ A1EC ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 206+ A1EE             >1:
 207+ A1EE                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 207+ A1EE 17          >				   rla
 207+ A1EF ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 207+ A1F1 19          >				   add	hl,de
 207+ A1F2 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 207+ A1F4 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 207+ A1F6             >1:
 208+ A1F6                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 208+ A1F6 17          >				   rla
 208+ A1F7 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 208+ A1F9 19          >				   add	hl,de
 208+ A1FA 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 208+ A1FC ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 208+ A1FE             >1:
 209+ A1FE                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 209+ A1FE 17          >				   rla
 209+ A1FF ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 209+ A201 19          >				   add	hl,de
 209+ A202 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 209+ A204 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 209+ A206             >1:
 210+ A206                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 210+ A206 17          >				   rla
 210+ A207 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 210+ A209 19          >				   add	hl,de
 210+ A20A 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 210+ A20C ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 210+ A20E             >1:
 211+ A20E                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 211+ A20E 17          >				   rla
 211+ A20F ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 211+ A211 19          >				   add	hl,de
 211+ A212 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 211+ A214 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 211+ A216             >1:
 212+ A216 17                                   rla
 213+ A217 47                                   ld b,a
 214+ A218
 215+ A218 79                                   ld a,c
 216+ A219                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 216+ A219 17          >				   rla
 216+ A21A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 216+ A21C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 216+ A21D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 216+ A21F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 216+ A221             >1:
 217+ A221                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 217+ A221 17          >				   rla
 217+ A222 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 217+ A224 19          >				   add	hl,de
 217+ A225 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 217+ A227 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 217+ A229             >1:
 218+ A229                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 218+ A229 17          >				   rla

 218+ A22D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 218+ A22F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 218+ A231             >1:
 219+ A231                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 219+ A231 17          >				   rla
 219+ A232 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 219+ A234 19          >				   add	hl,de
 219+ A235 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 219+ A237 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 219+ A239             >1:
 220+ A239                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 220+ A239 17          >				   rla
 220+ A23A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 220+ A23C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 220+ A23D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 220+ A23F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 220+ A241             >1:
 221+ A241                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 221+ A241 17          >				   rla
 221+ A242 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 221+ A244 19          >				   add	hl,de
 221+ A245 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 221+ A247 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 221+ A249             >1:
 222+ A249                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 222+ A249 17          >				   rla
 222+ A24A ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 222+ A24C 19          >				   add	hl,de
 222+ A24D 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 222+ A24F ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 222+ A251             >1:
 223+ A251                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 223+ A251 17          >				   rla
 223+ A252 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 223+ A254 19          >				   add	hl,de
 223+ A255 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 223+ A257 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 223+ A259             >1:
 224+ A259 17                                   rla
 225+ A25A 4F                                   ld c,a
 226+ A25B C9                                   ret
 227+ A25C
 228+ A25C              ;Inputs:
 229+ A25C              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 230+ A25C              ;Outputs:
 231+ A25C              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 232+ A25C              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 233+ A25C              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 234+ A25C              ;Otherwise:
 235+ A25C              ;min: 1107cc
 236+ A25C              ;max: 1319cc
 237+ A25C              ;avg: 1201cc
 238+ A25C 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 239+ A25D AA                                   xor d
 240+ A25E F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 241+ A25F              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 242+ A25F A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 243+ A260 F2 69 A2                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 244+ A263 AF                                   xor a
 245+ A264 91                                   sub c
 246+ A265 4F                                   ld c,a
 247+ A266 9F                                   sbc a,a
 248+ A267 90                                   sub b
 249+ A268 47                                   ld b,a
 250+ A269 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 251+ A26A B2                                   or d
 252+ A26B FA 74 A2                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 253+ A26E AF                                   xor a
 254+ A26F 93                                   sub e
 255+ A270 5F                                   ld e,a
 256+ A271 9F                                   sbc a,a
 257+ A272 92                                   sub d
 258+ A273 57                                   ld d,a
 259+ A274 B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 260+ A275 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 261+ A277 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 262+ A279 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 263+ A27A 83                                   add a,e
 264+ A27B 7A                                   ld a,d
 265+ A27C 8C                                   adc a,h
 266+ A27D 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 267+ A27F 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 268+ A280 79                                   ld a,c
 269+ A281 CD 9C A2                             call div_fixed88_sub
 270+ A284 4F                                   ld c,a
 271+ A285 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 272+ A286 CD 9C A2                             call div_fixed88_sub
 273+ A289 51                                   ld d,c
 274+ A28A 5F                                   ld e,a
 275+ A28B F1                                   pop af
 276+ A28C F0                                   ret p
 277+ A28D AF                                   xor a
 278+ A28E 93                                   sub e
 279+ A28F 5F                                   ld e,a
 280+ A290 9F                                   sbc a,a
 281+ A291 92                                   sub d
 282+ A292 57                                   ld d,a
 283+ A293 C9                                   ret
 284+ A294
 285+ A294 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 286+ A297 F1                                   pop af
 287+ A298 F0                                   ret p
 288+ A299 13                                   inc de
 289+ A29A 1C                                   inc e
 290+ A29B C9                                   ret
 291+ A29C
 292+ A29C              ;min: 456cc
 293+ A29C              ;max: 536cc
 294+ A29C              ;avg: 496cc
 295+ A29C 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 296+ A29E 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 297+ A29F ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 298+ A2A1 19                                   add hl,de
 299+ A2A2 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 300+ A2A4 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 301+ A2A6 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 302+ A2A8 8F                                   adc a,a
 303+ A2A9 C9                                   ret
 304+ A2AA
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 737  A2AA                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ A2AA              asm_tis2:
   2+ A2AA              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ A2AA              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ A2AA F5           	push af
   5+ A2AB E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ A2AD 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ A2AE 3A CC 92     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ A2B1 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ A2B2 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ A2B3 BB           	cp e
  11+ A2B4 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ A2B6 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ A2B8 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ A2BA EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A2BB 3A CC 92     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ A2BE 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ A2BF CD 97 A1     	call asm_div16
  18+ A2C2 F1           	pop af
  19+ A2C3 E6 80        	and $80
  20+ A2C5 B5           	or l
  21+ A2C6 C9           	ret
  22+ A2C7              .tis2_set96:
  23+ A2C7 F1           	pop af
  24+ A2C8 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ A2CA F6 96        	or $96
  26+ A2CC C9           	ret
  27+ A2CD
  28+ A2CD
  29+ A2CD              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ A2CD              squareregfx:
  31+ A2CD 3A 76 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ A2D0 57           	ld d,a
  33+ A2D1 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ A2D2 ED 30        	mul
  35+ A2D4 EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ A2D5              squareregfy:
  37+ A2D5 3A 78 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ A2D8 57           	ld d,a
  39+ A2D9 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ A2DA ED 30        	mul
  41+ A2DC 19           	add hl,de
  42+ A2DD              squareregfz:
  43+ A2DD 3A 7A C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ A2E0 57           	ld d,a
  45+ A2E1 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ A2E2 ED 30        	mul
  47+ A2E4 19           	add hl,de
  48+ A2E5 EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ A2E6              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ A2E6 CD 9A A0     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ A2E9 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ A2EA E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ A2EB E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ A2EC              normfx:
  55+ A2EC 3A 76 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ A2EF E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ A2F0 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ A2F1 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ A2F2 CD AA A2     	call asm_tis2
  60+ A2F5 32 76 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ A2F8              normfy:
  62+ A2F8 3A 78 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ A2FB E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ A2FC 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ A2FD 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ A2FE CD AA A2     	call asm_tis2
  67+ A301 32 78 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ A304              normfz:
  69+ A304 3A 7A C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ A307 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ A308 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ A309 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ A30A CD AA A2     	call asm_tis2
  74+ A30D 32 7A C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ A310              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ A310 C9           	ret
  77+ A311
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 738  A311                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ A311              compare16HLDE:
   2+ A311              ; Input:
   3+ A311              ;       HL = 1st value
   4+ A311              ;       DE = 2nd value
   5+ A311              ; Output:
   6+ A311              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   7+ A311              ;
   8+ A311              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   9+ A311              ;               -----------------------------------
  10+ A311              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  11+ A311              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  12+ A311              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  13+ A311              ;               1       1       Impossible
  14+ A311              ;
  15+ A311 E5           		push    hl
  16+ A312 A7           		and     a
  17+ A313 ED 52        		sbc     hl,de
  18+ A315 E1           		pop     hl
  19+ A316 C9           		ret
  20+ A317
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 739  A317                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ A317              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ A317              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ A317              negate16:
   4+ A317              negate16hl:
   5+ A317                      ; Input:
   6+ A317                      ;       HL = value
   7+ A317                      ; Output:
   8+ A317                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ A317                      ; Destroys:
  10+ A317                      ;       AF
  11+ A317                      ;
  12+ A317 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ A318 95           	sub 	l
  14+ A319 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ A31A 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ A31B 94           	sub 	h
  17+ A31C 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ A31D C9           	ret
  19+ A31E
  20+ A31E              negate16de:
  21+ A31E AF           	xor 	a
  22+ A31F 93           	sub 	e
  23+ A320 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ A321 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ A322 92           	sub 	d
  26+ A323 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ A324 C9           	ret
  28+ A325
  29+ A325              negate16bc:
  30+ A325 AF           	xor 	a
  31+ A326 91           	sub 	c
  32+ A327 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ A328 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ A329 90           	sub 	b
  35+ A32A 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ A32B C9           	ret
  37+ A32C
  38+ A32C
  39+ A32C              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ A32C ~            					xor 	a
  41+ A32C ~            					sub 	l
  42+ A32C ~            					ld 		l,a

  47+ A32C

  53+ A32C ~                                sub 	d
  54+ A32C ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ A32C              					ENDM
  56+ A32C              macronegate16bc:	MACRO

  58+ A32C ~                                sub 	c

  60+ A32C ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ A32C ~                                sub 	b
  62+ A32C ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ A32C              					ENDM

  68+ A32C ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ A32C ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ A32C ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ A32C ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ A32C              					ENDM
