 740  A32C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ A32C DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ A32E                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ A32E BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A32F D2 44 A3    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ A332 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ A333 CD 89 A1                             call		asm_div8
   5+ A336 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ A337 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ A339 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ A33A CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ A33C 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ A33D 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ A33E DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ A340 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ A342 B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ A343 C9                                   ret
  15+ A344              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ A344              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ A344 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ A346 E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ A348 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ A34A C9                                   ret
  21+ A34B
  22+ A34B
  23+ A34B
  24+ A34B
  25+ A34B              normaliseXX1596fast:			; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  26+ A34B 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  27+ A34E DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  28+ A350 E6 7F        	and		$7F                 ; a = unsigned version
  29+ A352              N96SQX:
  30+ A352              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  30+ A352 5F          >			ld	e,a
  30+ A353 57          >			ld  d,a
  30+ A354 ED 30       >			mul
  31+ A356 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  32+ A357 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  33+ A358              N96SQY:
  34+ A358 3A 77 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  35+ A35B DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  36+ A35D E6 7F        	and		$7F                 ; = abs
  37+ A35F              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  37+ A35F 5F          >			ld	e,a
  37+ A360 57          >			ld  d,a
  37+ A361 ED 30       >			mul
  38+ A363 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  39+ A364              N96SQZ:
  40+ A364 3A 78 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  41+ A367 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  42+ A369 E6 7F        	and		$7F                 ; unsigned
  43+ A36B              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  43+ A36B 5F          >			ld	e,a
  43+ A36C 57          >			ld  d,a
  43+ A36D ED 30       >			mul
  44+ A36F              N96SQADD:
  45+ A36F 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  46+ A370 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  47+ A371              N96SQRT:
  48+ A371 CD 9A A0     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  49+ A374              N96NORMX:
  50+ A374 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  51+ A377 E6 7F        	and		$7F
  52+ A379 4F           	ld		c,a
  53+ A37A 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  54+ A37B CD 58 A5     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  55+ A37E 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  56+ A37F DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  57+ A381 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  58+ A383 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  59+ A384 32 76 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  60+ A387              N96NORMY:
  61+ A387 3A 77 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  62+ A38A E6 7F        	and		$7F
  63+ A38C 4F           	ld		c,a
  64+ A38D 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  65+ A38E CD 58 A5     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  66+ A391 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  67+ A392 DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  68+ A394 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  69+ A396 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  70+ A397 32 77 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  71+ A39A              N96NORMZ:
  72+ A39A 3A 78 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  73+ A39D E6 7F        	and		$7F
  74+ A39F 4F           	ld		c,a
  75+ A3A0 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  76+ A3A1 CD 58 A5     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  77+ A3A4 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  78+ A3A5 FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  79+ A3A7 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  80+ A3A9 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  81+ A3AA 32 78 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  82+ A3AD C9           	ret
  83+ A3AE
  84+ A3AE              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  85+ A3AE 3A 76 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  86+ A3B1                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  86+ A3B1 5F          >			ld	e,a
  86+ A3B2 57          >			ld  d,a
  86+ A3B3 ED 30       >			mul
  87+ A3B5 7A                                   ld		a,d
  88+ A3B6 32 CD 92                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  89+ A3B9 7B                                   ld		a,e
  90+ A3BA 32 CC 92                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
  91+ A3BD 32 71 92                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
  92+ A3C0 3A 77 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
  93+ A3C3                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  93+ A3C3 5F          >			ld	e,a
  93+ A3C4 57          >			ld  d,a
  93+ A3C5 ED 30       >			mul
  94+ A3C7 7A                                   ld		a,d
  95+ A3C8 32 EC 92                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
  96+ A3CB 7B                                   ld		a,e
  97+ A3CC 32 71 92                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
  98+ A3CF 21 CC 92                             ld		hl,varQ
  99+ A3D2 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 100+ A3D3 32 CC 92                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 101+ A3D6 3A EC 92                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 102+ A3D9 21 CD 92                             ld		hl,varR
 103+ A3DC 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 104+ A3DD 32 CD 92                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 105+ A3E0 3A 78 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 106+ A3E3                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 106+ A3E3 5F          >			ld	e,a
 106+ A3E4 57          >			ld  d,a
 106+ A3E5 ED 30       >			mul
 107+ A3E7 7A                                   ld		a,d
 108+ A3E8 32 EC 92                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 109+ A3EB 7B                                   ld		a,e
 110+ A3EC 32 71 92                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 111+ A3EF 21 CC 92                             ld		hl,varQ
 112+ A3F2 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 113+ A3F3 32 CC 92                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 114+ A3F6 3A EC 92                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 115+ A3F9 21 CD 92                             ld		hl,varR
 116+ A3FC 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 117+ A3FD 32 CD 92                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 118+ A400 CD BD A0                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 119+ A403 3A 76 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 120+ A406 CD 52 A5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 121+ A409 32 76 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 122+ A40C 3A 77 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 123+ A40F CD 52 A5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 124+ A412 32 77 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 125+ A415 3A 77 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 126+ A418 CD 52 A5                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 127+ A41B 32 77 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 128+ A41E C9                                   ret
 129+ A41F
 130+ A41F
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 741  A41F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ A41F              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ A41F              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ A41F              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ A41F              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ A41F              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ A41F              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ A41F              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ A41F 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ A422 CD 38 A4     	call	Num1
  10+ A425 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ A428 CD 38 A4     	call	Num1
  12+ A42B 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ A42E CD 38 A4     	call	Num1
  14+ A431 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ A433 CD 38 A4     	call	Num1
  16+ A436 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ A438              Num1:
  18+ A438 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ A43A              .Num2:
  20+ A43A 3C           	inc	a
  21+ A43B 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ A43C 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ A43E ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ A440 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ A441 13           	inc	de
  26+ A442 C9           	ret
  27+ A443
  28+ A443              DispAtoDE:
  29+ A443 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ A445 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ A446 C3 1F A4     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ A449
  33+ A449              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ A449 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ A44B 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ A44C 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ A44F CD 5F A4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ A452 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ A454 CD 38 A4     	call	Num1
  40+ A457 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ A459 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ A45A 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ A45B 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ A45D 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ A45F              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ A45F 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ A461              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ A461 3C           	inc	a
  49+ A462 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ A463 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ A465 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ A467 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ A469              .Blank:
  54+ A469 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ A46B              .DontBlank:
  56+ A46B ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ A46D 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ A46E 13           	inc	de
  59+ A46F C9           	ret
  60+ A470
  61+ A470              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ A470 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ A472 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ A474 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ A476 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ A477 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ A47A CD 86 A4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ A47D 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ A47F CD 86 A4     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ A482 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ A484 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ A486              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ A486 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ A488              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ A488 3C           	inc	a
  76+ A489 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ A48A 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ A48C FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ A48E 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ A490              .Blank:
  81+ A490 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ A492              .DontBlank:
  83+ A492 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ A494 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ A495 13           	inc	de
  86+ A496 C9           	ret
  87+ A497              .NoStock:
  88+ A497 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ A499 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ A49A 13           	inc	de
  91+ A49B 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ A49C 13           	inc	de
  93+ A49D 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ A49F 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ A4A0 13           	inc de
  96+ A4A1 C9           	ret
  97+ A4A2
  98+ A4A2
  99+ A4A2              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ A4A2              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ A4A2              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ A4A2              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ A4A2 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ A4A6 0A 00 00 00
 103+ A4AA 64 00 00 00
 103+ A4AE E8 03 00 00
 103+ A4B2 10 27 00 00
 104+ A4B6 A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ A4BA 40 42 0F 00
 104+ A4BE 80 96 98 00
 104+ A4C2 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ A4C6 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ A4CA 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ A4CE
 107+ A4CE              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ A4CE CD DD A4     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ A4D1 FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ A4D4 FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ A4D7 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ A4D9 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ A4DC C9                                   ret
 114+ A4DD
 115+ A4DD DD 22 CA A4  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ A4E1 ED 53 CC A4                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ A4E5 DD 21 C6 A4                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ A4E9 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ A4EB 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ A4ED 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ A4EF B7                                   or a
 122+ A4F0 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ A4F3 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ A4F6 2A CA A4                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ A4F9 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ A4FB 22 CA A4                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ A4FE DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ A501 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ A504 2A CC A4                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ A507 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ A509 22 CC A4                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ A50C 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ A50E 0C                                   inc c
 134+ A50F 3C                                   inc a
 135+ A510 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ A512 DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ A515 DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ A518 2A CA A4                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ A51B 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ A51C 22 CA A4                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ A51F DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ A522 DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ A525 2A CC A4                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ A528 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ A52A 22 CC A4                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ A52D 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ A530 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ A532 0C                                   inc c
 149+ A533 0D                                   dec c
 150+ A534 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ A536 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ A539 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ A53B 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ A53D 3A CA A4                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ A540 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ A542 FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ A545 FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ A549 C9                                   ret
 159+ A54A
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 742  A54A              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 743  A54A              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
 744  A54A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ A54A
   2+ A54A              ; USES 			A DE BC
   3+ A54A              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
   4+ A54A              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
   5+ A54A CB 7F        	bit			7,a
   6+ A54C 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
   7+ A54E ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
   8+ A550 CB FF        	set			7,a
   9+ A552              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  10+ A552              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  11+ A552              TIS2:
  12+ A552 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  13+ A553 3A CC 92     	ld			a,(varQ)
  14+ A556 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  15+ A557 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  16+ A558              AequAdivDmul96:
  17+ A558 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  18+ A559 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  19+ A55B              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  19+ A55B BA          >                        cp     d
  19+ A55C D2 7C A5    >                        jp		nc,TIS2AccGTEQ
  20+ A55F 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  21+ A561              TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  22+ A561 CB 27        	sla			a
  23+ A563              	JumpIfALTNusng d,TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  23+ A563 BA          >                        cp      d
  23+ A564 DA 82 A5    >                        jp		c,TIS2SkipSub
  24+ A567 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  25+ A568 37           	scf
  26+ A569 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  27+ A56B 38 F4        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  28+ A56D              TIS2SKIPCont:
  29+ A56D 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  30+ A56E CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  31+ A570 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  32+ A572 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  33+ A573 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  34+ A575 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  35+ A576 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  36+ A577 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  37+ A578 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  38+ A57A B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  39+ A57B C9           	ret
  40+ A57C              TIS2AccGTEQ:
  41+ A57C              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  42+ A57C 79           	ld			a,c
  43+ A57D E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  44+ A57F F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  45+ A581 C9           	ret
  46+ A582              TIS2SkipSub:
  47+ A582 B7           	or			a
  48+ A583 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ A585 38 DA        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ A587 C3 6D A5     	jp			TIS2SKIPCont
  51+ A58A
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 745  A58A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ A58A              fmltu:
   2+ A58A              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ A58A              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ A58A 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ A58B 3A CC 92     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ A58E 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A58F ED 30        	mul
   8+ A591 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ A592 C9           	ret
  10+ A593
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 746  A593                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ A593              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ A593              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ A593 21 9C 95     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ A596 FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ A598 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ A59A 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ A59B C3 A7 A5     		jp		DV41
   8+ A59E              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ A59E 21 9C 95     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ A5A1 3A FB 91     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ A5A4 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ A5A6 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ A5A7              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ A5A7 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ A5A8 3A C8 92     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ A5AB              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ A5AB 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ A5AD CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ A5AF 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ A5B0 AF           		xor		a
  21+ A5B1              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ A5B1 CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ A5B3 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ A5B5 BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ A5B6 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ A5B8              DV8:
  27+ A5B8 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ A5B9 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ A5BA              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ A5BA CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ A5BC 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ A5BE              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ A5BE              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ A5BE 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ A5C0 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ A5C1              .RollRemainder:
  37+ A5C1 CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ A5C3 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ A5C5 B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ A5C6 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ A5C8              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ A5C8 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ A5C9              .DontSBC:
  44+ A5C9 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ A5CB 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ A5CD 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ A5CE 32 CD 92     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ A5D1 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ A5D2 32 71 92     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ A5D5 C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ A5D6              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ A5D6 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ A5D7 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ A5D8 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ A5DA 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ A5DC 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ A5DD 32 CD 92     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ A5E0 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ A5E1 32 71 92     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ A5E4 C9           		ret
  61+ A5E5              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ A5E5 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ A5E7 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ A5E8 32 CD 92     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ A5EB 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ A5EC 32 71 92     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ A5EF C9           		ret
  68+ A5F0
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 747  A5F0                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ A5F0
   2+ A5F0              asm_defmutl:
   3+ A5F0              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ A5F0              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ A5F0 ED 30        	mul
   6+ A5F2 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ A5F3 C9           	ret
   8+ A5F4
   9+ A5F4
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
 748  A5F4              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 749  A5F4              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 750  A5F4              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 751  A5F4                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ A5F4              APequQmulA:
   2+ A5F4              asm_mult1:
   3+ A5F4              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ A5F4 FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ A5F6 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ A5F8 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A5F9 3A CC 92     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ A5FC 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ A5FD FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ A5FF 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ A601 AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ A602 E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ A604 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ A605 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ A606 E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ A608 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ A609 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ A60A E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ A60C 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ A60D ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ A60F 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ A610 32 71 92     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ A613 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ A614 B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ A615 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ A616 C9           	ret
  27+ A617              .mul0:
  28+ A617 AF           	xor	a
  29+ A618 32 71 92     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ A61B 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ A61C 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ A61D C9           	ret
  33+ A61E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 752  A61E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ A61E              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ A61E              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ A61E              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ A61E              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ A61E              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ A61E              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ A61E              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ A61E              LL38:
   9+ A61E              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ A61E              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ A61E              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ A61E              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ A61E              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ A61E              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ A61E              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ A61E              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ A61E              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ A61E              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ A61E              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ A61E              ;	ret
  21+ A61E              ; calculation table
  22+ A61E              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ A61E              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ A61E              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ A61E              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ A61E              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ A61E              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ A61E              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ A61E              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ A61E              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ A61E
  32+ A61E              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ A61E              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ A61E              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ A61E              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ A61E
  37+ A61E
  38+ A61E              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ A61E 21 CE 92     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ A621 AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ A622 FA 2D A6     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ A625 3A CC 92     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ A628 21 CD 92     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ A62B 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ A62C C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ A62D              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ A62D 3A CD 92     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ A630 21 CC 92     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ A633              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ A633              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ A633 B7          >				or a
  51+ A634 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ A635 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ A637              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ A637              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ A637              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ A637 C9           	ret
  57+ A638              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ A638 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ A63A 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ A63C ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ A63E 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ A63F 3A CE 92     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ A642 EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ A644 32 CE 92     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ A647 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ A648                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ A648 B7          >				or a
  67+ A649 C9           	ret
  68+ A64A              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ A64A 32 CE 92         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ A64D                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ A64D B7          >				or a
  71+ A64E C9               ret
  72+ A64F              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ A64F              ;--	push	bc
  74+ A64F              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ A64F              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ A64F              ;--	sub		b
  77+ A64F              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ A64F              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ A64F              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ A64F              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ A64F              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ A64F              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ A64F              ;--	ret
  84+ A64F
  85+ A64F              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ A64F              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ A64F              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ A64F              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ A64F              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ A64F              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ A64F              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ A64F              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ A64F              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ A64F              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ A64F              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ A64F              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ A64F              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ A64F              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ A64F              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ A64F              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ A64F              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ A64F              ;;;;	ret
 109+ A64F              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ A64F              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ A64F              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ A64F              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ A64F              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ A64F              ;;;;	ret
 117+ A64F              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ A64F              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ A64F              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ A64F              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ A64F              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ A64F              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ A64F              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ A64F              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ A64F              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ A64F              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ A64F              ;;;;	ret
 134+ A64F              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ A64F              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ A64F              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ A64F              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ A64F              ;;;;	ret
 141+ A64F
 142+ A64F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
 753  A64F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ A64F              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ A64F              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ A64F              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ A64F
   5+ A64F
   6+ A64F              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ A64F 3A FB 91     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ A652 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ A653              moveship4breg:
  10+ A653              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ A653              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ A653              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ A653 3A 8A 92     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ A656 32 CC 92     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ A659 21 0D C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ A65C 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ A65D ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ A65F 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ A660 32 CD 92     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ A663 23           		inc		hl
  21+ A664 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ A665 32 CE 92     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ A668 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ A669 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ A66A 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ A66B 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ A66C 32 71 92     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ A66F 23           		inc		hl
  29+ A670 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ A671 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ A673 CD 94 9F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ A676 23                   inc     hl
  33+ A677 23                   inc     hl
  34+ A678 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ A679 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ A67A 3A FA 91             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ A67D 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ A67E 32 71 92             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ A681 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ A682 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ A683 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ A684 32 CD 92             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ A687 23                   inc     hl
  44+ A688 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ A689 32 CE 92             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ A68C 23                   inc     hl
  47+ A68D 23                   inc     hl
  48+ A68E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ A68F CD 94 9F             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ A692 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ A693 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ A694 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ A695 3A FA 91             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ A698 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ A699 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ A69A 32 71 92             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ A69D 3A 7C 92             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ A6A0 32 CC 92             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ A6A3 23                   inc     hl
  60+ A6A4 23                   inc     hl
  61+ A6A5 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ A6A6 32 CD 92             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ A6A9 23                   inc     hl
  64+ A6AA 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ A6AB 32 CE 92             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ A6AE 23                   inc     hl
  67+ A6AF 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ A6B0 32 71 92             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ A6B3 23                   inc     hl
  70+ A6B4 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ A6B5 EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ A6B7 CD 94 9F             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ A6BA 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ A6BB 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ A6BC 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ A6BD 3A FA 91             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ A6C0 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ A6C1 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ A6C2 32 71 92             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ A6C5 23                   inc     hl
  81+ A6C6 23                   inc     hl
  82+ A6C7 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ A6C8 32 CD 92             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ A6CB 23                   inc     hl
  85+ A6CC 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ A6CD 32 CE 92             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ A6D0 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ A6D1 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ A6D2 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ A6D3 CD 94 9F             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ A6D6 23                   inc     hl
  92+ A6D7 23                   inc     hl
  93+ A6D8 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+5,Y \ hi
  94+ A6D9 3A FA 91             ld      a,(regX)
  95+ A6DC 2B                   dec     hl
  96+ A6DD 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+4,Y \ Z=Z+bY   \ their comment
  97+ A6DE C9                   ret
  98+ A6DF
  99+ A6DF
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
 754  A6DF              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
 755  A6DF              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
 756  A6DF              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
 757  A6DF              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
 758  A6DF                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ A6DF              ;;;LL28:
   2+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ A6DF              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ A6DF              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ A6DF              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ A6DF              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ A6DF              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ A6DF              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ A6DF              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ A6DF              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ A6DF              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ A6DF              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ A6DF              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ A6DF              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ A6DF              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ A6DF              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ A6DF              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ A6DF              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ A6DF              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ A6DF              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ A6DF              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ A6DF              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ A6DF              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ A6DF              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ A6DF              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ A6DF              ;;;	ret
  34+ A6DF              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ A6DF              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ A6DF              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ A6DF              ;;;	ret
  39+ A6DF
  40+ A6DF              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ A6DF 59             ld    e,c
  42+ A6E0 67             ld    h,a
  43+ A6E1 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ A6E3              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ A6E3 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ A6E4 B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ A6E5 C8             ret z
  48+ A6E6 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ A6E9 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ A6EB              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ A6EB ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ A6ED 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ A6EE 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ A6F0 C9             ret
  55+ A6F1
  56+ A6F1              HL_Div_C:
  57+ A6F1              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ A6F1              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ A6F1              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ A6F1 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ A6F3 AF                   xor a
  62+ A6F4              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ A6F4 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ A6F5 17                   rla
  65+ A6F6 B9                   cp c
  66+ A6F7 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ A6F9 91                   sub c
  68+ A6FA 2C                   inc l
  69+ A6FB              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ A6FB 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ A6FD 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ A6FE 32 CD 92             ld  (varR),a
  73+ A701 C9                   ret
  74+ A702
  75+ A702
  76+ A702
  77+ A702              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ A702              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ A702              BFRDIV:
  80+ A702 F5           		push	af
  81+ A703 3A CC 92     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ A706 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ A707 F1           		pop		af
  84+ A708 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ A70A CA 21 A7     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ A70D              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ A70D 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ A70F 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ A710              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ A710 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ A712 AF           		xor a
  92+ A713              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ A713 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ A714 17           		rla
  95+ A715 B9           		cp c
  96+ A716 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ A718 2C           		inc l
  98+ A719 91           		sub c
  99+ A71A              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ A71A 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ A71C 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ A71D 32 CD 92     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ A720 C9           		ret
 104+ A721              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ A721 32 CD 92     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ A724 C9           		ret
 107+ A725              ;	push	af
 108+ A725              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ A725              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ A725              ;	pop		af
 111+ A725              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ A725              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ A725              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ A725              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ A725              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ A725              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ A725              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ A725              ;	sla		a
 119+ A725              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ A725              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ A725              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ A725              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ A725              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ A725              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ A725              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ A725              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ A725              ;	scf
 128+ A725              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ A725              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ A725              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ A725              ;LL2:
 132+ A725              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ A725              ;LL2Good:
 134+ A725              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ A725              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ A725              ;	ret
 137+ A725
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 759  A725                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ A725              RequAdivQ:
   2+ A725              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ A725              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ A725 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ A726 3A CC 92     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ A729 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ A72B 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ A72D 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ A72E 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ A730 AF               xor a
  11+ A731              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ A731 CB 21            sla c
  13+ A733 17               rla
  14+ A734 BA               cp d
  15+ A735 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ A737 0C               inc c
  17+ A738 92               sub d
  18+ A739              LL64:
  19+ A739 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ A73B 32 CB 92     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ A73E 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ A73F 32 CD 92     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ A742 C9               ret
  24+ A743              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ A743 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ A745 32 CD 92     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ A748 32 CB 92     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ A74B C9           	ret
  29+ A74C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

   5+ A74F 08           	ex 	af,af'
   6+ A750 7A           	ld	a,d
   7+ A751 32 CE 92     	ld	(varS),a
   8+ A754 7B           	ld	a,e
   9+ A755 32 CD 92     	ld	(varR),a
  10+ A758 08           	ex 	af,af'

  32+ A7CC
  33+ A7CC              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ A7CC              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ A7CC              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ A7CC 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ A7CD 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ A7CE 32 CC 92     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ A7D1 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ A7D2 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ A7D4 CD 94 9F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ A7D7              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ A7D7              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ A7D7              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ A7D7 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ A7D8 E6 80        		and		$80							; ..
  47+ A7DA 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ A7DB 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ A7DC E6 7F        		and		$7F							; ..
  50+ A7DE 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ A7E0              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ A7E0 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ A7E2              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ A7E2 FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ A7E4 DA F1 A7    >                        jp		c,TIS1SkipSub
  54+ A7E7 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ A7E9 37           		scf
  56+ A7EA CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ A7EC 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ A7EE              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ A7EE 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ A7EF B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ A7F0 C9           		ret
  62+ A7F1              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ A7F1 B7           	or			a
  64+ A7F2 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ A7F4 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ A7F6 C3 EE A7     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ A7F9
  68+ A7F9              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ A7F9              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ A7F9
  71+ A7F9
  72+ A7F9
  73+ A7F9
  74+ A7F9              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ A7F9 CD 25 A9     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ A7FC 32 1F C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ A7FF C3 33 A8     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ A802
  79+ A802              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ A802 AF           		xor		a
  81+ A803 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ A804 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ A807 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ A809 CA F9 A7     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ A80C 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ A80F 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ A810 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ A813 CD EB A8     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ A816 32 1D C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ A819 C3 33 A8     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ A81C              TIDY:
  92+ A81C              ORTHOGALISE:
  93+ A81C              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  94+ A81C CD 5A A7     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  95+ A81F CD 4B A3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi
  96+ A822 CD 93 A7     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  97+ A825              .CheckNXSmall:
  98+ A825 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  99+ A828 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 100+ A82A CA 02 A8     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 101+ A82D              .RotXIsBig:
 102+ A82D CD B1 A8             call	CalcRoofvX
 103+ A830 32 1B C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 104+ A833              NormaliseRoofV:
 105+ A833 CD 6D A7     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 106+ A836 CD 4B A3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 107+ A839              ;calc sidev x
 108+ A839 CD A6 A7     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 109+ A83C 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 110+ A83F 32 CC 92     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 111+ A842 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 112+ A845 CD 4C A7     		call	RSequQmulA
 113+ A848 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 114+ A84B 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 115+ A84C 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 116+ A84F CD CC A7     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 117+ A852                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideXNoNeg
 117+ A852 FE 00       >				cp	0
 117+ A854 CA 59 A8    >				jp	z,NormSideXNoNeg
 118+ A857 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 119+ A859              NormSideXNoNeg:
 120+ A859 32 15 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 121+ A85C              ;calc sidev y
 122+ A85C 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 123+ A85F 32 CC 92     		ld		(varQ),a
 124+ A862 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 125+ A865 CD 4C A7     		call	RSequQmulA
 126+ A868 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 127+ A86B 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 128+ A86C 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 129+ A86F CD CC A7     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 130+ A872                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideYNoNeg
 130+ A872 FE 00       >				cp	0
 130+ A874 CA 79 A8    >				jp	z,NormSideYNoNeg
 131+ A877 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 132+ A879              NormSideYNoNeg:
 133+ A879 32 23 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 134+ A87C              ;calc sidev z
 135+ A87C 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 136+ A87F 32 CC 92     		ld		(varQ),a
 137+ A882 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 138+ A885 CD 4C A7     		call	RSequQmulA
 139+ A888 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 140+ A88B 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 141+ A88C 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 142+ A88F CD CC A7     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 143+ A892                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideZNoNeg
 143+ A892 FE 00       >				cp	0
 143+ A894 CA 99 A8    >				jp	z,NormSideZNoNeg
 144+ A897 EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 145+ A899              NormSideZNoNeg:
 146+ A899 32 17 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 147+ A89C              .ClearLoBytes:
 148+ A89C 21 20 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 149+ A89F 06 09        		ld		b,9
 150+ A8A1 AF                   xor     a
 151+ A8A2              .ClearLoLoop:
 152+ A8A2 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 153+ A8A3 23           		inc		hl
 154+ A8A4 23           		inc		hl
 155+ A8A5 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 156+ A8A7 CD 80 A7     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 157+ A8AA CD 4B A3     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 158+ A8AD              ;calc sidev x
 159+ A8AD CD B9 A7     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 160+ A8B0
 161+ A8B0 C9           		ret
 162+ A8B1
 163+ A8B1
 164+ A8B1
 165+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 166+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 167+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 168+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 169+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 170+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 171+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 172+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 173+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 174+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 175+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 176+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 177+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 178+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 179+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 180+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 181+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 182+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 183+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 184+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 185+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 186+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 187+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 188+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 189+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 190+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 191+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 192+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 193+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 194+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 195+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 196+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 197+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 198+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 199+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 200+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 201+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 202+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 203+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 204+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 205+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 206+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 207+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 208+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 209+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 210+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 211+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 212+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 213+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 214+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 215+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 216+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 217+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 218+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 219+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 220+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 221+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 222+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 223+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 224+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 225+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 226+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 227+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 228+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 229+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 230+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 231+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 232+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 233+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 234+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 235+ A8B1              ;;;;;;;;
 236+ A8B1
 237+ A8B1
 238+ A8B1              CalcRoofvX:
 239+ A8B1              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 240+ A8B1              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 240+ A8B1 3A 25 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 240+ A8B4 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 241+ A8B7 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 242+ A8BA CD 4C A7     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 243+ A8BD              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 243+ A8BD 3A 23 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 243+ A8C0 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 244+ A8C3 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 245+ A8C6 CD 94 9F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 246+ A8C9 7A           		ld		a,d
 247+ A8CA E6 80        		and 	$80
 248+ A8CC FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 249+ A8CE              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 250+ A8CE 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 251+ A8D1 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 252+ A8D2 E6 80        		and		$80
 253+ A8D4 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 254+ A8D6 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 255+ A8D8 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 256+ A8D9 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 257+ A8DB 42           		ld		b,d
 258+ A8DC 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 259+ A8DD 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 260+ A8DE 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 261+ A8E0 CD CD A1     		call	BC_Div_DE
 262+ A8E3 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 263+ A8E5 EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 264+ A8E7 E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 265+ A8E9 B0           		or		b
 266+ A8EA C9           		ret
 267+ A8EB
 268+ A8EB
 269+ A8EB              CalcRoofvY:
 270+ A8EB              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 271+ A8EB              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 271+ A8EB 3A 25 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 271+ A8EE 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 272+ A8F1 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 273+ A8F4 CD 4C A7     		call	RSequQmulA
 274+ A8F7              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 274+ A8F7 3A 21 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 274+ A8FA 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 275+ A8FD 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 276+ A900 CD 94 9F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 277+ A903 7A           		ld		a,d
 278+ A904 E6 80        		and 	$80
 279+ A906 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 280+ A908 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 281+ A90B 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 282+ A90C E6 80        		and		$80
 283+ A90E FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 284+ A910 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 285+ A912 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 286+ A913 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 287+ A915 42           		ld		b,d
 288+ A916 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 289+ A917 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 290+ A918 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 291+ A91A CD CD A1     		call	BC_Div_DE
 292+ A91D FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 293+ A91F EE 80        		xor		$80
 294+ A921 E6 80        		and		$80
 295+ A923 B0           		or		b
 296+ A924 C9           		ret
 297+ A925
 298+ A925              CalcRoofvZ:
 299+ A925              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 300+ A925              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 300+ A925 3A 23 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 300+ A928 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 301+ A92B 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 302+ A92E CD 4C A7     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 303+ A931              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 303+ A931 3A 21 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 303+ A934 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 304+ A937 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 305+ A93A CD 94 9F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 306+ A93D 7A           		ld		a,d
 307+ A93E E6 80        		and 	$80
 308+ A940 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 309+ A942 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 310+ A945 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 311+ A946 E6 80        		and		$80
 312+ A948 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 313+ A94A FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 314+ A94C 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 315+ A94D E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 316+ A94F 42           		ld		b,d
 317+ A950 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 318+ A951 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 319+ A952 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 320+ A954 CD CD A1     		call	BC_Div_DE
 321+ A957 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 322+ A959 EE 80        		xor		$80
 323+ A95B E6 80        		and		$80
 324+ A95D B0           		or		b
 325+ A95E C9           		ret
 326+ A95F
 327+ A95F
 328+ A95F
 329+ A95F              ;;ProcessSidev:
 330+ A95F              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 331+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 332+ A95F              ;;		push	bc
 333+ A95F              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 334+ A95F              ;;		pop		bc
 335+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 336+ A95F              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 337+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 338+ A95F              ;;		push	bc
 339+ A95F              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 340+ A95F              ;;		pop		bc
 341+ A95F              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 342+ A95F              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 343+ A95F              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 344+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 345+ A95F              ;;		push	bc
 346+ A95F              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 347+ A95F              ;;		pop		bc
 348+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 349+ A95F              ;;		ld		b,a
 350+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 351+ A95F              ;;		push	bc
 352+ A95F              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 353+ A95F              ;;		pop		bc
 354+ A95F              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 355+ A95F              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 356+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 357+ A95F              ;;		push	bc
 358+ A95F              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 359+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 360+ A95F              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 361+ A95F              ;;		pop		bc
 362+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 363+ A95F              ;;		ld		b,a
 364+ A95F              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 365+ A95F              ;;		push	bc
 366+ A95F              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 367+ A95F              ;;		pop		bc
 368+ A95F              ;;		xor		$80
 369+ A95F              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 370+ A95F              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 371+ A95F              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 372+ A95F              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 373+ A95F              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 374+ A95F
 375+ A95F
 376+ A95F
 377+ A95F
 378+ A95F
 379+ A95F
 380+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 381+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 382+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 383+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 384+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 385+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 386+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 387+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 388+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 389+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 390+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 391+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 392+ A95F              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 393+ A95F
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
 764  A95F                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ A95F
   2+ A95F              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ A95F BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A960 D2 7E A9    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ A963 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ A965 CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ A967 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ A969                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ A969 BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ A96A DA 6F A9    >                        jp		c,.SkipSub
   7+ A96D 92                                   sub     d
   8+ A96E                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ A96E B7          >				or a
   9+ A96F 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ A970 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ A972 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ A974 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ A975 C9                                   ret
  14+ A976 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ A977 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ A978 CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ A97A 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ A97C 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ A97D C9                                   ret
  20+ A97E 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ A980 C9                                   ret
  22+ A981
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 765  A981                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ A981              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ A981              TIS1:
   3+ A981 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ A982 3A FA 91     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ A985 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ A986 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ A987              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ A987 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ A988 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ A989 32 CC 92     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ A98C 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ A98D EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ A98F CD 94 9F     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ A992              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ A992              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ A992              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ A992 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ A993 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ A995 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ A996 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ A997 E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ A999 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ A99B 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ A99C              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ A99C CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ A99E FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ A9A0 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ A9A2 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ A9A4              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ A9A4 CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ A9A6 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ A9A8 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ A9A9 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ A9AA C9           		ret
  35+ A9AB
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
