 935  C000                  INCLUDE "./Universe/univ_ship_data.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/univ_ship_data.asm
   1+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   2+ C000              ; In  flight ship data tables
   3+ C000              ; There can be upto &12 objects in flight.
   4+ C000              ; To avoid hassle of memory heap managment, the free list
   5+ C000              ; will correspond to a memory bank offset so data will be held in
   6+ C000              ; 1 bank per universe object. Its a waste of a lot of memory but really
   7+ C000              ; simple that way. Each bank will be 8K and swapped on 8K slot 7 $E000 to $FFFF
   8+ C000              ; This means each gets its own line list, inwork etc
   9+ C000
  10+ C000              ; "Runtime Ship Data paged into in Bank 7"
  11+ C000 55 6E 69 76  StartOfUniv:        DB "Universe PG"
  11+ C004 65 72 73 65
  11+ C008 20 50 47
  12+ C00B              ; NOTE we can cheat and pre allocate segs just using a DS for now
  13+ C00B
  14+ C00B              ;   \ -> & 565D \ See ship data files chosen and loaded after flight code starts running.
  15+ C00B              ; Universe map substibute for INWK
  16+ C00B              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  17+ C00B                                      INCLUDE "./Variables/ShipPosVars.asm"
# file opened: ././Variables/ShipPosVars.asm
   1++C00B              ;-Camera Position of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C00B 00           UBnKxlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+0
   3++C00C 00           UBnKxhi                     DB  0                       ; there are hi medium low as some times these are 24 bit
   4++C00D 00           UBnKxsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK+2
   5++C00E 00           UBnKylo                     DB  0                       ; INWK+3 \ ylo
   6++C00F 00           UbnKyhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK+4 \ yHi
   7++C010 00           UBnKysgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK +5
   8++C011 00           UBnKzlo                     DB  0                       ; INWK +6
   9++C012 00           UBnKzhi                     DB  0                       ; INWK +7
  10++C013 00           UBnKzsgn                    DB  0                       ; INWK +8
  11++C014
  12++C014              INWKxlo                     equ UBnKxlo
  13++C014              INWKxhi                     equ UBnKxhi                 ; there are hi medium low as some times these are 24 bit
  14++C014              INWKxsgn                    equ UBnKzsgn                ; INWK+2
  15++C014              INWKyLo                     equ UBnKylo                 ; INWK+3 \ ylo
  16++C014              INWKyhi                     equ UbnKyhi                 ; Y Hi???
  17++C014              INWKysgn                    equ UBnKysgn                ; INWK +5
  18++C014              INWKzlo                     equ UBnKzlo                 ; INWK +6
  19++C014              INWKzhi                     equ UBnKzhi                 ; INWK +7
  20++C014              INWKzsgn                    equ UBnKzsgn                ; INWK +8
# file closed: ././Variables/ShipPosVars.asm
  18+ C014                                      INCLUDE "./Variables/RotationMatrixVars.asm"
# file opened: ././Variables/RotationMatrixVars.asm
   1++C014              ;-Rotation Matrix of Ship----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2++C014              ; Rotation data is stored as lohi, but only 15 bits with 16th bit being  a sign bit. Note this is NOT 2'c compliment
   3++C014 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevX            DW  0                       ; INWK +21
   4++C016              UBnkrotmatSidev             equ UBnkrotmatSidevX
   5++C016 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevY            DW  0                       ; INWK +23
   6++C018 00 00        UBnkrotmatSidevZ            DW  0                       ; INWK +25

  19+ C026
  20+ C026 00           UBnkspeed                   DB  0                       ; INWK +27
  21+ C027 00           UBnkAccel                   DB  0                       ; INWK +28
  22+ C028 00           UBnkrotXCounter             DB  0                       ; INWK +29
  23+ C029 00           UBnkrotZCounter             DB  0                       ; INWK +30
  24+ C02A 00           UBnkexplDsp                 DB  0                       ; INWK +31 clear exploding/display state|missiles
  25+ C02B              ; Flags work as follows:
  26+ C02B              ; 7 - Flag ship to be killed with debris
  27+ C02B              ; 6 - Invisible/Erase (also mentions Laser Firing?)
  28+ C02B              ; 5 - Ship is exploding if set
  29+ C02B              ; 4 -
  30+ C02B              ; 3 - Display state - Plot as a Dot
  31+ C02B              ; 2 - Nbr of Missiles bit 2
  32+ C02B              ; 1 - Nbr of Missiles bit 1
  33+ C02B              ; 0 - Nbr of Missiles bit 0
  34+ C02B 00           UBnkaiatkecm                DB  0                       ; INWK +32 ai_attack_univ_ecm i.e. AI type
  35+ C02C 00           UBnkCam0yLo                 DB  0                       ; INWK +33 ????
  36+ C02D 00           UBnkCam0yHi                 DB  0                       ; INWK +34?????
  37+ C02E 00           UbnKEnergy                  DB  0                       ; INWK +35
  38+ C02F 00           UbnkType                    DB  0                       ; Type 0 Sun, 1 debris, 2 space station, 4 cargo, 8 anthing else
  39+ C030 00           UbnKNewb                    DB  0                       ; INWK +36 INWK+36
  40+ C031              ; Flags work as follows:
  41+ C031              ;Bit	Description
  42+ C031              ;#0	Trader flag         * 0 = not a trader  * 1 = trader
  43+ C031              ;                       80% of traders are peaceful and mind their own business plying their trade between the planet and space station, but 20% of them moonlight as bounty hunters (see bit #1)
  44+ C031              ;                       Ships that are traders: Escape pod, Shuttle, Transporter, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Worm
  45+ C031              ;#1 Bounty hunter flag  * 0 = not a bounty hunter* 1 = bounty hunter
  46+ C031              ;                       If we are a fugitive or a serious offender and we bump into a bounty hunter, they will become hostile and attack us (see bit #2)
  47+ C031              ;                       Ships that are bounty hunters: Viper, Fer-de-lance
  48+ C031              ;#2	Hostile flag        * 0 = not hostile  * 1 = hostile
  49+ C031              ;                       Hostile ships will attack us on sight; there are quite a few of them
  50+ C031              ;                       Ships that are hostile: Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Gecko, Cobra Mk I, Worm, Cobra Mk III, Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Moray, Thargoid, Thargon, Constrictor
  51+ C031              ;#3	Pirate flag         * 0 = not a pirate * 1 = pirate
  52+ C031              ;                       Hostile pirates will attack us on sight, but once we get inside the space station safe zone, they will stop
  53+ C031              ;                       Ships that are pirates: Sidewinder, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Gecko, Cobra Mk I, Cobra Mk III, Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Moray, Thargoid
  54+ C031              ;#4	Docking flag        * 0 = not docking * 1 = docking
  55+ C031              ;                       Traders with their docking flag set fly towards the space station to try to dock, otherwise they aim for the planet
  56+ C031              ;                       This flag is randomly set for traders when they are spawned
  57+ C031              ;                       Ships that can be docking: Escape pod, Shuttle, Transporter, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Worm
  58+ C031              ;#5	Innocent bystander  * 0 = normal * 1 = innocent bystander
  59+ C031              ;                       If we attack an innocent ship within the space station safe zone, then the station will get angry with us and start spawning cops
  60+ C031              ;                       Ships that are innocent bystanders: Shuttle, Transporter, Cobra Mk III, Python, Boa, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Cougar
  61+ C031              ;#6	Cop flag            * 0 = not a cop * 1 = cop
  62+ C031              ;                       If we destroy a cop, then we instantly become a fugitive (the Transporter isn't actually a cop, but it's clearly under police protection)
  63+ C031              ;                       Ships that are cops: Viper, Transporter
  64+ C031              ;#7	Scooped, docked, escape pod flag
  65+ C031              ;                       For spawned ships, this flag indicates that the ship been scooped or has docked (bit 7 is always clear on spawning)
  66+ C031              ;                       For blueprints, this flag indicates whether the ship type has an escape pod fitted, so it can launch it when in dire straits
  67+ C031              ;                       Ships that have escape pods: Cobra Mk III, Python, Boa, Anaconda, Rock hermit, Viper, Mamba, Krait, Adder, Cobra Mk I, Cobra Mk III (pirate), Asp Mk II, Python (pirate), Fer-de-lance
  68+ C031
  69+ C031
  70+ C031              ; Orientation Matrix [nosev x y z ] nose vector ( forward) 19 to 26
  71+ C031              ;                    [roofv x y z ] roof vector (up)
  72+ C031              ;                    [sidev x y z ] side vector (right)
  73+ C031              INWKspeed                   equ UBnkspeed               ; INWK +27UBnkTransmat2zLo  DB  0               ; XX16+16
  74+ C031              INWKAccel                   equ UBnkAccel               ; INWK +28          UBnkTransmat2zHi    DB  0               ; XX16+17
  75+ C031              rotXCounter                 equ UBnkrotXCounter         ; INWK +29
  76+ C031              rotZCounter                 equ UBnkrotZCounter         ; INWK +30UBnkDrawCam0xLo   DB  0               ; XX18+0
  77+ C031              explDsp                     equ UBnkexplDsp             ; INWK +31 clear exploding/display state|missiles UBnkDrawCam0xHi   DB  0               ; XX18+1
  78+ C031              aiatkecm                    equ UBnkaiatkecm            ; INWK +32 ai_attack_univ_ecm i.e. AI typeUBnkDrawCam0xSgn      DB  0               ; XX18+2
  79+ C031              INWKDrawCam0yLo             equ UBnkDrawCam0yLo         ; INWK +33UBnkDrawCam0yLo   DB  0               ; XX18+3
  80+ C031              INWKDrawCam0yHi             equ UBnkDrawCam0yHi         ; INWK +34UBnkDrawCam0yHi   DB  0               ; XX18+4
  81+ C031              INWKEnergy                  equ UbnKEnergy              ; INWK +35UBnkDrawCam0ySgn      DB  0               ; XX18+5
  82+ C031              ;UBnkDrawCam0ySgn    equ UbnKEnergy              ; Reycles but not a good idea TODO
  83+ C031              INWKNewb                    equ UbnKNewb                ; INWK +36 INWK+36 \ NEWB bit 7 remove ship?UBnkDrawCam0zLo     DB  0               ; XX18+6
  84+ C031                                      INCLUDE "./Variables/XX16Vars.asm"

 105+ C0A1 00           VarBackface                 DB 0
 106+ C0A2              ; Heap (or array) information for lines and normals
 107+ C0A2              ; Coords are stored XY,XY,XY,XY
 108+ C0A2              ; Normals
 109+ C0A2              ; This needs re-oprganising now.
 110+ C0A2              ; Runtime Calculation Store
 111+ C0A2
 112+ C0A2              FaceArraySize               equ 30
 113+ C0A2              EdgeHeapSize                equ 40
 114+ C0A2              NodeArraySize               equ 40
 115+ C0A2              LineArraySize               equ 50
 116+ C0A2              ; Storage arrays for data
 117+ C0A2              ; Structure of arrays
 118+ C0A2              ; Visibility array  - 1 Byte per face/normal on ship model Bit 7 (or FF) visible, 0 Invisible
 119+ C0A2              ; Node array corresponds to a processed vertex from the ship model transformed into world coordinates and tracks the node list from model
 120+ C0A2              ; NodeArray         -  4 bytes per element      0           1            2          3
 121+ C0A2              ;                                               X Coord Lo  Y Coord Lo   Z CoordLo  Sign Bits 7 6 5 for X Y Z Signs (set = negative)
 122+ C0A2              ; Line Array        -  4 bytes per eleement     0           1            2          3
 123+ C0A2              ;                                               X1          Y1           X2         Y2
 124+ C0A2 00 00 00...  UbnkFaceVisArray            DS FaceArraySize            ; XX2 Up to 16 faces this may be normal list, each entry is controlled by bit 7, 1 visible, 0 hidden
 125+ C0C0 00 00 00...  UBnkNodeArray               DS NodeArraySize * 4        ; XX3 Holds the points as an array, its an array not a heap
 126+ C160 00 00 00...  UBnkNodeArray2              DS NodeArraySize * 4        ; XX3 Holds the points as an array, its an array not a heap
 127+ C200 00 00 00...  UbnkLineArray               DS LineArraySize * 4        ; XX19 Holds the clipped line details
 128+ C2C8              UBnkLinesHeapMax            EQU $ - UbnkLineArray
 129+ C2C8 00 00 00...  UbnkEdgeProcessedList DS EdgeHeapSize
 130+ C2F0              ; Array current Lengths
 131+ C2F0 00           UbnkFaceVisArrayLen         DS 1
 132+ C2F1 00           UBnkNodeArrayLen            DS 1
 133+ C2F2 00           UbnkLineArrayLen            DS 1                        ; total number of lines loaded to array
 134+ C2F3 00           UbnkLineArrayBytes          DS 1                        ; total number of bytes loaded to array  = array len * 4
 135+ C2F4              XX20                        equ UbnkLineArrayLen
 136+ C2F4              varXX20                     equ UbnkLineArrayLen
 137+ C2F4
 138+ C2F4
 139+ C2F4 00           UbnkEdgeHeapSize            DS 1
 140+ C2F5 00           UbnkEdgeHeapBytes           DS 1

 199+ CA24 4F                                   ld      c,a

 203+ CA26 21 00 C0     ResetUBnkData:          ld      hl,StartOfUniv
 204+ CA29 11 20 0A                             ld      de,UBnk_Data_len
 205+ CA2C AF                                   xor     a
 206+ CA2D CD D7 8E                             call    memfill_dma
 207+ CA30 C9                                   ret
 208+ CA31
 209+ CA31              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
 210+ CA31              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 211+ CA31              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 212+ CA31 47           PROJ256mulAdivQ:        ld      b,a
 213+ CA32 0E 00                                ld      c,0
 214+ CA34 16 00                                ld      d,0
 215+ CA36 3A CC 92                             ld      a,(varQ)
 216+ CA39 5F                                   ld      e,a
 217+ CA3A 21 00 00     PROJDIV16UNDOC:         ld      hl,0
 218+ CA3D 78                                   ld      a,b
 219+ CA3E 06 10                                ld      b,16
 220+ CA40 CB 31        PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP:     sll     c       ; unroll 16 times
 221+ CA42 17                                   rla             ; ...
 222+ CA43 ED 6A                                adc     hl,hl       ; ...
 223+ CA45 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de       ; ...
 224+ CA47 30 02                                jr      nc,PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP       ; ...
 225+ CA49 19                                   add     hl,de       ; ...
 226+ CA4A 0D                                   dec     c       ; ...
 227+ CA4B 10 F3        PROJDIV16UNDOCSKIP:     djnz    PROJDIV16UNDOCLOOP
 228+ CA4D 79                                   ld      a,c
 229+ CA4E 32 CD 92                             ld      (varR),a
 230+ CA51 C9                                   ret
 231+ CA52              ;
 232+ CA52                  ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
 233+ CA52              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
 234+ CA52
 235+ CA52              ;INPUTS:    bhl = dividend  cde = divisor where b and c are sign bytes
 236+ CA52              ;OUTPUTS:   cahl = quotient cde = divisor
 237+ CA52 32 73 92     DVID3B2:                ld      (varPhi2),a                     ;DVID3B2 \ Divide 3 bytes by 2, K = [P(HiLo).A]/[INWK_z HiLo], for planet radius, Xreg protected. ; P+2    \ num sg
 238+ CA55                                      ldCopy2Byte UBnKzlo, varQ               ; [QR} = Ubnk zlohi  (i.e. Inwk_z HiLo)
 238+ CA55 2A 11 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnKzlo)
 238+ CA58 22 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),hl
 239+ CA5B 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                    ;
 240+ CA5E 32 CE 92                             ld      (varS),a                        ; S = inkw z sign
 241+ CA61 ED 5B 71 92  DVID3B:                 ld      de,(varP)                       ; K (3bytes)=P(Lo Hi Hi2)/S.R.Q approx  Acc equiv K(0).; get P and P+1 into de
 242+ CA65 7B                                   ld      a,e                             ; num lo
 243+ CA66 F6 01                                or      1                               ; must be at least 1
 244+ CA68 32 71 92                             ld      (varP),a                        ; store
 245+ CA6B 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; update DE too
 246+ CA6C 3A 73 92                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; varP Sign     E.D.A = P Lo Hi Hi2
 247+ CA6F 21 CE 92                             ld      hl,varS                         ; hl = address of VarS
 248+ CA72 AE                                   xor     (hl)                            ; A = PHi2 Xor S Signs
 249+ CA73 E6 80                                and     $80                             ;
 250+ CA75 32 EC 92                             ld      (varT),a                        ; T = Sign bit of A
 251+ CA78 FD 2E 00                             ld      iyl,0                           ; iyl = yReg = counter
 252+ CA7B 3A 73 92                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ;
 253+ CA7E E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; A = Ph2 again but minus sign bit
 254+ CA80              DVL9:                   JumpIfAGTENusng $40,DV14                ; counter Y up; if object is over $40 away then scaled and exit Y count
 254+ CA80 FE 40       >                        cp     $40
 254+ CA82 D2 90 CA    >                        jp		nc,DV14
 255+ CA85                                      ShiftDELeft1                            ; de (or P,P1) > 1
 255+ CA85 CB 23       >			   sla e
 255+ CA87 CB 12       >			   rl  d
 256+ CA89 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; and accumulator as 3rd byte
 257+ CA8B FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 258+ CA8D C2 80 CA                             jp      nz,DVL9                         ; loop again with a max of 256 iterations
 259+ CA90 32 73 92     DV14:                   ld      (varPhi2),a                     ; scaled, exited Ycount
 260+ CA93 ED 53 71 92                          ld      (varP),de                       ; store off the value so far
 261+ CA97 3A CE 92                             ld      a,(varS)                        ; zsign
 262+ CA9A E6 7F                                and     $7F                             ; denom sg7
 263+ CA9C                                      ; jp mi,DV9                             ; this can never happen as bit 7 is and'ed out
 264+ CA9C 2A CC 92                             ld      hl,(varQ)                       ; demon lo
 265+ CA9F FD 2D        DVL6:                   dec     iyl                             ; counter Y back down, roll S. ;  scale Y back
 266+ CAA1                                      ShiftHLLeft1
 266+ CAA1 CB 25       >			   sla l
 266+ CAA3 CB 14       >			   rl  h
 267+ CAA5 CB 17                                rl      a                               ; mulitply QRS by 2
 268+ CAA7 F2 9F CA                             jp      p,DVL6                          ; loop roll S until Abit7 set.
 269+ CAAA 22 CC 92     DV9:                    ld      (varQ),hl                       ; bmi cant enter here from above ; save off so far
 270+ CAAD 32 CC 92                             ld      (varQ),a                        ; Q \ mostly empty so now reuse as hi denom
 271+ CAB0 3E FE                                ld      a,$FE                           ;  Xreg protected so can't LL28+4
 272+ CAB2 32 CD 92                             ld      (varR),a                        ;  R
 273+ CAB5 3A 73 92                             ld      a,(varPhi2)                     ; P+2 \ big numerator
 274+ CAB8 CD 31 CA                             call    PROJ256mulAdivQ                 ; TODO LL31\ R now =A*256/Q
 275+ CABB 3E 00                                ld      a,0
 276+ CABD 32 E4 92                             ld      (varKp1),a
 277+ CAC0 32 E5 92                             ld      (varKp2),a
 278+ CAC3 32 E6 92                             ld      (varKp3),a                      ; clear out K+1 to K+3
 279+ CAC6 FD 7D                                ld      a,iyl                           ; Y counter for scale
 280+ CAC8                                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,DV12                 ; Ycount +ve
 280+ CAC8 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 280+ CACA CA F5 CA    >                        jp      z,DV12
 281+ CACD 3A CD 92                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; R     \ else Y count is -ve, Acc = remainder.
 282+ CAD0 ED 5B E3 92                          ld      de,(varK)                       ; d= k1
 283+ CAD4 2A E7 92                             ld      hl,(varK2)                      ; h = k3, l = k2
 284+ CAD7 5F                                   ld      e,a                             ; use e to hold K0 pulled from a
 285+ CAD8 CB 27        DVL8:                   sla     a                               ; boost up a                     ;  counter Y up
 286+ CADA CB 12                                rl      d                               ; k1
 287+ CADC CB 15                                rl      l                               ; k2
 288+ CADE CB 14                                rl      h                               ; k3
 289+ CAE0 FD 2C                                inc     iyl
 290+ CAE2 20 F4                                jr      nz,DVL8                         ;
 291+ CAE4 ED 53 E3 92  DVL8Save:               ld      (varK),de
 292+ CAE8 22 E7 92                             ld      (varK2),hl                      ; save back K0 to k3
 293+ CAEB 3A EC 92                             ld      a,(varT)
 294+ CAEE 4F                                   ld      c,a                             ; get varT into c reg
 295+ CAEF 7C                                   ld      a,h                             ; a= k3 (sign)
 296+ CAF0 B1                                   or      c                               ; merge in varT (sign)that was saved much earlier up)
 297+ CAF1 32 ED 92                             ld      (varK3),a                       ; load sign bit back into K3
 298+ CAF4 C9                                   ret
 299+ CAF5              DV12:                   IfAIsZeroGoto   DV13                    ; Y Count zerp, go to DV13
 299+ CAF5 FE 00       >				cp	0
 299+ CAF7 CA 0E CB    >				jp	z,DV13
 300+ CAFA 3A CD 92                             ld      a,(varR)                        ; Reduce Remainder
 301+ CAFD CB 3F        DVL10:                  srl     a                               ; divide by 2                     ; counter Y reduce
 302+ CAFF FD 2D                                dec     iyl
 303+ CB01 C2 FD CA                             jp      nz,DVL10                        ; loop y reduce until y is zero
 304+ CB04 32 E3 92                             ld      (varK),a                        ; k Lo
 305+ CB07                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 305+ CB07 3A EC 92    >               ld       a,(varT)
 305+ CB0A 32 E6 92    >               ld       (varKp3),a
 306+ CB0D C9                                   ret
 307+ CB0E              DV13:                   ldCopyByte  varR,varK                   ; R \ already correct so copy to K lo;DV13   \ Ycount zero \ K(1to2) already = 0
 307+ CB0E 3A CD 92    >               ld       a,(varR)
 307+ CB11 32 E3 92    >               ld       (varK),a
 308+ CB14                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varKp3                 ; Copy sign to K+3
 308+ CB14 3A EC 92    >               ld       a,(varT)
 308+ CB17 32 E6 92    >               ld       (varKp3),a
 309+ CB1A C9                                   ret
 310+ CB1B
 311+ CB1B
 312+ CB1B CD 52 CA     PLS6:                   call    DVID3B2                         ; Returns AHL K ( 2 1 0 )
 313+ CB1E 3A E6 92                             ld      a,(varKp3)
 314+ CB21 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 315+ CB23 21 E5 92                             ld      hl,varKp2
 316+ CB26 B6                                   or      (hl)
 317+ CB27 C2 3C CB                             jp      nz,PL44TooBig
 318+ CB2A 3A E4 92                             ld      a,(varKp1)
 319+ CB2D FE 04                                cp      4                               ; if high byte > 4 then total > 1024 so too big
 320+ CB2F 30 0B                                jr      nc,PL44TooBig
 321+ CB31                                      ClearCarryFlag                          ; we have a good result regardless
 321+ CB31 B7          >				or a
 322+ CB32 2A E3 92                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; get K (0 1)
 323+ CB35 3A E6 92                             ld      a,(varKp3)                      ; if sign bit high?
 324+ CB38 CB 7F                                bit     7,a
 325+ CB3A C8                                   ret     z                               ; no so we can just return
 326+ CB3B C9           PL44:                   ret
 327+ CB3C 37           PL44TooBig:             scf
 328+ CB3D C9                                   ret
 329+ CB3E
 330+ CB3E                                      include "./Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
   1++CB3E              ;; calcs HLB + DEC where B and C are signs
   2++CB3E              ;; result HL with A as sign
   3++CB3E              ;; special handling if result is zero forcign sign bit to be zero
   4++CB3E 78           ADDHLDESignBC:          ld      a,b
   5++CB3F E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
   6++CB41 A9                                   xor     c                           ;if b sign and c sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
   7++CB42                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN     ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
   7++CB42 FA 50 CB    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN
   8++CB45 78           ADDHLDEsBCSameSigns:    ld      a,b
   9++CB46 B1                                   or      c
  10++CB47                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg        ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  10++CB47 FA 4C CB    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg
  11++CB4A 19                                   add     hl,de                       ; both positive so a will already be zero
  12++CB4B C9                                   ret
  13++CB4C 19           ADDHLDEsBCSameNeg:      add     hl,de
  14++CB4D 78                                   ld      a,b
  15++CB4E B1                                   or      c                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  16++CB4F C9                                   ret
  17++CB50 B7           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGN:       or      a
  18++CB51 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  19++CB53 38 02                                jr      c,ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert
  20++CB55 78           ADDHLDEsBCOppSGNNoCarry: ld      a,b                                               ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  21++CB56 C9                                   ret
  22++CB57              ADDHLDEsBCOppInvert:    NegHL                         ; if result was zero then set sign to zero (which doing h or l will give us for free)
  22++CB57 AF          >                xor a
  22++CB58 95          >                sub l
  22++CB59 6F          >                ld l,a
  22++CB5A 9F          >                sbc a,a
  22++CB5B 94          >                sub h
  22++CB5C 67          >                ld h,a
  23++CB5D 78                                   ld      a,b
  24++CB5E EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  25++CB60 C9                                   ret
  26++CB61
# file closed: ././Maths/ADDHLDESignBC.asm
 331+ CB61
 332+ CB61 7C           ADDHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 333+ CB62 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 334+ CB64 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 335+ CB65 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 336+ CB66                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 336+ CB66 FA 7E CB    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDEOppSGN
 337+ CB69 78           ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 338+ CB6A B2                                   or      d
 339+ CB6B                                      JumpIfNegative ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 339+ CB6B FA 70 CB    >                        jp		m, ADDHLDESameNeg
 340+ CB6E 19                                   add     hl,de
 341+ CB6F C9                                   ret
 342+ CB70 7C           ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 343+ CB71 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 344+ CB73 67                                   ld      h,a
 345+ CB74 7A                                   ld      a,d
 346+ CB75 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 347+ CB77 57                                   ld      d,a
 348+ CB78 19                                   add     hl,de
 349+ CB79 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 350+ CB7B B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 351+ CB7C 67                                   ld      h,a
 352+ CB7D C9                                   ret
 353+ CB7E 7C           ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
 354+ CB7F E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 355+ CB81 67                                   ld      h,a
 356+ CB82 7A                                   ld      a,d
 357+ CB83 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 358+ CB85 57                                   ld      d,a
 359+ CB86 B7                                   or      a
 360+ CB87 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 361+ CB89 38 04                                jr      c,ADDHLDEOppInvert
 362+ CB8B 78           ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 363+ CB8C B4                                   or      h
 364+ CB8D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 365+ CB8E C9                                   ret
 366+ CB8F              ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 366+ CB8F AF          >                xor a
 366+ CB90 95          >                sub l
 366+ CB91 6F          >                ld l,a
 366+ CB92 9F          >                sbc a,a
 366+ CB93 94          >                sub h
 366+ CB94 67          >                ld h,a
 367+ CB95 78                                   ld      a,b
 368+ CB96 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 369+ CB98 B4                                   or      h
 370+ CB99 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 371+ CB9A C9                                   ret
 372+ CB9B
 373+ CB9B              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
 374+ CB9B 7C           SUBHLDESignedv3:        ld      a,h
 375+ CB9C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 376+ CB9E 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 377+ CB9F AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 378+ CBA0                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
 378+ CBA0 FA CE CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDEOppSGN
 379+ CBA3 78           SUBHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
 380+ CBA4 B2                                   or      d
 381+ CBA5                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 381+ CBA5 FA AF CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameNeg
 382+ CBA8 B7                                   or      a
 383+ CBA9 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 384+ CBAB                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 384+ CBAB FA C2 CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 385+ CBAE C9                                   ret
 386+ CBAF 7C           SUBHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 387+ CBB0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 388+ CBB2 67                                   ld      h,a
 389+ CBB3 7A                                   ld      a,d
 390+ CBB4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 391+ CBB6 57                                   ld      d,a
 392+ CBB7 B7                                   or      a
 393+ CBB8 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 394+ CBBA                                      JumpIfNegative SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 394+ CBBA FA C2 CB    >                        jp		m, SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
 395+ CBBD 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 396+ CBBE F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
 397+ CBC0 67                                   ld      h,a
 398+ CBC1 C9                                   ret
 399+ CBC2              SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:      NegHL                                                        ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
 399+ CBC2 AF          >                xor a
 399+ CBC3 95          >                sub l
 399+ CBC4 6F          >                ld l,a
 399+ CBC5 9F          >                sbc a,a
 399+ CBC6 94          >                sub h
 399+ CBC7 67          >                ld h,a
 400+ CBC8 78                                   ld      a,b
 401+ CBC9 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 402+ CBCB B4                                   or      h
 403+ CBCC 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 404+ CBCD C9                                   ret
 405+ CBCE B7           SUBHLDEOppSGN:          or      a                                               ; here HL and DE are opposite so we can add the values
 406+ CBCF 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 407+ CBD0 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 408+ CBD2 67                                   ld      h,a
 409+ CBD3 7A                                   ld      a,d
 410+ CBD4 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 411+ CBD6 57                                   ld      d,a
 412+ CBD7 19                                   add     hl,de
 413+ CBD8 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 414+ CBD9 B4                                   or      h
 415+ CBDA 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 416+ CBDB C9                                   ret

 419+ CBDC              SBCHLDESigned:          JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 419+ CBDC CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 419+ CBDE C2 EF CB    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 420+ CBE1              SBCHLDEhlPos:           JumpOnBitSet h,7,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 420+ CBE1 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 420+ CBE3 C2 EF CB    >                        jp      nz,SBCHLDEhlNeg
 421+ CBE6 ED 52        SBCHLDEhlPosDePos:      sbc     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO

 424+ CBEB 19                                   add     hl,de                           ; ignore overflow for now will sort later TODO

 426+ CBEE C9                                   ret
 427+ CBEF CB BC        SBCHLDEhlNeg:           res     7,h

 435+ CC00 CB FC                                set     7,h

 437+ CC03
 438+ CC03              ; Roate around axis
 439+ CC03              ; varAxis1 and varAxis2 point to the address of the axis to rotate
 440+ CC03              ; so the axis x1 points to roofv  x , y or z
 441+ CC03              ;             x2           nosev or sidev  x, y or z
 442+ CC03              ;   Axis1 = Axis1 * (1 - 1/512)  + Axis2 / 16
 443+ CC03              ;   Axis2 = Axis2 * (1 - 1/512)  - Axis1 / 16
 444+ CC03              ; var RAT2 gives direction
 445+ CC03              ; for pitch x we come in with Axis1 = roofv_x and Axis2 = nosev_x
 446+ CC03              ;-Set up S R -----------------------------------------
 447+ CC03              ; optimised we don't deal with sign here just the value of roof axis / 512
 448+ CC03 2A F6 91     MVS5XRotateXAxis:       ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; work on roofv axis to get (1- 1/152) * roofv axis
 449+ CC06 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 450+ CC07 23                                   inc     hl
 451+ CC08 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 452+ CC09 EB                                   ex      de,hl           ; hl = Axis1 (roofv x for pitch x)
 453+ CC0A 7C                                   ld      a,h
 454+ CC0B E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 455+ CC0D FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; iyh = sign Axis1
 456+ CC0F 7C                                   ld      a,h
 457+ CC10 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = Axis1 (roof hi axis  unsigned)
 458+ CC12 CB 3F                                srl     a               ; a = Axis1/2
 459+ CC14 5F                                   ld      e,a             ;
 460+ CC15 FD 7C                                ld      a,iyh           ; A = Axis 1 sign
 461+ CC17 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = signed Axis1 / 512
 462+ CC18 B7                                   or      a               ; clear carry
 463+ CC19 CD 9B CB                             call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; hl = roof axis - (roof axis /512) which in effect is roof * (1-1/512)
 464+ CC1C              ;-Push to stack roof axis - (roofaxis/152)  ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 465+ CC1C E5                                   push    hl              ; save hl on stack PUSH ID 1 (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 466+ CC1D 7D                                   ld      a,l
 467+ CC1E 32 CD 92                             ld      (varR),a
 468+ CC21 7C                                   ld      a,h
 469+ CC22 32 CE 92                             ld      (varS),a        ;  RS now equals (1- 1/152) * roofv axis or (roof axis - roofv aixs /512)
 470+ CC25              ;-calculate roofv latter half of calc
 471+ CC25 2A F8 91                             ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; now work on nosev axis to get nosev axis / 16
 472+ CC28 5E                                   ld      e,(hl)
 473+ CC29 23                                   inc     hl
 474+ CC2A 56                                   ld      d,(hl)          ; de = value of roof axis
 475+ CC2B 7A                                   ld      a,d
 476+ CC2C E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 477+ CC2E FD 67                                ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 478+ CC30 7A                                   ld      a,d
 479+ CC31 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 480+ CC33 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 481+ CC34                                      ShiftDERight1
 481+ CC34 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 481+ CC36 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 482+ CC38                                      ShiftDERight1
 482+ CC38 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 482+ CC3A CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 483+ CC3C                                      ShiftDERight1
 483+ CC3C CB 3A       >			   srl d
 483+ CC3E CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 484+ CC40                                      ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 484+ CC40 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 484+ CC42 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 485+ CC44 3A E2 92                             ld      a,(varRAT2)     ; need to consider direction, so by defautl we use rat2, but flip via sign bit
 486+ CC47 FD AC                                xor     iyh             ; get the sign back we saveded from DE in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 487+ CC49 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 488+ CC4B B2                                   or      d
 489+ CC4C 57                                   ld      d,a             ; de = nosev /16 signed and ready as if we were doing a + or - based on RAT2
 490+ CC4D              ;;; ld      a,e
 491+ CC4D              ;;;     or      iyh
 492+ CC4D              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 493+ CC4D              ;-now AP = nosev /16  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 494+ CC4D E1                                   pop     hl              ; get back RS POP ID 1
 495+ CC4E                  ;ex     de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 496+ CC4E              ;-now DE = (roofaxis/512) hl - abs(nosevaxis) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 497+ CC4E CD 61 CB                             call    ADDHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 498+ CC51 E5                                   push    hl              ; we use stack to represent var K here now varK = Nosev axis /16 + (1 - 1/512) * roofv axis PUSH ID 2
 499+ CC52              ;-push to stack nosev axis + roofvaxis /512  which is what roofv axis will be ------------------------------------------------
 500+ CC52              ;-- Set up SR = 1 - 1/512 * nosev-----------------------
 501+ CC52 2A F8 91                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again to get nosev - novesv / 512
 502+ CC55 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 503+ CC56 23                               inc     hl
 504+ CC57 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 505+ CC58 EB                               ex      de,hl
 506+ CC59 7C                               ld      a,h
 507+ CC5A E6 80                            and     $80
 508+ CC5C FD 67                            ld      iyh,a
 509+ CC5E 7C                               ld      a,h
 510+ CC5F E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 511+ CC61 CB 3F                            srl     a               ; now A = unsigned 15 bit nosev axis hi / 2 (or in effect nosev / 512
 512+ CC63 5F                               ld      e,a
 513+ CC64 FD 7C                            ld      a,iyh
 514+ CC66 57                               ld      d,a
 515+ CC67 B7                               or      a               ; clear carry
 516+ CC68 CD 9B CB                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3
 517+ CC6B              ;   sbc     hl,de           ; hl = nosev - novesv / 512
 518+ CC6B E5                               push    hl              ; save hl on stack  PUSH ID 3
 519+ CC6C 7D                               ld      a,l
 520+ CC6D 32 71 92                         ld      (varP),a        ; p = low of resuilt
 521+ CC70 7C                               ld      a,h
 522+ CC71 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = roof hi axis  unsigned
 523+ CC73 32 EC 92                         ld      (varT),a        ; t = high of result
 524+ CC76              ;-- Set up TQ
 525+ CC76 2A F6 91                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)   ; now work on roofv axis / 16
 526+ CC79              ;   ld      hl,(varAxis2)   ; work on nosev again
 527+ CC79 5E                               ld      e,(hl)
 528+ CC7A 23                               inc     hl
 529+ CC7B 56                               ld      d,(hl)
 530+ CC7C 7A                               ld      a,d
 531+ CC7D E6 80                            and     $80
 532+ CC7F FD 67                            ld      iyh,a           ; save sign
 533+ CC81 7A                               ld      a,d
 534+ CC82 E6 7F                            and     SignMask8Bit    ; a = nosev hi axis  unsigned
 535+ CC84 57                               ld      d,a             ; de = abs (nosev)
 536+ CC85                                  ShiftDERight1
 536+ CC85 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 536+ CC87 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 537+ CC89                                  ShiftDERight1
 537+ CC89 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 537+ CC8B CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 538+ CC8D                                  ShiftDERight1
 538+ CC8D CB 3A       >			   srl d
 538+ CC8F CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 539+ CC91                                  ShiftDERight1           ; de = nosev /16 unsigned
 539+ CC91 CB 3A       >			   srl d
 539+ CC93 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
 540+ CC95 3A E2 92                         ld      a,(varRAT2)
 541+ CC98 FD AC                            xor     iyh             ; get the sign back in so de = nosev axis / 16 signed
 542+ CC9A E6 80                            and     $80
 543+ CC9C B2                               or      d
 544+ CC9D 57                               ld      d,a
 545+ CC9E              ;;; ld      a,e
 546+ CC9E              ;;;     or      iyh
 547+ CC9E              ;;; ld      (varP),a        ; PA now equals nosev axis / 16 signed
 548+ CC9E E1                               pop     hl              ; get back RS   POP ID 3
 549+ CC9F              ;   ex      de,hl           ; swapping around so hl = AP and de = SR , shoud not matter though as its an add
 550+ CC9F CD 9B CB                         call    SUBHLDESignedv3 ; do add using hl and de
 551+ CCA2              ;-- Update nosev ---------------------------------------
 552+ CCA2 EB                               ex      de,hl           ; save hl to de
 553+ CCA3 2A F8 91                         ld      hl,(varAxis2)
 554+ CCA6 73                               ld      (hl),e
 555+ CCA7 23                               inc     hl
 556+ CCA8 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 557+ CCA9              ;-- Update roofv ---------------------------------------
 558+ CCA9 D1                               pop     de              ; get calc saved on stack POP ID 2
 559+ CCAA 2A F6 91                         ld      hl,(varAxis1)
 560+ CCAD 73                               ld      (hl),e
 561+ CCAE 23                               inc     hl
 562+ CCAF 72                               ld      (hl),d          ; copy result into nosev
 563+ CCB0 C9                               ret
 564+ CCB1
 565+ CCB1                                  include "Universe/InitialiseOrientation.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/InitialiseOrientation.asm
   1++CCB1              InitialiseOrientation:
   2++CCB1              ZI1:
   3++CCB1              ;  nosev = (0,  0, -1)  nosev = (0, 0, &E000)   E000 = SignBit[96]
   4++CCB1              ;  roofv = (0,  1,  0)  roofv = (0, &6000, 0)
   5++CCB1              ;  sidev = (1,  0,  0)  sidev = (&6000, 0, 0)
   6++CCB1 21 00 00         ld      hl, 0
   7++CCB4 22 16 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
   8++CCB7 22 18 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
   9++CCBA 22 1A C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  10++CCBD 22 1E C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvZ),hl                ; set the zeroes
  11++CCC0 22 20 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevX),hl                ; set the zeroes
  12++CCC3 22 22 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevY),hl                ; set the zeroes
  13++CCC6 21 00 60         ld      hl, $6000					; 96 in hi byte
  14++CCC9                  ;ld      hl,1
  15++CCC9 22 14 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatSidevX),hl
  16++CCCC 22 1C C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),hl
  17++CCCF 21 00 E0         ld      hl, $E000					; -96 in hi byte which is +96 with hl bit 7 set
  18++CCD2 22 24 C0         ld      (UBnkrotmatNosevZ),hl
  19++CCD5 C9               ret
  20++CCD6
# file closed: ./Universe/InitialiseOrientation.asm
 566+ CCD6              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 567+ CCD6              OrientateVertex:
 568+ CCD6
 569+ CCD6              ;                      [ sidev_x sidev_y sidev_z ]   [ x ]
 570+ CCD6              ;  projected [x y z] = [ roofv_x roofv_y roofv_z ] . [ y ]
 571+ CCD6              ;                      [ nosev_x nosev_y nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 572+ CCD6              ;
 573+ CCD6
 574+ CCD6              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 575+ CCD6              TransposeVertex:
 576+ CCD6              ;                      [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]
 577+ CCD6              ;  projected [x y z] = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ]
 578+ CCD6              ;                      [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]
 579+ CCD6              VectorToVertex:
 580+ CCD6              ;                     [ sidev_x roofv_x nosev_x ]   [ x ]   [ x ]
 581+ CCD6              ;  vector to vertex = [ sidev_y roofv_y nosev_y ] . [ y ] + [ y ]
 582+ CCD6              ;                     [ sidev_z roofv_z nosev_z ]   [ z ]   [ z ]
 583+ CCD6
 584+ CCD6              Project:
 585+ CCD6 2A 0B C0     PROJ:                   ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                    ; Project K+INWK(x,y)/z to K3,K4 for center to screen
 586+ CCD9 22 71 92                             ld      (varP),hl
 587+ CCDC 3A 0D C0                             ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
 588+ CCDF CD 1B CB                             call    PLS6                            ; returns result in K (0 1) (unsigned) and K (3) = sign note to no longer does 2's C
 589+ CCE2 D8                                   ret     c                               ; carry means don't print
 590+ CCE3 2A E3 92                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 591+ CCE6                                      ; Now the question is as hl is the fractional part, should this be multiplied by 127 to get the actual range
 592+ CCE6 3E 80                                ld      a,ViewCenterX
 593+ CCE8 ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 594+ CCEA 22 ED 92                             ld      (varK3),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 595+ CCED 2A 0E C0     ProjectY:               ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
 596+ CCF0 22 71 92                             ld      (varP),hl
 597+ CCF3 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
 598+ CCF6 CD 1B CB                             call    PLS6
 599+ CCF9 D8                                   ret     c
 600+ CCFA 2A E3 92                             ld      hl,(varK)                       ; hl = k (0 1)
 601+ CCFD 3E 40                                ld      a,ViewCenterY
 602+ CCFF ED 31                                add     hl,a                            ; add unsigned a to the 2's C HL to get pixel position
 603+ CD01 22 F3 92                             ld      (varK4),hl                      ; K3 = X position on screen
 604+ CD04 C9                                   ret
 605+ CD05              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 606+ CD05                                      include "./ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/EraseOldLines-EE51.asm
   1++CD05              ;
   2++CD05              ; EraseOldLines:
   3++CD05              ;	Loop from 0 to UbnKEdgeHeapCounter (note this should be 4 * actual nbr of lines)
   4++CD05              ;		draw line (black) UBnkLinesArray[0,1]+Loop to [2,3]+loop
   5++CD05              ;	 	loop + 4
   6++CD05              ; Return
   7++CD05
   8++CD05              EraseOldLines:
   9++CD05              EE51:										; if bit3 set draw lines in XX19 heap
  10++CD05              	ReturnOnMemBitClear UBnkexplDsp,3       ; bit 3 denotes that there is nothing to erase as its already done
  10++CD05 3A 2A C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnkexplDsp)
  10++CD08 CB 5F       >                        bit 	3,a
  10++CD0A C8          >                        ret		z
  11++CD0B CB DF        	set		3,a
  12++CD0D 32 2A C0     	ld		(UBnkexplDsp),a  				; else toggle bit3 to allow lines (set will do as its 0 by now)
  13++CD10 C3 CE E8     	jp		clearLines						; LL115	clear LINEstr. Draw lines in XX19 heap.  - note its an & not direct
  14++CD13              ; We use the ret from the clearLines so not needed here
  15++CD13

   1++CD13              ;TrimToScreenGrad:
   2++CD13              ;LL118:										; Trim XX15,XX15+2 to screen grad=XX12+2 for CLIP
   3++CD13              ;ret
   4++CD13              ;TODO        ld      hl,(UBnKx1Lo)               ; XX15+0,1 \ x1 hi
   5++CD13              ;TODO        bit     7,a
   6++CD13              ;TODO        jr      nz,LL119		            ; x1 hi+ve skip down
   7++CD13              ;TODO        ld      a,h
   8++CD13              ;TODO        ld      (varS),a                    ; S	 \ else x1 hi -ve
   9++CD13              ;TODO        call    XYeqyx1loSmulMdiv256                       ; LL120	 \ X1<0  their comment \ X.Y = x1_lo.S *  M/2566
  10++CD13              ;TODO        ld      bc,(UbnKy1Lo)               ; step Y1 lo
  11++CD13
  12++CD13              ;18                      CLC
  13++CD13              ;65 36                   ADC &36		\ XX15+2 \ Y1 lo
  14++CD13              ;85 36                   STA &36			 \ XX15+2
  15++CD13              ;98                      TYA 			 \ step Y1 hi
  16++CD13              ;65 37                   ADC &37		\ XX15+3 \ Y1 hi
  17++CD13              ;85 37                   STA &37			 \ XX15+3
  18++CD13              ;A9 00                   LDA #0			 \ xleft min
  19++CD13              ;85 34                   STA &34		\ XX15+0 \ X1 lo
  20++CD13              ;85 35                   STA &35		\ XX15+1 \ X1 = 0
  21++CD13              ;AA                      TAX 			 \ Xreg = 0, will skip to Ytrim
  22++CD13              ;	.LL119	\ x1 hi +ve from LL118
  23++CD13              ;F0 19                   BEQ LL134		 \ if x1 hi = 0 skip to Ytrim

  25++CD13              ;C6 83                   DEC &83		\ S	 \ x1 hi-1
  26++CD13              ;20 19 50                JSR &5019	\ LL120  \ X1>255 their comment \ X.Y = x1lo.S *  M/256
  27++CD13              ;8A                      TXA 			 \ step Y1 lo

  44++CD13              ;20 48 50                JSR &5048	\ LL123	 \ X.Y=R.S*256/M (M=grad.)   \where 256/M is gradient
  45++CD13              ;8A                      TXA 			 \ step X1 lo
