 818+ D241                                      include "./Variables/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm"
# file opened: ././Variables/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
   1++D241              CopyXX12ToScaled:
   2++D241              CopyResultToScaled:
   3++D241                      ldCopyByte  XX12+0,UBnkXScaled      ; xnormal lo
   3++D241 3A 7C C0    >               ld       a,(XX12+0)
   3++D244 32 76 C0    >               ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
   4++D247                      ldCopyByte  XX12+2,UBnkYScaled      ; ynormal lo
   4++D247 3A 7E C0    >               ld       a,(XX12+2)
   4++D24A 32 78 C0    >               ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
   5++D24D                      ldCopyByte  XX12+4,UBnkZScaled      ; znormal lo and leaves a holding zscaled normal
   5++D24D 3A 80 C0    >               ld       a,(XX12+4)
   5++D250 32 7A C0    >               ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
   6++D253 C9                   ret
   7++D254
# file closed: ././Variables/CopyXX12ToScaled.asm
 819+ D254              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 820+ D254                                      include "./Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
   1++D254              ;;; Q = XX12 xLo ,A = XX15 xLo
   2++D254              ;;; T = A * Q/256 Usgined  (FMLTU)
   3++D254              ;;; S = XX12 XSign Xor XX15 XSign
   4++D254              ;;; Q = XX12 Ynormal Lo, A = XX15+2 (y lo)
   5++D254              ;;; Q = A * Q/256 Usigned (FMLTI)
   6++D254              ;;; R = T
   7++D254              ;;; A = XX12+3 (ySign) Xor XX15+3 (ySign)
   8++D254              ;;; T = BADD s(A) = R + Q(SA) (xdot + ydot)
   9++D254              ;;; Q = XX12+4 (znormal lo) A = XX15+4 z lo
  10++D254              ;;; Q = A * Q /256 usigned (zdot)
  11++D254              ;;; R = T
  12++D254              ;;; A - XX15+ 5 Zsign Xor XX12+5 Z Sign
  13++D254
  14++D254
  15++D254
  16++D254
  17++D254
  18++D254              MacroAequDxEdiv256usgn:	MACRO
  19++D254 ~            						mul
  20++D254 ~            						ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
  21++D254              						ENDM
  22++D254              DotProductXX12XX15:
  23++D254 3A 7C C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  24++D257                      IfAIsZeroGoto dotxskipzero
  24++D257 FE 00       >				cp	0
  24++D259 CA 77 D2    >				jp	z,dotxskipzero
  25++D25C 5F                   ld          e,a
  26++D25D 3A 76 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
  27++D260 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  28++D261                      IfAIsZeroGoto dotxskipzero
  28++D261 FE 00       >				cp	0
  28++D263 CA 77 D2    >				jp	z,dotxskipzero
  29++D266 ED 30        		mul
  30++D268 42                   ld          b,d                     ; b = result
  31++D269 3A 7D C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
  32++D26C 21 77 C0             ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
  33++D26F AE                   xor         (hl)
  34++D270 E6 80                and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
  35++D272 FD 67                ld          iyh ,a                   ; we actually need to preserve sign in iyh here
  36++D274 C3 7B D2             jp          dotmuly
  37++D277              dotxskipzero:
  38++D277 AF                   xor         a
  39++D278 47                   ld          b,a
  40++D279 FD 67                ld          iyh,a
  41++D27B              dotmuly:
  42++D27B              ; now we have b = XX12 x &d  norm x signed
  43++D27B 3A 7E C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
  44++D27E                      IfAIsZeroGoto dotyskipzero
  44++D27E FE 00       >				cp	0
  44++D280 CA A0 D2    >				jp	z,dotyskipzero
  45++D283 5F                   ld          e,a
  46++D284 3A 78 C0             ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
  47++D287                      IfAIsZeroGoto dotyskipzero
  47++D287 FE 00       >				cp	0
  47++D289 CA A0 D2    >				jp	z,dotyskipzero
  48++D28C 57                   ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
  49++D28D ED 30                mul
  50++D28F 4A                   ld          c,d                     ; c = result
  51++D290 DD 69                ld          ixl,c
  52++D292 3A 7F C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
  53++D295 21 79 C0             ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
  54++D298 AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
  55++D299 E6 80                and         $80                     ; do b = x mul c = y mul, iyh = sign for b and a = sign for c
  56++D29B DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  57++D29D C3 A4 D2             jp          dotaddxy
  58++D2A0              dotyskipzero:
  59++D2A0 AF                   xor         a
  60++D2A1 4F                   ld          c,a
  61++D2A2 DD 67                ld          ixh,a
  62++D2A4              dotaddxy:
  63++D2A4              ; Optimise later as this is 16 bit
  64++D2A4 26 00                ld          h,0                     ;
  65++D2A6 68                   ld          l,b                     ; hl = xlo + x scaled
  66++D2A7 16 00                ld          d,0                     ;
  67++D2A9 59                   ld          e,c                     ; de = ylo + yscaled
  68++D2AA FD 44                ld          b,iyh                   ; b = sign of xlo + xscaled
  69++D2AC 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of ylo + yscaled
  70++D2AD CD 3E CB             call ADDHLDESignBC                  ; so now hl = result so will push sign to h
  71++D2B0 47                   ld          b,a                     ; b = resultant sign , hl = add so far
  72++D2B1 3A 80 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ;
  73++D2B4                      IfAIsZeroGoto dotzskipzero
  73++D2B4 FE 00       >				cp	0
  73++D2B6 CA DC D2    >				jp	z,dotzskipzero
  74++D2B9 5F                   ld          e,a                     ;
  75++D2BA 3A 7A C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
  76++D2BD                      IfAIsZeroGoto dotzskipzero
  76++D2BD FE 00       >				cp	0
  76++D2BF CA DC D2    >				jp	z,dotzskipzero
  77++D2C2 57                   ld          d,a
  78++D2C3 ED 30                mul
  79++D2C5 E5                   push        hl                      ; save prev result
  80++D2C6 3A 7B C0             ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
  81++D2C9 21 81 C0             ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
  82++D2CC AE                   xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
  83++D2CD E6 80                and         $80                     ; a = sign of multiply
  84++D2CF 4F                   ld          c,a                     ; c = sign of z lo & z scaled
  85++D2D0 E1                   pop         hl
  86++D2D1 5A                   ld          e,d
  87++D2D2 16 00                ld          d,0
  88++D2D4 CD 3E CB             call ADDHLDESignBC
  89++D2D7 32 CE 92             ld          (varS),a
  90++D2DA 7D                   ld          a,l
  91++D2DB C9                   ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
  92++D2DC              dotzskipzero:                               ; if we got here then z was zero so no component so just tidy up from last add
  93++D2DC 78                   ld          a,b
  94++D2DD 32 CE 92             ld          (varS),a
  95++D2E0 7D                   ld          a,l
  96++D2E1 C9                   ret
  97++D2E2              ;;;;       DotProductXX12XX15:
  98++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xLo)         ; Use e as var Q for xnormal lo
  99++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 100++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)         ; use d as XX12 world xform x, e = norm x
 101++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          d,a                     ; de = xx12 x signed
 102++D2E2              ;;;;		; FMLTU	\ A=A*Q/256unsg using D as A and E as Q
 103++D2E2              ;;;;		mul
 104++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          b,d                     ; b as var T
 105++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 106++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 107++D2E2              ;;;;       xor         (hl)
 108++D2E2              ;;;;       and         $80                     ; so sign bit only
 109++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          (varS),a                ; we did use c as S \ S	\ x-sign, but we actually need it in varS for BADD
 110++D2E2              ;;;; now we have b = XX12 x & norm x signed
 111++D2E2              ;;;; by here B = xlo & xscaled C = result sign
 112++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 113++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          e,a
 114++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)         ; XX15+2
 115++D2E2              ;;;;		ld          d,a						; MISSED THIS EARLIER BUG FIX
 116++D2E2              ;;;;       mul
 117++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 118++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q = Y y-dot
 119++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,b                     ; get back T from above held in b
 120++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          (varR),a                ; R= b \ T	\ x-dot
 121++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12ySign)       ; A = ysg
 122++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkYScaledSign     ; a= y sign XOR Y scaled sign
 123++D2E2              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; XX15+3
 124++D2E2              ;;;;       and         $80
 125++D2E2              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 126++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          (varT),a                ; var T	\ xdot+ydot
 127++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)         ; use d as  varQ        ; XX12+4	\ znormal lo to varQ
 128++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          e,a                     ; use e as var Q
 129++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaled)         ;
 130++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          d,a
 131++D2E2              ;;;;       mul
 132++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,d
 133++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          (varQ),a                ; Q	\ zdot
 134++D2E2              ;;;;       ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; copy T to R so R = resutl of previous calc
 135++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          a,(UBnkZScaledSign)
 136++D2E2              ;;;;       ld          hl, UBnkXX12zSign       ; XX15+5
 137++D2E2              ;;;;       xor         (hl)                    ; hi sign
 138++D2E2              ;;;;       and         $80
 139++D2E2              ;;;;       call        baddll38                ; LL38	\ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA)   \ 1byte add (subtract)
 140++D2E2              ;;;;       ret                                 ; returns with A = value, varS = sign
 141++D2E2
# file closed: ././Maths/Utilities/DotProductXX12XX15.asm
 821+ D2E2              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 822+ D2E2              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
 823+ D2E2                                      include "Universe/ScaleNormal.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/ScaleNormal.asm
   1++D2E2              ; scale Normal. IXL is xReg and A is loaded with XX17 holds the scale factor to apply
   2++D2E2              ; returns with XX15 scaled by Q but also z scaled in a register
   3++D2E2              ScaleNormal:
   4++D2E2              LL93:
   5++D2E2 3A D3 92             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; scale--
   6++D2E5 DD 6F        		ld		ixl,a
   7++D2E7 3A 7A C0     		ld		a,(UBnkZScaled)				; needs to be in a just in case we abort early
   8++D2EA DD 2D        		dec		ixl
   9++D2EC F8           		ret		m							; return if q was 0, i.e. no scaling
  10++D2ED              ScaleLoop:
  11++D2ED              LL933:
  12++D2ED 21 76 C0             ld      hl,XX15
  13++D2F0 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15	\ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
  14++D2F2 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 x sign now
  15++D2F3 23                   inc     hl							; looking at XX15 y Lo now
  16++D2F4 CB 3E                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2	\ ynormal lo/2
  17++D2F6 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 y sign now
  18++D2F7 23           		inc		hl							; looking at XX15 z Lo now
  19++D2F8 CB 3E        		srl		(hl)
  20++D2FA 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; znormal lo/2 also into a it came in at the end of LL92
  21++D2FB DD 2D                dec     ixl                         ; reduce scale
  22++D2FD F2 ED D2             jp      p,ScaleLoop                 ; LL93-3 loop to lsr xx15
  23++D300 C9                   ret
  24++D301
# file closed: ./Universe/ScaleNormal.asm
 824+ D301              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 825+ D301                                      include "Universe/ScaleObjectDistance.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/ScaleObjectDistance.asm
   1++D301              ScaleObjectDistance:
   2++D301              ; ">ScaleObjectDistance, scales camera location and returns c = scaling factor (equiv of X reg)"
   3++D301 3A 11 C3             ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; Hull byte #18 normals scaled by 2^Q% DtProd^XX2  their comment   Dot product gives  normals' visibility in XX2
   4++D304 4F                   ld      c,a                         ; c = Q factor for scaling of normals
   5++D305              LL90:                                       ; scaling object distance
   6++D305 3A 71 C0             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; z_hi
   7++D308 47                   ld      b,a                         ; z_hi (yReg)
   8++D309                      ReturnIfAIsZero                     ; if zHi 0 test ifis object close/small, i.e. zhi already zero then we are done
   8++D309 FE 00       >                 cp     0
   8++D30B C8          >                 ret    z
   9++D30C              LL90Loop:
  10++D30C              ; Loop dividing camera by 2 until zhi is 0 and updating scale factor
  11++D30C 0C                   inc     c                           ; LL90+3 \ repeat INWK z brought closer, take Qscale X up
  12++D30D                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0yLo    ; cam Y /= 2
  12++D30D 2A 6D C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
  12++D310 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  12++D312 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  12++D314 22 6D C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),hl
  13++D317                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0xLo    ; cam X /= 2
  13++D317 2A 6A C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
  13++D31A CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  13++D31C CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  13++D31E 22 6A C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl
  14++D321                      ShiftMem16Right1 UBnkDrawCam0zLo    ; cam Z /= 2
  14++D321 2A 70 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
  14++D324 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
  14++D326 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
  14++D328 22 70 C0    >                    ld    (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),hl
  15++D32B 7C                   ld      a,h                         ; last shift will result in zhi adjusted into h reg.
  16++D32C                      IfANotZeroGoto LL90Loop             ; loop until z hi = 0 this gives scalinging in c
  16++D32C FE 00       >				cp	0
  16++D32E C2 0C D3    >				jp	nz,LL90Loop
  17++D331 C9                   ret
  18++D332
# file closed: ./Universe/ScaleObjectDistance.asm

 830+ D332              ; normal vector = cross product of ship ccordinates

 833+ D332                                      include "./Variables/CopyFaceToXX15.asm"
# file opened: ././Variables/CopyFaceToXX15.asm
   1++D332 7E           CopyFaceToXX15:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D333 47                                   ld      b,a                                                    ;;;
   3++D334 E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D336 32 77 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaledSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D339 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D33A CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D33C 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D33D E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D33F 32 79 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  10++D342 78                                   ld      a,b
  11++D343 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
  12++D345 E6 80                                and     $80
  13++D347 32 7B C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaledSign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;
  14++D34A 23                                   inc     hl                          ; move to X ccord
  15++D34B 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;   XX12 x,y,z lo = Normal[loop].x,y,z
  16++D34C 32 76 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a                                                                                                    ;;;
  17++D34F 23                                   inc     hl                                                                                                                 ;;;
  18++D350 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;                                                                                      ;;;

 834+ D35A                                      include "./Variables/CopyFaceToXX12.asm"
# file opened: ././Variables/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
   1++D35A 7E           CopyFaceToXX12:         ld      a,(hl)                      ; get Normal byte 0                                                                    ;;;     if visibility (bits 4 to 0 of byte 0) > XX4
   2++D35B 47                                   ld      b,a                         ; save sign bits to b
   3++D35C E6 80                                and     $80
   4++D35E 32 7D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a           ; write Sign bits to x sign                                                            ;;;
   5++D361 78                                   ld      a,b
   6++D362 CB 27                                sla     a                           ; move y sign to bit 7                                                                 ;;;   copy sign bits to XX12
   7++D364 47                                   ld      b,a
   8++D365 E6 80                                and     $80
   9++D367 32 7F C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a           ;                                                                                      ;;;

  12++D36D E6 80                                and     $80
