# file closed: ././Variables/CopyFaceToXX12.asm
 835+ D382              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 836+ D382              ; Original loginc in EE29 (LL9 4 of 12)
 837+ D382              ; Enters with XX4 = z distnace scaled to 1 .. 31
 838+ D382              ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4
 839+ D382              ; return if no faces
 840+ D382              ; get Face Normal scale factor FaceScale (XX17)
 841+ D382              ; get ship pos z hi     (XX18)
 842+ D382              ; While Z hi <> 0
 843+ D382              ;    FaceScale = FaceScale + 1           (XX17)
 844+ D382              ;    Ship pos y = ship pos y / 2         (XX18)
 845+ D382              ;    ship pos x = ship pos x / 2         (XX18)
 846+ D382              ;    ship pos z = ship pos z / 2         (XX18)
 847+ D382              ; Loop
 848+ D382              ; Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to Scaled         (XX15)
 849+ D382              ; Get Dot Product of Scaled (XX15) and XX16 (pre inverted) into XX12
 850+ D382              ; Copy XX12 into XX18
 851+ D382              ; For each face
 852+ D382              ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 853+ D382              ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 854+ D382              ;        Get Face data into XX12
 855+ D382              ;        if FaceScale (XX17) >= 4
 856+ D382              ;            Copy Ship Pos (XX18) to scaled (XX15)                                                                  ::LL143
 857+ D382              ;        else
 858+ D382              ;           Copy FaceScale scaled to X  (XX17)
 859+ D382              ;LabelOverflowLoop:
 860+ D382              ;           Copy FaceData (XX12) to Scaled (XX15)                                                                   ::LL92
 861+ D382              ;           While X >= 0
 862+ D382              ;              X--                                                                                                  ::LL93
 863+ D382              ;              if  x >= 0
 864+ D382              ;                  XX15x = XX15x / 2
 865+ D382              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 866+ D382              ;                  XX15y = XX15y / 2
 867+ D382              ;           loop
 868+ D382              ;           AddZ = FaceData (XX12)z +  ShipPos (XX18)z                                                              ::LL94
 869+ D382              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 870+ D382              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 871+ D382              ;               X = 1
 872+ D382              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 873+ D382              ;           else
 874+ D382              ;              Scaled (XX15) Z = AddZ
 875+ D382              ;           endif
 876+ D382              ;           AddX = FaceData (XX12)x +  ShipPos (XX18)x
 877+ D382              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 878+ D382              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 879+ D382              ;               X = 1
 880+ D382              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 881+ D382              ;           else
 882+ D382              ;              Scaled (XX15) X = AddX
 883+ D382              ;           endif
 884+ D382              ;           AddY = FaceData (XX12)y +  ShipPos (XX18)y
 885+ D382              ;           if A > 256 (i.e. was overflow)
 886+ D382              ;               ShipPos (XX18)x,y & z = ShipPos(XX18)x,y & z / 2 (Divide each component by 2)
 887+ D382              ;               X = 1
 888+ D382              ;               Goto LabelOverflowLoop
 889+ D382              ;           else
 890+ D382              ;              Scaled (XX15) Y = AddY
 891+ D382              ;           endif
 892+ D382              ;        endif
 893+ D382              ;        calculate dot product XX12.XX15  (XX15x * XX12x /256 + XX15y * XX12y /256 + XX15z * XX12z /256)        ::LL89
 894+ D382              ;        if dot product < 0
 895+ D382              ;           set face visible
 896+ D382              ;        else
 897+ D382              ;           set face invisible
 898+ D382              ;        end if
 899+ D382              ;     else
 900+ D382              ;       Set FaceVisibility to true
 901+ D382              ;     end if
 902+ D382              ; Next Face
 903+ D382
 904+ D382 DD 25        ScaleDownXX15byIXH:     dec     ixh
 905+ D384 F8                                   ret     m
 906+ D385 21 76 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaled
 907+ D388 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 908+ D38A 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 x sign now
 909+ D38B 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y Lo now
 910+ D38C CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX15+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 911+ D38E 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 y sign now
 912+ D38F 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX15 z Lo now
 913+ D390 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 914+ D392 C3 82 D3                             jp      ScaleDownXX15byIXH
 915+ D395 C9                                   ret
 916+ D396
 917+ D396 21 6A C0     DivideXX18By2:          ld      hl,UBnkDrawCam0xLo
 918+ D399 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18  \ xnormal lo/2 \ LL93+3 \ counter X
 919+ D39B 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 x sign now
 920+ D39C 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y Lo now
 921+ D39D CB 3E                                srl     (hl)                        ; XX18+2    \ ynormal lo/2
 922+ D39F 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 y sign now
 923+ D3A0 23                                   inc     hl                          ; looking at XX18 z Lo now
 924+ D3A1 CB 3E                                srl     (hl)
 925+ D3A3 C9                                   ret
 926+ D3A4
 927+ D3A4              ;line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
 928+ D3A4
 929+ D3A4              ;               [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
 930+ D3A4              ;  visibility = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
 931+ D3A4              ;               [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
 932+ D3A4              ;
 933+ D3A4              ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 934+ D3A4              ; line of sight (eye outwards dot face normal vector < 0
 935+ D3A4              ; So lin eof sight = vector from 0,0,0 to ship pos, now we need to consider teh ship's facing
 936+ D3A4              ; now if we add teh veector for teh normal(times magnitude)) to teh ship position we have the true center of the face
 937+ D3A4              ; now we can calcualt teh dot product of this caulated vector and teh normal which if < 0 is goot. this means we use rot mat not inverted rotmat.
 938+ D3A4
 939+ D3A4              RotateXX15ByTransMatXX16:
 940+ D3A4 21 31 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatSidevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 941+ D3A7 CD 17 87                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 942+ D3AA 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 943+ D3AB 7D                                   ld      a,l
 944+ D3AC B0                                   or      b
 945+ D3AD 32 7D C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 946+ D3B0 7D                                   ld      a,l
 947+ D3B1 32 7C C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12xLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 948+ D3B4
 949+ D3B4 21 37 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatRoofvX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 950+ D3B7 CD 17 87                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 951+ D3BA 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 952+ D3BB 7D                                   ld      a,l
 953+ D3BC B0                                   or      b
 954+ D3BD 32 7F C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12ySign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 955+ D3C0 7D                                   ld      a,l
 956+ D3C1 32 7E C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12yLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 957+ D3C4
 958+ D3C4 21 3D C0                             ld      hl,UBnkTransmatNosevX               ; process orientation matrix row 0
 959+ D3C7 CD 17 87                             call    XX12ProcessOneRow
 960+ D3CA 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get
 961+ D3CB 7D                                   ld      a,l
 962+ D3CC B0                                   or      b
 963+ D3CD 32 81 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zSign),a                   ; a = result with sign in bit 7
 964+ D3D0 7D                                   ld      a,l
 965+ D3D1 32 80 C0                             ld      (UBnkXX12zLo),a                     ; that is result done for
 966+ D3D4 C9                                   ret
 967+ D3D5
 968+ D3D5                  include "./ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm"
# file opened: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
   1++D3D5 00           CurrentNormIdx  DB 0
   2++D3D6              ; SomeFacesVisible:
   3++D3D6              ; EE29:
   4++D3D6
   5++D3D6              ;   Backface cull logic  line of sight vector . face normal vector
   6++D3D6              ;       line of sight vector . face normal vector
   7++D3D6              ;       => line of sight vector = [x y z] + face normal vector
   8++D3D6              ;       Where [x y z] =
   9++D3D6              ;                                               [ [x y z] . sidev ]
  10++D3D6              ;                    projected [x y z] vector = [ [x y z] . roofv ]
  11++D3D6              ;                                               [ [x y z] . nosev ]
  12++D3D6              ;
  13++D3D6              ;   so project the [x y z] vector into the face's normal space
  14++D3D6              ;  line of sight vector = projected [x y z] vector + face normal vector
  15++D3D6              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev ]   [ normal_x ]
  16++D3D6              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv ] + [ normal_y ]
  17++D3D6              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev ]   [ normal_z ]
  18++D3D6              ;
  19++D3D6              ;                         [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]
  20++D3D6              ;                       = [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ]
  21++D3D6              ;                         [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]
  22++D3D6              ;
  23++D3D6              ; so
  24++D3D6              ;              visibility = [ [x y z] . sidev + normal_x ]   [ normal_x ]
  25++D3D6              ;                            [ [x y z] . roofv + normal_y ] . [ normal_y ]
  26++D3D6              ;                           [ [x y z] . nosev + normal_z ]   [ normal_z ]
  27++D3D6              ;
  28++D3D6              ; where face is visible if visibility < 0
  29++D3D6              ;
  30++D3D6              ;   so we set XX15 to [x y z] . sidev
  31++D3D6              ;                     [x y z] . roofv
  32++D3D6              ;                     [x y z] . nosev
  33++D3D6              ;
  34++D3D6
  35++D3D6
  36++D3D6
  37++D3D6 3A 71 C0     ScaleDrawcam:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
  38++D3D9                                      IfAIsZeroGoto .ScaleDone            ;
  38++D3D9 FE 00       >				cp	0
  38++D3DB CA 08 D4    >				jp	z,.ScaleDone
  39++D3DE 2A 6A C0                             ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
  40++D3E1 ED 5B 6D C0                          ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
  41++D3E5 ED 4B 70 C0                          ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
  42++D3E9 FD 2C        .ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
  43++D3EB                                      ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
  43++D3EB CB 3C       >			   srl h
  43++D3ED CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  44++D3EF                                      ShiftDERight1                       ;
  44++D3EF CB 3A       >			   srl d
  44++D3F1 CB 1B       >			   rr  e
  45++D3F3                                      ShiftBCRight1                       ;
  45++D3F3 CB 38       >			   srl b
  45++D3F5 CB 19       >			   rr  c
  46++D3F7 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
  47++D3F8                                      IfANotZeroGoto .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
  47++D3F8 FE 00       >				cp	0
  47++D3FA C2 E9 D3    >				jp	nz,.ScaleNormalLoop
  48++D3FD 22 6A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
  49++D400 ED 53 6D C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
  50++D404 ED 43 70 C0                          ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
  51++D408 FD 7D        .ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
  52++D40A 32 D3 92                             ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
  53++D40D C9                                   ret
  54++D40E
  55++D40E              ;;--BackFaceCull:
  56++D40E              ;;--;debug:jp debug
  57++D40E              ;;--; DEBUG  force for now
  58++D40E              ;;--;                        ld     a,MaxVisibility                 ; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
  59++D40E              ;;--;                        ld     (LastNormalVisible),a           ; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  60++D40E              ;;--;
  61++D40E              ;;--; DEBUG
  62++D40E              ;;--                         ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ; get number of faces * 4      FaceCntX4 &  return if no faces
  63++D40E              ;;--                       ; break
  64++D40E              ;;--                        call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
  65++D40E              ;;--                        call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
  66++D40E              ;;--                        call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
  67++D40E              ;;--                        call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
  68++D40E              ;;--
  69++D40E              ;;--.BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; a = ship normal scale factor
  70++D40E              ;;--                        ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
  71++D40E              ;;--; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
  72++D40E              ;;--                        call    ScaleDrawcam
  73++D40E              ;;--                        call    CopyDrawCamToScaled
  74++D40E              ;;--.LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation  ; xx12 = xx15 . XX16
  75++D40E              ;;--                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = xx15.xx16
  76++D40E              ;;--.PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
  77++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (varV),hl
  78++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
  79++D40E              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  80++D40E              ;;--                        srl     a                                                       ;
  81++D40E              ;;--                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
  82++D40E              ;;--                        xor     a
  83++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
  84++D40E              ;;--ProcessNormalsLoop:     push    hl
  85++D40E              ;;--                        push    bc
  86++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
  87++D40E              ;;--                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
  88++D40E              ;;--                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
  89++D40E              ;;--.LL86:                  jp  .LL87 ; force testing of normals
  90++D40E              ;;--                        jp      .FaceVisible
  91++D40E              ;;--; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
  92++D40E              ;;--.LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12
  93++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX17)
  94++D40E              ;;--                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
  95++D40E              ;;--.LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15
  96++D40E              ;;--                        jp      .LL89
  97++D40E              ;;--.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
  98++D40E              ;;--                        srl     a
  99++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (XX18),a
 100++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 101++D40E              ;;--                        srl     a
 102++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 103++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 104++D40E              ;;--                        srl     a
 105++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 106++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 107++D40E              ;;--.LL92:                   ld      b,a
 108++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 109++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 110++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 111++D40E              ;;--.LL93                   dec     b
 112++D40E              ;;--                        jp      m, .LL94
 113++D40E              ;;--.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 114++D40E              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 115++D40E              ;;--                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 116++D40E              ;;--                        dec     b
 117++D40E              ;;--                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 118++D40E              ;;--; Add normal to XX15
 119++D40E              ;;--.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 120++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 121++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 122++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(XX18+8)
 123++D40E              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 124++D40E              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 125++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 126++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 127++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 128++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 129++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 130++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
 131++D40E              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 132++D40E              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 133++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 134++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign
 135++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varR
 136++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS
 137++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
 138++D40E              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 139++D40E              ;;--                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 140++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 141++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign
 142++D40E              ;;--; calculate dot product:
 143++D40E              ;;--.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 144++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 145++D40E              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 146++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (varT),a
 147++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 148++D40E              ;;--                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 149++D40E              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 150++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (varS),a
 151++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 152++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 153++D40E              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 154++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a
 155++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 156++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 157++D40E              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 158++D40E              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 159++D40E              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 160++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (varT),a
 161++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 162++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 163++D40E              ;;--                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 164++D40E              ;;--                        ld      (varQ),a
 165++D40E              ;;--                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 166++D40E              ;;--                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 167++D40E              ;;--                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 168++D40E              ;;--                        xor     (hl)
 169++D40E              ;;--                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 170++D40E              ;;--                        test    $80
 171++D40E              ;;--                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 172++D40E              ;;--.FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 173++D40E              ;;--                        call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 174++D40E              ;;--                        jp          ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 175++D40E              ;;--.FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 176++D40E              ;;--                        call        SetFaceAVisible
 177++D40E              ;;--ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 178++D40E              ;;--                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 179++D40E              ;;--                        pop         bc
 180++D40E              ;;--                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 181++D40E              ;;--                        ld          a,4
 182++D40E              ;;--                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 183++D40E              ;;--                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 184++D40E              ;;--                        dec         b
 185++D40E              ;;--                        jp          nz,ProcessNormalsLoop
 186++D40E              ;;--                        ret
 187++D40E
 188++D40E
 189++D40E
 190++D40E
 191++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    CopyFaceToXX15                                          ;        Get Face data into XX12
 192++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
 193++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
 194++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 195++D40E              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 196++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp      nz, FaceVisible
 197++D40E              ;;;;;.BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ; a = ship normal scale factor
 198++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 199++D40E              ;;;;;.ScaleNormal:           ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zHi)         ; if z hi is 0 then we have scaled XX18
 200++D40E              ;;;;;                        IfAIsZeroGoto .ScaleDone            ;
 201++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      hl,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)        ; pull postition into registers
 202++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      de,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)        ; we only pull in if needed to save fetches
 203++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      bc,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)        ;
 204++D40E              ;;;;;.ScaleNormalLoop:       inc     iyl                         ; Q goes up by one
 205++D40E              ;;;;;                        ShiftHLRight1                       ; divide cam position by 2
 206++D40E              ;;;;;                        ShiftDERight1                       ;
 207++D40E              ;;;;;                        ShiftBCRight1                       ;
 208++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,b                         ; loop if not scaled down
 209++D40E              ;;;;;                        IfANotZeroGoto .ScaleNormalLoop     ;
 210++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),hl        ; save position back to XX18
 211++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),de        ;
 212++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),bc        ;
 213++D40E              ;;;;;; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 214++D40E              ;;;;;.ScaleDone:             ld      a,iyl
 215++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (varXX17),a                  ; XX17 = normal scale factor for current ship adjusted for camera
 216++D40E              ;;;;;    call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
 217++D40E              ;;;;;    call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
 218++D40E              ;;;;;;    call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
 219++D40E              ;;;;;    call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
 220++D40E              ;;;;;
 221++D40E              ;;;;;
 222++D40E              ;;;;;
 223++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; copy DrawCam to Xx15
 224++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation   ; Xx12 = XX15 (face normal) dot rotation matrix
 225++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18              ; now XX18 = dot product
 226++D40E              ;;;;;.ProcessNormals:        ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 227++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (varV),hl
 228++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 229++D40E              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 230++D40E              ;;;;;                        srl     a                                                       ;
 231++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      b,a                                                     ;
 232++D40E              ;;;;;                        xor     a
 233++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 234++D40E              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalsLoop:    push    hl
 235++D40E              ;;;;;                        push    bc
 236++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 237++D40E              ;;;;;                        and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 238++D40E              ;;;;;                        ;JumpIfAGTENusng c,FaceVisible                                   ; commented out for debuggging the skip
 239++D40E              ;;;;;.CheckFaceVisibility:   call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; Get Face data into XX12
 240++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(varXX17)                  ; if scale factor < 4 then skip next bit
 241++D40E              ;;;;;                        JumpIfALTNusng 4,.LL92
 242++D40E              ;;;;;.LargeScaleFactor:      call    CopyXX18toXX15
 243++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp      .LL89
 244++D40E              ;;;;;.Ovflw:                 ld      a,(XX18)
 245++D40E              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 246++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18),a
 247++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+6)
 248++D40E              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 249++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+6),a
 250++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+3)
 251++D40E              ;;;;;                        srl     a
 252++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (XX18+3),a
 253++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,1                        ; set scale to 1 so when we fall through into LL92, we divide the normal vector by 2 as well
 254++D40E              ;;;;;.LL92:                  ld      b,a
 255++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12,   UBnkXScaled
 256++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+2, UBnkYScaled
 257++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  XX12+4, UBnkZScaled
 258++D40E              ;;;;;.LL93                   dec     b
 259++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp      m, .LL94
 260++D40E              ;;;;;.LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled
 261++D40E              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled
 262++D40E              ;;;;;                        ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled
 263++D40E              ;;;;;                        dec     b
 264++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp      p,.LL93Loop
 265++D40E              ;;;;;.LL94:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR
 266++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS
 267++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ
 268++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(XX18+8)
 269++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 270++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 271++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 272++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkZScaledSign
 273++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR
 274++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaledSign, varS
 275++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ
 276++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)
 277++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 278++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 279++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 280++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varS,            UBnkXScaledSign
 281++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varR
 282++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaledSign, varS
 283++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)
 284++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 285++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp      c,.Ovflw
 286++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 287++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign
 288++D40E              ;;;;;.LL89:                  ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ
 289++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 290++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 291++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 292++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 293++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign
 294++D40E              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 295++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (varS),a
 296++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ
 297++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 298++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 299++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 300++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT,varR
 301++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)
 302++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign
 303++D40E              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 304++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ
 305++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (varT),a
 306++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ
 307++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)
 308++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    AequAmulQdiv256
 309++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      (varQ),a
 310++D40E              ;;;;;                        ldCopyByte  varT, varR
 311++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)
 312++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign
 313++D40E              ;;;;;                        xor     (hl)
 314++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    SAEquSRPlusAQ           ; now A = dot product
 315++D40E              ;;;;;                        test    $80
 316++D40E              ;;;;;                        jr      nz,.FaceVisible
 317++D40E              ;;;;;.FaceNotVisible:        ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 318++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 319++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp      .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 320++D40E              ;;;;;.FaceVisible:           ld      a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 321++D40E              ;;;;;                        call    SetFaceAVisible
 322++D40E              ;;;;;.ProcessNormalLoopEnd:   ld      hl, CurrentNormIdx
 323++D40E              ;;;;;                        inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 324++D40E              ;;;;;                        pop         bc
 325++D40E              ;;;;;                        pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 326++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld          a,4
 327++D40E              ;;;;;                        add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 328++D40E              ;;;;;                        ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 329++D40E              ;;;;;                        dec         b
 330++D40E              ;;;;;                        jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 331++D40E              ;;;;;                        ret                                 ; If Y >= XX20 all normals' visibilities set, onto Transpose. return
 332++D40E              ;;;;;
 333++D40E
 334++D40E              CullV2:                 ReturnIfMemisZero FaceCtX4Addr      ;
 334++D40E 3A 0B C3    >                   ld   a,(FaceCtX4Addr)
 334++D411 FE 00       >                   cp     0
 334++D413 C8          >                   ret    z
 335++D414                                     ; break
 336++D414 CD 76 CF                             call    CopyRotmatToTransMat        ; XX16 = UBNKRotMat
 337++D417 CD 2C 85                             call    ScaleXX16Matrix197          ; scale rotation matrix in XX16
 338++D41A CD 58 D1                             call    LoadCraftToCamera           ; XX18 = camera
 339++D41D                                      ;call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Copy the camera to XX15 as signed 15 bit
 340++D41D 3A 11 C3     .BackfaceLoop:          ld      a,(QAddr)                   ;
 341++D420 FD 6F                                ld      iyl,a                       ; iyl = scale factor
 342++D422              ; By this point XX18 = scaled draw cam and iyl = scale factor
 343++D422 CD D6 D3                             call    ScaleDrawcam                ; XX18 = scaled camera XX17 = scale
 344++D425 CD 71 D1                             call    CopyCameraToXX15Signed      ; Xx18 -> xx15 sign + 15 bit
 345++D428 CD 02 88     .LL91:                  call    XX12EquNodeDotXX16          ; xx12 = Scaled Camera . Rotation matrix (Note Xx16 no Xx16 inv)
 346++D42B CD E9 D0                             call    CopyXX12ScaledToXX18        ; now xx18 = XX12 = xx15.xx16
 347++D42E 21 F3 C8     .PrepNormals:           ld      hl,UBnkHullNormals                                                                                                 ;;; V = address of Normal start
 348++D431 22 76 92                             ld      (varV),hl
 349++D434 3A 0B C3                             ld      a,(FaceCtX4Addr)                                        ; For each face
 350++D437 CB 3F                                srl     a                                                       ;
 351++D439 CB 3F                                srl     a                                                       ;
 352++D43B 47                                   ld      b,a                                                     ;
 353++D43C AF                                   xor     a
 354++D43D 32 D5 D3                             ld      (CurrentNormIdx),a                                                   ; used to increment up face incdex as b decrements
 355++D440 E5           .ProcessNormalsLoop:     push    hl
 356++D441 C5                                   push    bc
 357++D442 7E           .LL86:                  ld      a,(hl)                                                  ;     Get Face sign and visibility distance byte
 358++D443 E6 1F                                and     $1F                                                     ;     if normal visibility range  < XX4
 359++D445                                      JumpIfAGTENusng c,.FaceVisible                                  ; commented out for debuggging the skip
 359++D445 B9          >                        cp     c
 359++D446 D2 8B D5    >                        jp		nc,.FaceVisible
 360++D449              ; This bit needs to be added to force face visible
 361++D449 CD 5A D3     .LL87:                  call    CopyFaceToXX12              ; XX12 = normal (repolaced scale version) as a working copy
 362++D44C 3A D3 92                             ld      a,(XX17)                    ; a = q scale XX17 cauclated by the call to ScaleDrawcam
 363++D44F 47                                   ld      b,a
 364++D450                                      JumpIfALTNusng 4,.ScaleNormByXX17   ; if q >= 4 then is so big we don;t factor in + normal for dot product
 364++D450 FE 04       >                        cp      4
 364++D452 DA 8D D4    >                        jp		c,.ScaleNormByXX17
 365++D455 CD 33 D1     .LL143:                 call    CopyXX18toXX15              ; and we just set XX15 = scaled Camera dot rotation matrix
 366++D458 C3 1C D5                             jp      .DoneScalingIntoXX15        ; Now Process XX12 normal
 367++D45B 3A 6A C0     .Ovflw:                 ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)         ; divide camera by 2 if overflow
 368++D45E CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; which is held in XX18
 369++D460 32 6A C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0xLo),a         ; .
 370++D463 3A 70 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)         ; .
 371++D466 CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 372++D468 32 70 C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0zLo),a         ; .
 373++D46B 3A 6D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)         ; .
 374++D46E CB 3F                                srl     a                           ; .
 375++D470 32 6D C0                             ld      (UBnkDrawCam0yLo),a        ; .
 376++D473 06 01        .ScaleXScaledAgain:     ld      b,1                         ; set scale to 1 so we divide original normal by 2 into face and try again and hope we didn't scaled down XX12 earlier so if we did then we must be in the do doo as the object was obscenely large and very close
 377++D475                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled         ; Divide XX15 by 2^B
 377++D475 3A 76 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 377++D478 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 377++D47A 32 76 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 378++D47D                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled         ;
 378++D47D 3A 78 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 378++D480 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 378++D482 32 78 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 379++D485                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled         ;
 379++D485 3A 7A C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 379++D488 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 379++D48A 32 7A C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 380++D48D              ; if we jumped to here scale factor < 4 so we copy in normal to XX15 (scaled) LL92
 381++D48D              .ScaleNormByXX17:       ;ld      b,a
 382++D48D CD 0E D1                             call    CopyXX12toXX15
 383++D490 05           .LL93                   dec     b
 384++D491 FA B0 D4                             jp      m, .ScaledNorm
 385++D494              .LL93Loop:              ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkXScaled        ; Divide XX15 by 2^B, I think this should be really XX12 and is a bug in the original code
 385++D494 3A 76 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)
 385++D497 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 385++D499 32 76 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkXScaled),a
 386++D49C                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkYScaled        ;
 386++D49C 3A 78 C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)
 386++D49F CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 386++D4A1 32 78 C0    >                    ld      (UBnkYScaled),a
 387++D4A4                                      ShiftMem8Right1 UBnkZScaled        ;
 387++D4A4 3A 7A C0    >                    ld      a,(UBnkZScaled)
 387++D4A7 CB 3F       >                    srl     a
 387++D4A9 32 7A C0    >                    ld      (UBnkZScaled),a
 388++D4AC 05                                   dec     b                          ;
 389++D4AD F2 94 D4                             jp      p,.LL93Loop                ; Now we have XX15 as scaled Normal, XX15 as camera, don;t really knwo why as cals work on XX12 and XX18
 390++D4B0              .ScaledNorm:            ;ORIG CODE DOES NOT HAVE THIS call    CopyXX15ToXX12 ; DEBUG as XX15 shoudl be a sacled nromal
 391++D4B0              ; Add normal to XX15
 392++D4B0              ; if we jumped here direct from LL143 then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q, XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = drawcam scaled also
 393++D4B0              ; if we jumped here via scaling       then XX15 = normal scaled by Q,  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX16 = drawcam scaled
 394++D4B0              ; if we hit an overflow               then XX15 = drawcam scaled by Q  XX12 = face normal unscaled, XX18 = (drawcam scaled / 2 ) / 2^ nbr overflows (if we cam in vai scaling then its a mess?
 395++D4B0              ; So LL94 is wrong as it shoud be operating on XX12 not XX15
 396++D4B0              .LL94:                  ldCopyByte UBnkZScaled, varR        ; ldCopyByte  UBnkZScaled,     varR  ; if we jumped direct XX15 = drawcam scaled, Xx12 = normal xx18 = drawcam
 396++D4B0 3A 7A C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkZScaled)
 396++D4B3 32 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),a
 397++D4B6                                      ldCopyByte UBnkXX12zSign, varS      ; ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled,     varS  ; if we did scaling then xx15 = norm scaled XX18 = drawcam
 397++D4B6 3A 81 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkXX12zSign)
 397++D4B9 32 CE 92    >               ld       (varS),a
 398++D4BC                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0zLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam Z signed
 398++D4BC 3A 70 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0zLo)
 398++D4BF 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 399++D4C2 3A 72 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0zSgn)        ; .
 400++D4C5 CD 1E A6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = drawcam Z dot + z
 401++D4C8 DA 5B D4                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 402++D4CB 32 7A C0                             ld      (UBnkZScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 403++D4CE                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkZScaledSign   ;
 403++D4CE 3A CE 92    >               ld       a,(varS)
 403++D4D1 32 7B C0    >               ld       (UBnkZScaledSign),a
 404++D4D4                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXScaled,     varR   ; SR = normal X
 404++D4D4 3A 76 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkXScaled)
 404++D4D7 32 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),a
 405++D4DA                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xSign,   varS   ; .
 405++D4DA 3A 7D C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkXX12xSign)
 405++D4DD 32 CE 92    >               ld       (varS),a
 406++D4E0                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0xLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam x dot
 406++D4E0 3A 6A C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0xLo)
 406++D4E3 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 407++D4E6 3A 6C C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0xSgn)        ; .
 408++D4E9 CD 1E A6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal x + drawcam x dot
 409++D4EC DA 5B D4                             jp      c,.Ovflw
 410++D4EF 32 76 C0                             ld      (UBnkXScaled),a             ; XX15Z = SA
 411++D4F2                                      ldCopyByte  varS, UBnkXScaledSign   ; .
 411++D4F2 3A CE 92    >               ld       a,(varS)
 411++D4F5 32 77 C0    >               ld       (UBnkXScaledSign),a
 412++D4F8                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkYScaled, varR       ; SR = normal Y
 412++D4F8 3A 78 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkYScaled)
 412++D4FB 32 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),a
 413++D4FE                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12ySign, varS     ; .
 413++D4FE 3A 7F C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkXX12ySign)
 413++D501 32 CE 92    >               ld       (varS),a
 414++D504                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkDrawCam0yLo, varQ   ; AQ = drawcam y dot
 414++D504 3A 6D C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkDrawCam0yLo)
 414++D507 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 415++D50A 3A 6F C0                             ld      a,(UBnkDrawCam0ySgn)        ; .
 416++D50D CD 1E A6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = normal y + drawcam y dot
 417++D510 DA 5B D4                             jp      c,.Ovflw                    ; .
 418++D513 32 78 C0                             ld      (UBnkYScaled),a             ; XX15 Y = SA
 419++D516                                      ldCopyByte   varS, UBnkYScaledSign  ; .
 419++D516 3A CE 92    >               ld       a,(varS)
 419++D519 32 79 C0    >               ld       (UBnkYScaledSign),a
 420++D51C              ; calculate dot product LL89
 421++D51C              .DoneScalingIntoXX15:   ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12xLo, varQ       ; Q = norm X XX12
 421++D51C 3A 7C C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkXX12xLo)
 421++D51F 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 422++D522 3A 76 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXScaled)             ; A = XX15 X
 423++D525 CD 8A A5                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 424++D528 32 EC 92                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 425++D52B 3A 7D C0                             ld      a,(UBnkXX12xSign)           ; S = sign of XX15 X * XX12 X
 426++D52E 21 77 C0                             ld      hl,UBnkXScaledSign          ; .
 427++D531 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 428++D532 32 CE 92                             ld      (varS),a                    ; .
 429++D535                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12yLo, varQ       ; Q = norm Y XX12
 429++D535 3A 7E C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkXX12yLo)
 429++D538 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 430++D53B 3A 78 C0                             ld      a,(UBnkYScaled)             ; A = XX15 Y
 431++D53E CD 8A A5                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 432++D541 32 CC 92                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 433++D544                                      ldCopyByte  varT,varR               ; R = XX15 X * XX 12 X
 433++D544 3A EC 92    >               ld       a,(varT)
 433++D547 32 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),a
 434++D54A 3A 7F C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkXX12ySign)         ; A = sign of XX15 Y * XX 12 Y
 435++D54D 21 79 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkYScaledSign         ; .
 436++D550 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 437++D551 CD 1E A6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = SR+AQ = (X calc) + (Y calc)
 438++D554 32 EC 92                             ld      (varT),a                    ; T = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 439++D557                                      ldCopyByte  UBnkXX12zLo, varQ       ; Q = XX12 Z
 439++D557 3A 80 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkXX12zLo)
 439++D55A 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
 440++D55D 3A 7A C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaled)           ; A = XX15 Z
 441++D560 CD 8A A5                             call    AequAmulQdiv256             ; A = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 442++D563 32 CC 92                             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q = XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 443++D566                                      ldCopyByte  varT, varR              ; R = usigned (X calc) + (Y calc)
 443++D566 3A EC 92    >               ld       a,(varT)
 443++D569 32 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),a
 444++D56C 3A 7B C0                             ld      a,  (UBnkZScaledSign)       ; A = sign of XX12 Z * XX15 Z
 445++D56F 21 81 C0                             ld      hl, UBnkXX12zSign           ; .
 446++D572 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; .
 447++D573 CD 1E A6                             call    SAEquSRPlusAQ               ; SA = ((X+Y signed)) (Z signed)
 448++D576 FE 00                                cp      0                           ; was the result 0, if so then there are scenarios where SAEquSRPlusAQ can return -ve 0
 449++D578 28 08                                jr      z,.FaceNotVisible           ; in which case face is not visible
 450++D57A 3A CE 92                             ld      a,(varS)                    ; if the cacl was a negative number then its visible
 451++D57D ED 27 80                             test    $80                         ; this should test S not A
 452++D580 20 09                                jr      nz,.FaceVisible                                      ;        if dot product < 0 set face visible
 453++D582 3A D5 D3     .FaceNotVisible:         ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 454++D585 CD B6 CF                             call        SetFaceAHidden                                      ;           set face invisible
 455++D588 C3 91 D5                             jp          .ProcessNormalLoopEnd                                ;        end if
 456++D58B 3A D5 D3     .FaceVisible:            ld          a,(CurrentNormIdx)
 457++D58E CD AD CF                             call        SetFaceAVisible
 458++D591 21 D5 D3     .ProcessNormalLoopEnd:  ld          hl, CurrentNormIdx
 459++D594 34                                   inc         (hl)                    ; move index pointer up by one
 460++D595 C1                                   pop         bc
 461++D596 E1                                   pop         hl                      ; get normal data pointer back
 462++D597 3E 04                                ld          a,4
 463++D599 ED 31                                add         hl,a                    ; move to next normal entry
 464++D59B 22 76 92                             ld          (varV),hl               ; save as we need it again
 465++D59E 05                                   dec         b
 466++D59F C2 40 D4                             jp          nz,.ProcessNormalsLoop
 467++D5A2 C9                                   ret
 468++D5A3
# file closed: ././ModelRender/BackfaceCull.asm
 969+ D5A3              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 970+ D5A3              ; Process edges
 971+ D5A3              ; .....................................................
 972+ D5A3              TransposeNodeVal:   MACRO arg0?
 973+ D5A3 ~                    ldCopyByte  UBnK\0sgn,Ubnk\1PointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
 974+ D5A3 ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
 975+ D5A3 ~                    xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
 976+ D5A3 ~                    jp          m,NodeNegative\1                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
 977+ D5A3 ~            ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
 978+ D5A3 ~            NodeXPositive\1
 978+ D5A3 ~
 979+ D5A3 ~                    ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
 980+ D5A3 ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC
 981+ D5A3 ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; hl = XX1 UBNKxLo
 982+ D5A3 ~                    ld          h,0                                 ; but we don;t want the sign
 983+ D5A3 ~                    add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
 984+ D5A3 ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1Point),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
 985+ D5A3 ~                    xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
 986+ D5A3 ~                    ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a
 987+ D5A3 ~                    jp          FinishedThisNode\1
 988+ D5A3 ~            ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
 989+ D5A3 ~            NodeNegative\1
 989+ D5A3 ~
 990+ D5A3 ~            LL52\1
 990+ D5A3 ~                                                              ;
 991+ D5A3 ~                    ld          hl,(UBnK\0lo)                       ; Coord
 992+ D5A3 ~                    ld          bc,(UBnkXX12\0Lo)                   ; XX12
 993+ D5A3 ~                    ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
 994+ D5A3 ~                    sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
 995+ D5A3 ~                    jp          p,SetAndMop\1                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
 996+ D5A3 ~            NodeXNegSignChange\1
 996+ D5A3 ~
 997+ D5A3 ~            ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
 998+ D5A3 ~                    call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
 999+ D5A3 ~                    ld          a,(Ubnk\1PointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1000+ D5A3 ~                    xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1001+ D5A3 ~                    ld          (Ubnk\1PointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1002+ D5A3 ~            SetAndMop\1
1002+ D5A3 ~
1003+ D5A3 ~                    ld          (UBnK\0lo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1004+ D5A3 ~            FinishedThisNode\1
1005+ D5A3                                  ENDM
1006+ D5A3
1007+ D5A3              ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1008+ D5A3              CopyByteAtNextHL:   MACRO targetaddr
1009+ D5A3 ~                                inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1010+ D5A3 ~                                ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1011+ D5A3 ~                                ld          (targetaddr),a                     ; XX15+2 = (V),Y
1012+ D5A3                                  ENDM

1015+ D5A3              TransposeXX12NodeToXX15:
1016+ D5A3                      ldCopyByte  UBnKxsgn,UbnkXPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign
1016+ D5A3 3A 0D C0    >               ld       a,(UBnKxsgn)
1016+ D5A6 32 78 C0    >               ld       (UbnkXPointSign),a
1017+ D5A9 ED 4B 7C C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12xLo)                   ; c = lo, b = sign   XX12XLoSign
1018+ D5AD A8                   xor         b                                   ; a = UBnkKxsgn (or XX15+2) here and b = XX12xsign,  XX12+1 \ rotated xnode h                                                                             ;;;           a = a XOR XX12+1                              XCALC
1019+ D5AE FA C4 D5             jp          m,NodeNegativeX                                                                                                                                                            ;;;           if sign is +ve                        ::LL52   XCALC
1020+ D5B1              ; XX15 [0,1] = INWK[0]+ XX12[0] + 256*INWK[1]                                                                                       ;;;          while any of x,y & z hi <> 0
1021+ D5B1              NodeXPositiveX:
1022+ D5B1 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; We picked up XX12+0 above in bc Xlo
1023+ D5B2 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC

1038+ D5CF F2 DD D5             jp          p,SetAndMopX                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1039+ D5D2              NodeXNegSignChangeX:
1040+ D5D2              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1041+ D5D2 CD 17 A3             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1042+ D5D5 3A 78 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                 ; XX15+2

1044+ D5DA 32 78 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2
1045+ D5DD              SetAndMopX:
1046+ D5DD 22 0B C0             ld          (UBnKxlo),hl                       ; XX15+0
1047+ D5E0              FinishedThisNodeX:
1048+ D5E0

1050+ D5E0
1051+ D5E0                      ldCopyByte  UBnKysgn,UbnkYPointSign           ; UBnkXSgn => XX15+2 x sign

1056+ D5EE              NodeXPositiveY:

1058+ D5EF 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; but only want to work on xlo                                                           ;;;              XX15xHiLo = XX12HiLo + xpos lo             XCALC

1061+ D5F6 09                   add         hl,bc                               ; its a 16 bit add
1062+ D5F7 22 79 C0             ld          (UbnkYPoint),hl                    ; And written to XX15 0,1
1063+ D5FA AF                   xor         a                                   ; we want to write 0 as sign bit (not in original code)
1064+ D5FB 32 78 C0             ld          (UbnkXPointSign),a

1066+ D601              ; If we get here then _sign and vertv_ have different signs so do subtract
1067+ D601              NodeNegativeY:

1069+ D601 2A 0E C0             ld          hl,(UBnKylo)                       ; Coord
1070+ D604 ED 4B 7E C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12yLo)                   ; XX12
1071+ D608 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; XX12 lo byte only
1072+ D60A ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = UBnKx - UBnkXX12xLo
1073+ D60C F2 1A D6             jp          p,SetAndMopY                       ; if result is positive skip to write back
1074+ D60F              NodeXNegSignChangeY:
1075+ D60F              ; If we get here the result is 2'c compliment so we reverse it and flip sign
1076+ D60F CD 17 A3             call        negate16hl                          ; Convert back to positive and flip sign
1077+ D612 3A 7B C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                 ; XX15+2
1078+ D615 EE 80                xor         $80                                 ; Flip bit 7
1079+ D617 32 7B C0             ld          (UbnkYPointSign),a                 ; XX15+2

1081+ D61A 22 0E C0             ld          (UBnKylo),hl                       ; XX15+0
