1084+ D61D
1085+ D61D              TransposeZ:
1086+ D61D              LL55:                                                   ; Both y signs arrive here, Onto z                                          ;;;
1087+ D61D 3A 81 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zSign)                   ; XX12+5    \ rotated znode hi                                              ;;;
1088+ D620                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeNodeZ                    ; LL56 -ve Z node                                                           ;;;
1088+ D620 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1088+ D622 C2 36 D6    >                        jp      nz,NegativeNodeZ
1089+ D625 3A 80 C0             ld          a,(UBnkXX12zLo)                     ; XX12+4 \ rotated znode lo                                                 ;;;
1090+ D628 2A 11 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6    \ zorg lo                                                       ;;;
1091+ D62B ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; hl = INWKZ + XX12z                                                        ;;;
1092+ D62D 7D                   ld          a,l
1093+ D62E 32 EC 92             ld          (varT),a                            ;                                                                           ;;;
1094+ D631 7C                   ld          a,h
1095+ D632 32 CB 92             ld          (varU),a                            ; now z = hl or U(hi).T(lo)                                                 ;;;
1096+ D635 C9                   ret                                             ; LL57  \ Node additions done, z = U.T                                      ;;;
1097+ D636              ; Doing additions and scalings for each visible node around here                                                                    ;;;
1098+ D636              NegativeNodeZ:
1099+ D636              LL56:                                                   ; Enter XX12+5 -ve Z node case  from above                                  ;;;
1100+ D636 2A 11 C0             ld          hl,(UBnKzlo)                        ; INWK+6 \ z org lo                                                         ;;;
1101+ D639 ED 4B 80 C0          ld          bc,(UBnkXX12zLo)                    ; XX12+4    \ rotated z node lo                                                 ......................................................
1102+ D63D 06 00                ld          b,0                                 ; upper byte will be garbage
1103+ D63F                      ClearCarryFlag
1103+ D63F B7          >				or a
1104+ D640 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; 6502 used carry flag compliment
1105+ D642 7D                   ld          a,l
1106+ D643 32 EC 92             ld          (varT),a                            ; t = result low
1107+ D646 7C                   ld          a,h
1108+ D647 32 CB 92             ld          (varU),a                            ; u = result high
1109+ D64A E2 57 D6             jp          po,MakeNodeClose                    ; no overflow to parity would be clear
1110+ D64D              LL56Overflow:
1111+ D64D FE 00                cp          0                                   ; is varU 0?
1112+ D64F 20 16                jr          nz,NodeAdditionsDone                ; Enter Node additions done, UT=z
1113+ D651 3A EC 92             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ restore z lo
1114+ D654                      ReturnIfAGTENusng 4                              ; >= 4 ? zlo big enough, Enter Node additions done.
1114+ D654 FE 04       >                   cp    4
1114+ D656 D0          >                   ret	 nc
1115+ D657              MakeNodeClose:
1116+ D657              LL140:                                                  ; else make node close
1117+ D657 AF                   xor         a                                   ; hi This needs tuning to use a 16 bit variable
1118+ D658 32 CB 92             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1119+ D65B 3E 04                ld          a,4                                 ; lo
1120+ D65D 32 EC 92             ld          (varT),a                            ; T
1121+ D660 C9                   ret
1122+ D661              ;--LL49-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1123+ D661              ProcessVisibleNode:
1124+ D661              RotateNode:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1125+ D661 CD B8 D0             call        XX12EquXX15DotProductXX16                                                                                       ;;;           call      XX12=XX15.XX16
1126+ D664              LL52LL53LL54LL55
1127+ D664              TransposeNode:
1128+ D664 CD A3 D5             call        TransposeXX12NodeToXX15
1129+ D667
1130+ D667              ; ......................................................                                                         ;;;
1131+ D667              NodeAdditionsDone:
1132+ D667              Scale16BitTo8Bit:
1133+ D667              LL57:                                                   ; Enter Node additions done, z=T.U set up from LL55
1134+ D667 3A CB 92             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1135+ D66A 21 77 C0             ld          hl,UbnkXPointHi
1136+ D66D B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+1    \ x hi
1137+ D66E 21 7A C0             ld          hl,UbnkYPointHi
1138+ D671 B6                   or          (hl)                                ; XX15+4    \ y hi
1139+ D672              AreXYZHiAllZero:
1140+ D672 28 2B                jr          z,NodeScalingDone                   ; if X, Y, Z = 0  exit loop down once hi U rolled to 0
1141+ D674              DivideXYZBy2:
1142+ D674                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkXPoint                  ; XX15[0,1]
1142+ D674 2A 76 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkXPoint)
1142+ D677 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1142+ D679 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1142+ D67B 22 76 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkXPoint),hl
1143+ D67E                      ShiftMem16Right1    UbnkYPoint                  ; XX15[3,4]
1143+ D67E 2A 79 C0    >                    ld    hl,(UbnkYPoint)
1143+ D681 CB 3C       >                    srl   h
1143+ D683 CB 1D       >                    rr    l
1143+ D685 22 79 C0    >                    ld    (UbnkYPoint),hl
1144+ D688 3A CB 92             ld          a,(varU)                            ; U \ z hi
1145+ D68B 67                   ld          h,a
1146+ D68C 3A EC 92             ld          a,(varT)                            ; T \ z lo
1147+ D68F 6F                   ld          l,a
1148+ D690                      ShiftHLRight1
1148+ D690 CB 3C       >			   srl h
1148+ D692 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
1149+ D694 7C                   ld          a,h
1150+ D695 32 CB 92             ld          (varU),a
1151+ D698 7D                   ld          a,l
1152+ D699 32 EC 92             ld          (varT),a                            ; T \ z lo
1153+ D69C C3 67 D6             jp          Scale16BitTo8Bit                    ; loop U
1154+ D69F              NodeScalingDone:
1155+ D69F              LL60:                                                   ; hi U rolled to 0, exited loop above.
1156+ D69F              ProjectNodeToScreen:
1157+ D69F                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; T =>  Q   \ zdist lo
1157+ D69F 3A EC 92    >               ld       a,(varT)
1157+ D6A2 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
1158+ D6A5 3A 76 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointLo)                    ; XX15  \ rolled x lo
1159+ D6A8 21 CC 92             ld          hl,varQ
1160+ D6AB BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1161+ D6AC                      JumpIfALTusng DoSmallAngle                      ; LL69 if xdist < zdist hop over jmp to small x angle
1161+ D6AC DA B5 D6    >                        jp		c,DoSmallAngle
1162+ D6AF CD 25 A7             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ visit up  R = A/Q = x/z
1163+ D6B2 C3 BD D6             jp          SkipSmallAngle                      ; LL65  \ hop over small xangle
1164+ D6B5              DoSmallAngle:                                           ; small x angle
1165+ D6B5              LL69:
1166+ D6B5              ; TODO check if we need to retain BC as this trashes it
1167+ D6B5              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
1168+ D6B5              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
1169+ D6B5 47                   ld      b,a
1170+ D6B6 CD 70 A1             call    DIV16UNDOC
1171+ D6B9 79                   ld      a,c
1172+ D6BA 32 CD 92             ld      (varR),a
1173+ D6BD               ;;;       call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1174+ D6BD              SkipSmallAngle:
1175+ D6BD              ScaleX:
1176+ D6BD              LL65:                                                   ; both continue for scaling based on z
1177+ D6BD 3A 78 C0             ld          a,(UbnkXPointSign)                  ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1178+ D6C0                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,NegativeXPoint                 ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1178+ D6C0 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1178+ D6C2 C2 D5 D6    >                        jp      nz,NegativeXPoint
1179+ D6C5              ; ......................................................
1180+ D6C5              PositiveXPoint:
1181+ D6C5 3A CD 92             ld          a,(varR)
1182+ D6C8 6F                   ld          l,a
1183+ D6C9 3A CB 92             ld          a,(varU)
1184+ D6CC 67                   ld          h,a
1185+ D6CD 3E 80                ld          a,ScreenCenterX
1186+ D6CF ED 31                add         hl,a
1187+ D6D1 EB                   ex          de,hl
1188+ D6D2 C3 E5 D6             jp          StoreXPoint
1189+ D6D5              NegativeXPoint:
1190+ D6D5              LL62:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1191+ D6D5 3A CD 92             ld          a,(varR)
1192+ D6D8 6F                   ld          l,a
1193+ D6D9 3A CB 92             ld          a,(varU)
1194+ D6DC 67                   ld          h,a
1195+ D6DD 0E 80                ld          c,ScreenCenterX
1196+ D6DF 06 00                ld          b,0
1197+ D6E1                      ClearCarryFlag
1197+ D6E1 B7          >				or a
1198+ D6E2 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1199+ D6E4 EB                   ex          de,hl
1200+ D6E5              StoreXPoint:                                            ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1201+ D6E5 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1202+ D6E8 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1203+ D6EB FD 23                inc         iy
1204+ D6ED FD 23                inc         iy
1205+ D6EF              ; ......................................................
1206+ D6EF              LL66:
1207+ D6EF              ProcessYPoint:
1208+ D6EF AF                   xor         a                                   ; y hi = 0
1209+ D6F0 32 CB 92             ld          (varU),a                            ; U
1210+ D6F3                      ldCopyByte  varT,varQ                           ; Q \ zdist lo
1210+ D6F3 3A EC 92    >               ld       a,(varT)
1210+ D6F6 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
1211+ D6F9 3A 79 C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointLo)                    ; XX15+3 \ rolled y low
1212+ D6FC 21 CC 92             ld          hl,varQ
1213+ D6FF BE                   cp          (hl)                                ; Q
1214+ D700                      JumpIfALTusng SmallYHop                         ; if ydist < zdist hop to small yangle
1214+ D700 DA 09 D7    >                        jp		c,SmallYHop
1215+ D703              SmallYPoint:
1216+ D703 CD 25 A7             call        RequAdivQ                           ; LL61  \ else visit up R = A/Q = y/z
1217+ D706 C3 0C D7             jp          SkipYScale                          ; LL68 hop over small y yangle
1218+ D709              SmallYHop:
1219+ D709              LL67:                                                   ; Arrive from LL66 above if XX15+3 < Q \ small yangle
1220+ D709 CD 02 A7             call        RequAmul256divQ                     ; LL28  \ BFRDIV R=A*256/Q byte for remainder of division
1221+ D70C              SkipYScale:
1222+ D70C              LL68:                                                   ; both carry on, also arrive from LL66, yscaled based on z
1223+ D70C 3A 7B C0             ld          a,(UbnkYPointSign)                  ; XX15+5 \ sign of X dist
1224+ D70F CB 7F                bit         7,a
1225+ D711 C2 24 D7             jp          nz,NegativeYPoint                   ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1226+ D714              PositiveYPoint:
1227+ D714 3A CD 92             ld          a,(varR)
1228+ D717 6F                   ld          l,a
1229+ D718 3A CB 92             ld          a,(varU)
1230+ D71B 67                   ld          h,a
1231+ D71C 3E 60                ld          a,ScreenHeightHalf
1232+ D71E ED 31                add         hl,a
1233+ D720 EB                   ex          de,hl
1234+ D721 C3 34 D7             jp          LL50
1235+ D724              NegativeYPoint:
1236+ D724              LL70:                                                   ; Arrive from LL65 just below, screen for -ve RU onto XX3 heap, index X=CNT ;;;
1237+ D724 3A CD 92             ld          a,(varR)
1238+ D727 6F                   ld          l,a
1239+ D728 3A CB 92             ld          a,(varU)
1240+ D72B 67                   ld          h,a
1241+ D72C 0E 60                ld          c,ScreenHeightHalf
1242+ D72E 06 00                ld          b,0
1243+ D730                      ClearCarryFlag
1243+ D730 B7          >				or a
1244+ D731 ED 42                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = RU-ScreenCenterX
1245+ D733 EB                   ex          de,hl
1246+ D734              LL50:                                                   ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1247+ D734 FD 73 00             ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point
1248+ D737 FD 72 01             ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1249+ D73A FD 23                inc         iy
1250+ D73C FD 23                inc         iy
1251+ D73E C9                   ret
1252+ D73F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1253+ D73F              ;;;     Byte 0 = X magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1254+ D73F              ;;;     Byte 1 = Y magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1255+ D73F              ;;;     Byte 2 = Z magnitide with origin at middle of ship
1256+ D73F              ;;;     Byte 3 = Sign Bits of Vertex 7=X 6=Y 5 = Z 4 - 0 = visibility beyond which vertix is not shown
1257+ D73F              CopyNodeToXX15:
1258+ D73F                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkXScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1258+ D73F 7E          >               ld       a,(hl)
1258+ D740 32 76 C0    >               ld       (UBnkXScaled),a
1259+ D743 23                   inc         hl
1260+ D744                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkYScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1260+ D744 7E          >               ld       a,(hl)
1260+ D745 32 78 C0    >               ld       (UBnkYScaled),a
1261+ D748 23                   inc         hl
1262+ D749                      ldCopyByte  hl, UBnkZScaled                     ; Load into XX15                                                                     Byte 0;;;     XX15 xlo   = byte 0
1262+ D749 7E          >               ld       a,(hl)
1262+ D74A 32 7A C0    >               ld       (UBnkZScaled),a
1263+ D74D 23                   inc         hl
1264+ D74E              PopulateXX15SignBits:
1265+ D74E              ; Simplfied for debugging, needs optimising back to original DEBUG TODO
1266+ D74E 7E                   ld          a,(hl)
1267+ D74F 4F                   ld          c,a                                 ; copy sign and visibility to c
1268+ D750 47                   ld          b,a
1269+ D751 E6 80                and         $80                                 ; keep high 3 bits
1270+ D753 32 77 C0             ld          (UBnkXScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1271+ D756 78                   ld          a,b
1272+ D757 E6 40                and         $40
1273+ D759 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1274+ D75B 32 79 C0             ld          (UBnkYScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1275+ D75E 78                   ld          a,b
1276+ D75F E6 20                and         $20
1277+ D761 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1278+ D763 CB 27                sla         a                                   ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1279+ D765 32 7B C0             ld          (UBnkZScaledSign),a                 ; Copy Sign Bits                                                            ;;;
1280+ D768 79                   ld          a,c                                 ; returns a with visibility sign byte
1281+ D769 E6 1F                and         $1F                                 ; visibility is held in bits 0 to 4                                                              ;;;     A = XX15 Signs AND &1F (to get lower 5 visibility)
1282+ D76B 32 EC 92             ld          (varT),a                            ; and store in varT as its needed later
1283+ D76E C9                   ret
1284+ D76F
1285+ D76F              ;;;     Byte 4 = High 4 bits Face 2 Index Low 4 bits = Face 1 Index
1286+ D76F              ;;;     Byte 5 = High 4 bits Face 4 Index Low 4 bits = Face 3 Index
1287+ D76F              ;..............................................................................................................................
1288+ D76F              ProcessANode:                                           ; Start loop on Nodes for visibility, each node has 4 faces associated with ;;; For each node (point) in model                  ::LL48
1289+ D76F              LL48GetScale:
1290+ D76F 3A 02 92             ld          a,(LastNormalVisible)               ; get Normal visible range into e before we copy node
1291+ D772 5F                   ld          e,a
1292+ D773 CD 3F D7             call        CopyNodeToXX15
1293+ D776              LL48GetVertices:
1294+ D776              LL48GetVertSignAndVisDist:
1295+ D776                      JumpIfALTNusng e,NodeIsNotVisible               ; if XX4 > Visibility distance then vertext too far away , next vertex.                                             ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1295+ D776 BB          >                        cp      e
1295+ D777 DA B8 D7    >                        jp		c,NodeIsNotVisible
1296+ D77A              CheckFace1:                                                                                                                         ;;;     if all FaceVisile[point face any of idx1,2,3 or 4] = 0
1297+ D77A                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;     get point face idx from byte 4 & 5 of normal
1297+ D77A 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1297+ D77B 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1297+ D77C 32 71 92    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; XX15+2 = (V),Y
1298+ D77F 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1299+ D780 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1300+ D782 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1301+ D783                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                    ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 4;;;
1301+ D783 21 A2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1301+ D786 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1301+ D788 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1302+ D789 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1303+ D78A                      IfANotZeroGoto NodeIsVisible                    ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1303+ D78A FE 00       >				cp	0
1303+ D78C C2 BE D7    >				jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1304+ D78F              CheckFace2:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1305+ D78F 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1306+ D790 ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1307+ D792 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1308+ D794                      IfANotZeroGoto NodeIsVisible                    ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1308+ D794 FE 00       >				cp	0
1308+ D796 C2 BE D7    >				jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1309+ D799              CheckFace3:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1310+ D799                      CopyByteAtNextHL varP                           ; vertex byte#4, first 2 faces two 4-bit indices 0:15 into XX2 for 2 of the ;;;
1310+ D799 23          >                    inc         hl                                  ; vertex byte#1
1310+ D79A 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)                              ;
1310+ D79B 32 71 92    >                    ld          (varP),a                     ; XX15+2 = (V),Y
1311+ D79E 57                   ld          d,a                                 ; use d to hold a as a temp                                                 ;;;
1312+ D79F E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; face 1                                                                    ;;;
1313+ D7A1 E5                   push        hl                                  ; we need to save HL                                                        ;;;
1314+ D7A2                      ldHLIdxAToA UbnkFaceVisArray                  ; visibility at face 1                                                Byte 5;;;
1314+ D7A2 21 A2 C0    >                    ld          hl,UbnkFaceVisArray
1314+ D7A5 ED 31       >                    add         hl,a
1314+ D7A7 7E          >                    ld          a,(hl)
1315+ D7A8 E1                   pop         hl                                  ;                                                                           ;;;
1316+ D7A9                      IfANotZeroGoto NodeIsVisible                    ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1316+ D7A9 FE 00       >				cp	0
1316+ D7AB C2 BE D7    >				jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1317+ D7AE              CheckFace4:                                                                                                                         ;;;
1318+ D7AE 7A                   ld          a,d                                                                                                             ;;;
1319+ D7AF ED 23                swapnib                                                                                                                     ;;;
1320+ D7B1 E6 0F                and         $0F                                 ; this is face 2                                                            ;;;
1321+ D7B3                      IfANotZeroGoto NodeIsVisible                    ; is face 1 visible                                                         ;;;
1321+ D7B3 FE 00       >				cp	0
1321+ D7B5 C2 BE D7    >				jp	nz,NodeIsVisible
1322+ D7B8              NodeIsNotVisible:                                                                                                                   ;;;
1323+ D7B8 01 04 00             ld          bc,4
1324+ D7BB FD 09                add         iy,bc                               ; if not visible then move to next element in array anyway                  ;;;
1325+ D7BD                      ;;; Should we be loading FFFFFFFF into 4 bytes or just ignore?
1326+ D7BD C9                   ret                                                                                                      ;;;        goto LL50 (end of loop)
1327+ D7BE              NodeIsVisible:
1328+ D7BE              LL49:
1329+ D7BE CD 61 D6             call        ProcessVisibleNode                  ; Process node to determine if it goes on heap
1330+ D7C1 C9                   ret
1331+ D7C2
1332+ D7C2
1333+ D7C2              ProjectNodeToEye:
1334+ D7C2 ED 4B 7A C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; BC = Z Cordinate. By here it MUST be positive as its clamped to 4 min
1335+ D7C6 79           	ld			a,c                                 ;  so no need for a negative check
1336+ D7C7 32 CC 92     	ld			(varQ),a		                    ; VarQ = z
1337+ D7CA 3A 76 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo which is signed
1338+ D7CD CD 59 A1     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC					; result in BC which is 16 bit TODO Move to 16 bit below not just C reg
1339+ D7D0 3A 77 C0         ld          a,(UBnkXScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1340+ D7D3                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeXPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
1340+ D7D3 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1340+ D7D5 C2 E0 D7    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeXPoint
1341+ D7D8              EyePositiveXPoint:									; x was positive result
1342+ D7D8 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
1343+ D7DA 26 00            ld          h,0
1344+ D7DC 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
1345+ D7DD C3 E7 D7         jp          EyeStoreXPoint
1346+ D7E0              EyeNegativeXPoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
1347+ D7E0 2E 80            ld          l,ScreenCenterX
1348+ D7E2 26 00            ld          h,0
1349+ D7E4                  ClearCarryFlag
1349+ D7E4 B7          >				or a
1350+ D7E5 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
1351+ D7E7              EyeStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1352+ D7E7 EB               ex          de,hl
1353+ D7E8 FD 73 00         ld          (iy+0),e                            ; Update X Point TODO this bit is 16 bit aware just need to fix above bit
1354+ D7EB FD 72 01         ld          (iy+1),d                            ; Update X Point
1355+ D7EE              EyeProcessYPoint:
1356+ D7EE ED 4B 7A C0  	ld			bc,(UBnkZScaled)					; Now process Y co-ordinate
1357+ D7F2 79           	ld			a,c
1358+ D7F3 32 CC 92     	ld			(varQ),a
1359+ D7F6 3A 78 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaled)                     ; XX15	\ rolled x lo
1360+ D7F9 CD 59 A1     	call		DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC	                ; a = Y scaled * 256 / zscaled
1361+ D7FC 3A 79 C0         ld          a,(UBnkYScaledSign)                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
1362+ D7FF                  JumpOnBitSet a,7,EyeNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
1362+ D7FF CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1362+ D801 C2 0C D8    >                        jp      nz,EyeNegativeYPoint
1363+ D804              EyePositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
1364+ D804 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1365+ D806                  ClearCarryFlag
1365+ D806 B7          >				or a
1366+ D807 ED 42            sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
1367+ D809 C3 11 D8         jp          EyeStoreYPoint
1368+ D80C              EyeNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
1369+ D80C 2E 60            ld          l,ScreenCenterY
1370+ D80E 26 00            ld          h,0
1371+ D810 09               add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
1372+ D811              EyeStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
1373+ D811 EB               ex          de,hl
1374+ D812 FD 73 02         ld          (iy+2),e                            ; Update Y Point
1375+ D815 FD 72 03         ld          (iy+3),d                            ; Update Y Point
1376+ D818 C9               ret
1377+ D819
1378+ D819
1379+ D819
1380+ D819              ; Pitch and roll are 2 phases
1381+ D819              ; 1 - we apply our pitch and roll to the ship position
1382+ D819              ;       x -> x + alpha * (y - alpha * x)
1383+ D819              ;       y -> y - alpha * x - beta * z
1384+ D819              ;       z -> z + beta * (y - alpha * x - beta * z)
1385+ D819              ; which can be simplified as:
1386+ D819              ;       1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1387+ D819              ;       2. z = z + beta * K2
1388+ D819              ;       3. y = K2 - beta * z
1389+ D819              ;       4. x = x + alpha * y
1390+ D819              ; 2 - we apply our patch and roll to the ship orientation
1391+ D819              ;      Roll calculations:
1392+ D819              ;
1393+ D819              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1394+ D819              ;        nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1395+ D819              ;      Pitch calculations:
1396+ D819              ;
1397+ D819              ;        nosev_y = nosev_y - beta * nosev_z_hi
1398+ D819              ;        nosev_z = nosev_z + beta * nosev_y_hi
1399+ D819
1400+ D819
1401+ D819              ApplyMyRollToVector:    MACRO vectorX, vectorY
1402+ D819 ~                                    ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1403+ D819 ~                                    ldCopy2Byte vectorY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1404+ D819 ~                                    ldCopyByte  vectorX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1405+ D819 ~                                    ld a,(vectorX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1406+ D819 ~                                    xor $80                             ;
1407+ D819 ~                                    call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1408+ D819 ~                                    ld  (vectorY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1409+ D819 ~                                    ldCopy2Byte vectorX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1410+ D819 ~                                    ld  a,(vectorY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1411+ D819 ~                                    call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1412+ D819 ~                                    ld  (vectorX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1413+ D819                                      ENDM
1414+ D819
1415+ D819              ApplyMyRollToNosevY:    ApplyMyRollToVector UBnkrotmatNosevX, UBnkrotmatNosevY
1415+ D819             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1415+ D819 3A 8A 92    >               ld       a,(ALPHA)
1415+ D81C 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
1415+ D81F             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1415+ D81F 2A 22 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevY)
1415+ D822 22 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),hl
1415+ D825             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatNosevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1415+ D825 3A 20 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
1415+ D828 32 71 92    >               ld       (varP),a
1415+ D82B 3A 21 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1415+ D82E EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1415+ D830 CD 94 9F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1415+ D833 ED 53 22 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1415+ D837             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatNosevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1415+ D837 2A 20 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatNosevX)
1415+ D83A 22 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),hl
1415+ D83D 3A 23 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1415+ D840 CD 94 9F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1415+ D843 ED 53 20 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatNosevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1416+ D847 C9                                   ret
1417+ D848
1418+ D848              ApplyMyRollToSidevY:    ApplyMyRollToVector UBnkrotmatSidevX, UBnkrotmatSidevY
1418+ D848             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1418+ D848 3A 8A 92    >               ld       a,(ALPHA)
1418+ D84B 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
1418+ D84E             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1418+ D84E 2A 16 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevY)
1418+ D851 22 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),hl
1418+ D854             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatSidevX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1418+ D854 3A 14 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
1418+ D857 32 71 92    >               ld       (varP),a
1418+ D85A 3A 15 C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1418+ D85D EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1418+ D85F CD 94 9F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1418+ D862 ED 53 16 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1418+ D866             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatSidevX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1418+ D866 2A 14 C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatSidevX)
1418+ D869 22 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),hl
1418+ D86C 3A 17 C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1418+ D86F CD 94 9F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1418+ D872 ED 53 14 C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatSidevX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1419+ D876 C9                                   ret
1420+ D877
1421+ D877              ApplyMyRollToRoofvY:    ApplyMyRollToVector UBnkrotmatRoofvX, UBnkrotmatRoofvY
1421+ D877             >                        ldCopyByte ALPHA,varQ               ; Set Q = a = alpha (the roll angle to rotate through)
1421+ D877 3A 8A 92    >               ld       a,(ALPHA)
1421+ D87A 32 CC 92    >               ld       (varQ),a
1421+ D87D             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvY, varR           ; RS =  nosev_y
1421+ D87D 2A 1C C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY)
1421+ D880 22 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),hl
1421+ D883             >                        ldCopyByte  UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varP           ; set P to nosevX lo (may be redundant)
1421+ D883 3A 1A C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
1421+ D886 32 71 92    >               ld       (varP),a
1421+ D889 3A 1B C0    >                        ld a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)                    ; Set A = -nosev_x_hi
1421+ D88C EE 80       >                        xor $80                             ;
1421+ D88E CD 94 9F    >                        call  madXAequQmulAaddRS            ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R) = = alpha * -nosev_x_hi + nosev_y
1421+ D891 ED 53 1C C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvY),de                    ; nosev_y = nosev_y - alpha * nosev_x_hi
1421+ D895             >                        ldCopy2Byte UBnkrotmatRoofvX, varR           ; Set (S R) = nosev_x
1421+ D895 2A 1A C0    >               ld       hl,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX)
1421+ D898 22 CD 92    >               ld       (varR),hl
1421+ D89B 3A 1D C0    >                        ld  a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)                   ;  Set A = nosev_y_hi
1421+ D89E CD 94 9F    >                        call madXAequQmulAaddRS             ; Set (A X) = Q * A + (S R)
1421+ D8A1 ED 53 1A C0 >                        ld  (UBnkrotmatRoofvX),de                    ; nosev_x = nosev_x + alpha * nosev_y_hi
1422+ D8A5 C9                                   ret
1423+ D8A6
1424+ D8A6
1425+ D8A6              ; 1> (-a)-(-b)=  if ABS(a)> ABS(B), 1A> (ABS(a)-abs(b))*-1 Else 1B> (ABS(b)-abs(a))
1426+ D8A6              ; 2> (+a)-(+b)=  if ABS(a) > ABS(B),2A>  ABS(a)- abs (B)   else 2B> (ABS(B) - abs(A) * -1
1427+ D8A6              ; 3> (-a)-(+b)=  3A> (ABS(a) + ABS(b)) * -1
1428+ D8A6              ; 4> (+a)-(-b)=  4A> ABS(a) + ABS(b)
1429+ D8A6 47           AHLequUbnkYminusAHL:    ld      b,a                 ; b =sign of subtraction
1430+ D8A7 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = amount to subtract
1431+ D8A8 2A 0E C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)        ; hl = unsigned Y position
1432+ D8AB 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)        ; ahl = signed Y corrodinate
1433+ D8AE 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; we may need the sign later
1434+ D8AF A8                                   xor     b                   ; now we need to see if signs were different or same
1435+ D8B0                                      JumpIfNegative .SignsDifferent  ; if zer fk==
1435+ D8B0 FA D1 D8    >                        jp		m, .SignsDifferent
1436+ D8B3 CD 11 A3     .SignsTheSame:          call    compare16HLDE       ; if signs were the saem tehn
1437+ D8B6 38 0B                                jr      c,.HLLessThanDE     ; if abs(y) < ABS (hl) then do scenario 2B
1438+ D8B8 B7 ED 52     .HLGreaterDE:           sub     hl,de               ; Scenario 1A> & 2A> sub hl from de and leave sign the same
1439+ D8BB 7C                                   ld      a,h
1440+ D8BC B5                                   or      l
1441+ D8BD 28 02                                jr      z,.HLGTDEZero
1442+ D8BF 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; get back ubnkysign as hl > de we use y sign
1443+ D8C0 C9                                   ret
1444+ D8C1 AF           .HLGTDEZero:            xor     a
1445+ D8C2 C9                                   ret                         ; if the result was zero set sign to zero too
1446+ D8C3 EB           .HLLessThanDE:          ex      de,hl               ; if signs were same but DE > ypos then cover secnario 1B and 2B
1447+ D8C4 B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de               ;
1448+ D8C7 7C                                   ld      a,h
1449+ D8C8 B5                                   or      l
1450+ D8C9 28 04                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1451+ D8CB 79                                   ld      a,c
1452+ D8CC EE 80                                xor     $80                 ; flip sign bit to cover 1B> and 2B?
1453+ D8CE C9                                   ret
1454+ D8CF AF           .HLLTDEZero:            xor     a
1455+ D8D0 C9                                   ret
1456+ D8D1 19           .SignsDifferent:        add     hl,de               ; if they are oppos
1457+ D8D2 7C                                   ld      a,h
1458+ D8D3 B5                                   or      l
1459+ D8D4 28 F9                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1460+ D8D6 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; then we always use the sign of y even if hl > de or de < hl
1461+ D8D7 C9                                   ret
1462+ D8D8
1463+ D8D8              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1464+ D8D8 47           AHLequKminusAHL:        ld      b,a                 ; b =sign of subtraction
1465+ D8D9 EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = amount to subtract
1466+ D8DA 2A E4 92                             ld      hl,(varKp1)         ; Ahl = K
1467+ D8DD 3A E6 92                             ld      a,(varKp3)          ;
1468+ D8E0 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; we may need the sign later
1469+ D8E1 A8                                   xor     b                   ; now we need to see if signs were different or same
1470+ D8E2                                      JumpIfNegative .SignsDifferent  ; if zer fk==
1470+ D8E2 FA 03 D9    >                        jp		m, .SignsDifferent
1471+ D8E5 CD 11 A3     .SignsTheSame:          call    compare16HLDE       ; if signs were the saem tehn
1472+ D8E8 38 0B                                jr      c,.HLLessThanDE     ; if abs(y) < ABS (hl) then do scenario 2B
1473+ D8EA B7 ED 52     .HLGreaterDE:           sub     hl,de               ; Scenario 1A> & 2A> sub hl from de and leave sign the same
1474+ D8ED 7C                                   ld      a,h
1475+ D8EE B5                                   or      l
1476+ D8EF 28 02                                jr      z,.HLGTDEZero
1477+ D8F1 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; get back ubnkysign as hl > de we use y sign
1478+ D8F2 C9                                   ret
1479+ D8F3 AF           .HLGTDEZero:            xor     a
1480+ D8F4 C9                                   ret                         ; if the result was zero set sign to zero too
1481+ D8F5 EB           .HLLessThanDE:          ex      de,hl               ; if signs were same but DE > ypos then cover secnario 1B and 2B
1482+ D8F6 B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de               ;
1483+ D8F9 7C                                   ld      a,h
1484+ D8FA B5                                   or      l
1485+ D8FB 28 04                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1486+ D8FD 79                                   ld      a,c
1487+ D8FE EE 80                                xor     $80                 ; flip sign bit to cover 1B> and 2B?
1488+ D900 C9                                   ret
1489+ D901 AF           .HLLTDEZero:            xor     a
1490+ D902 C9                                   ret
1491+ D903 19           .SignsDifferent:        add     hl,de               ; if they are oppos
1492+ D904 7C                                   ld      a,h
1493+ D905 B5                                   or      l
1494+ D906 28 F9                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1495+ D908 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; then we always use the sign of y even if hl > de or de < hl
1496+ D909 C9                                   ret
1497+ D90A              ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1498+ D90A
1499+ D90A 47           AHLequUbnkZplusAHL:     ld      b,a                 ; b =sign of subtraction
1500+ D90B EB                                   ex      de,hl               ; de = amount to subtract
1501+ D90C 2A 11 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)        ; hl = unsigned Y position
1502+ D90F 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)        ; ahl = signed Y corrodinate
1503+ D912 4F                                   ld      c,a                 ; we may need the sign later
1504+ D913 A8                                   xor     b                   ; now we need to see if signs were different or same
1505+ D914                                      JumpIfNegative .SignsDifferent  ; if zer fk==
1505+ D914 FA 22 D9    >                        jp		m, .SignsDifferent
1506+ D917 19           .SignsTheSame:          add     hl,de
1507+ D918 7C                                   ld      a,h
1508+ D919 B5                                   or      l
1509+ D91A 28 02                                jr      z,.HLGTDEZero
1510+ D91C 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; get back ubnkysign as hl > de we use y sign
1511+ D91D C9                                   ret
1512+ D91E AF           .HLGTDEZero:            xor     a
1513+ D91F C9                                   ret                         ; if the result was zero set sign to zero too
1514+ D920 AF           .HLLTDEZero:            xor     a
1515+ D921 C9                                   ret
1516+ D922 CD 11 A3     .SignsDifferent:        call    compare16HLDE       ; if signs were the saem tehn
1517+ D925 38 09                                jr      c,.HLLessThanDE     ; if abs(y) < ABS (hl) then do scenario 2B
1518+ D927 B7 ED 52     .HLGreaterDE:           sub     hl,de               ; Scenario 1A> & 2A> sub hl from de and leave sign the same
1519+ D92A 7C                                   ld      a,h
1520+ D92B B5                                   or      l
1521+ D92C 28 F0                                jr      z,.HLGTDEZero
1522+ D92E 79                                   ld      a,c                 ; get back ubnkysign as hl > de we use y sign
1523+ D92F C9                                   ret
1524+ D930 EB           .HLLessThanDE:          ex      de,hl               ; if signs were same but DE > ypos then cover secnario 1B and 2B
1525+ D931 B7 ED 52                             sub     hl,de               ;
1526+ D934 7C                                   ld      a,h
1527+ D935 B5                                   or      l
1528+ D936 28 E8                                jr      z,.HLLTDEZero
1529+ D938 79                                   ld      a,c
1530+ D939 EE 80                                xor     $80                 ; flip sign bit to cover 1B> and 2B?
1531+ D93B C9                                   ret
1532+ D93C
1533+ D93C
1534+ D93C
1535+ D93C              ; Full version
1536+ D93C              ; 1. K2 = y - alpha * x
1537+ D93C              ; 2. z = z + beta * K2
1538+ D93C              ; 3. y = K2 - beta * z
1539+ D93C              ; 4. x = x + alpha * y
1540+ D93C
1541+ D93C
1542+ D93C                                      MACRO   APPequPosPlusAPP Position, PositionSign
1543+ D93C ~                                    push    bc
1544+ D93C ~                                    ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
1545+ D93C ~                                    ld      a,(PositionSign)
1546+ D93C ~                                    ld      b,a
1547+ D93C ~                                    ld      a,c
1548+ D93C ~                                    xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
1549+ D93C ~                                    jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
1550+ D93C ~            ; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
1551+ D93C ~                                    ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
1552+ D93C ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
1553+ D93C ~                                    add     hl,de
1554+ D93C ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
1555+ D93C ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
1556+ D93C ~                                    pop     bc
1557+ D93C ~                                    ret
1558+ D93C ~            ; Signs are opposite so we subtract
1559+ D93C ~            .MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
1560+ D93C ~                                    ld      hl,(Position)
1561+ D93C ~                                    or      a
1562+ D93C ~                                    sbc     hl,de
1563+ D93C ~                                    jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
1564+ D93C ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
1565+ D93C ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
1566+ D93C ~                                    xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
1567+ D93C ~                                    pop     bc
1568+ D93C ~                                    ret
1569+ D93C ~            .MV51:                  NegHL
1570+ D93C ~                                    ld      (varPp1),hl
1571+ D93C ~                                    ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
1572+ D93C ~                                    pop     bc
1573+ D93C ~                                    ret
1574+ D93C                                      ENDM
1575+ D93C
1576+ D93C
1577+ D93C              APPequXPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKxlo, UBnKxsgn
1577+ D93C C5          >                        push    bc
1577+ D93D 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
1577+ D93E 3A 0D C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKxsgn)
1577+ D941 47          >                        ld      b,a
1577+ D942 79          >                        ld      a,c
1577+ D943 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
1577+ D944 FA 55 D9    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
1577+ D947             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
1577+ D947 ED 5B 72 92 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
1577+ D94B 2A 0B C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
1577+ D94E 19          >                        add     hl,de
1577+ D94F 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
1577+ D952 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
1577+ D953 C1          >                        pop     bc
1577+ D954 C9          >                        ret
1577+ D955             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
1577+ D955 ED 5B 72 92 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
1577+ D959 2A 0B C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)
1577+ D95C B7          >                        or      a
1577+ D95D ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1577+ D95F 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
1577+ D961 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
1577+ D962 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
1577+ D965 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
1577+ D967 C1          >                        pop     bc
1577+ D968 C9          >                        ret
1577+ D969             >.MV51:                  NegHL
1577+ D969 AF          >                xor a
1577+ D96A 95          >                sub l
1577+ D96B 6F          >                ld l,a
1577+ D96C 9F          >                sbc a,a
1577+ D96D 94          >                sub h
1577+ D96E 67          >                ld h,a
1577+ D96F 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
1577+ D972 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
1577+ D973 C1          >                        pop     bc
1577+ D974 C9          >                        ret
1578+ D975
1579+ D975              APPequYPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKylo, UBnKysgn
1579+ D975 C5          >                        push    bc
1579+ D976 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
1579+ D977 3A 10 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
1579+ D97A 47          >                        ld      b,a
1579+ D97B 79          >                        ld      a,c
1579+ D97C A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
1579+ D97D FA 8E D9    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
1579+ D980             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
1579+ D980 ED 5B 72 92 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
1579+ D984 2A 0E C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
1579+ D987 19          >                        add     hl,de
1579+ D988 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
1579+ D98B 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
1579+ D98C C1          >                        pop     bc
1579+ D98D C9          >                        ret
1579+ D98E             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
1579+ D98E ED 5B 72 92 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
1579+ D992 2A 0E C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
1579+ D995 B7          >                        or      a
1579+ D996 ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1579+ D998 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
1579+ D99A 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
1579+ D99B 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
1579+ D99E EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
1579+ D9A0 C1          >                        pop     bc
1579+ D9A1 C9          >                        ret
1579+ D9A2             >.MV51:                  NegHL
1579+ D9A2 AF          >                xor a
1579+ D9A3 95          >                sub l
1579+ D9A4 6F          >                ld l,a
1579+ D9A5 9F          >                sbc a,a
1579+ D9A6 94          >                sub h
1579+ D9A7 67          >                ld h,a
1579+ D9A8 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
1579+ D9AB 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
1579+ D9AC C1          >                        pop     bc
1579+ D9AD C9          >                        ret
1580+ D9AE
1581+ D9AE              APPequZPosPlusAPP:     APPequPosPlusAPP UBnKzlo, UBnKzsgn
1581+ D9AE C5          >                        push    bc
1581+ D9AF 4F          >                        ld      c,a                         ; save original value of a into c
1581+ D9B0 3A 13 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
1581+ D9B3 47          >                        ld      b,a
1581+ D9B4 79          >                        ld      a,c
1581+ D9B5 A8          >                        xor     b                           ; a = a xor x postition sign
1581+ D9B6 FA C7 D9    >                        jp      m,.MV50                     ; if the sign is negative then A and X are both opposite signs
1581+ D9B9             >; Signs are the same to we just add and take which ever sign
1581+ D9B9 ED 5B 72 92 >                        ld      de,(varPp1)                  ; Note we take p+2,p+1 we we did a previous 24 bit mulitple
1581+ D9BD 2A 11 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
1581+ D9C0 19          >                        add     hl,de
1581+ D9C1 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                  ; now we have P1 and p2 with lo hi and
1581+ D9C4 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; and a = original sign as they were both the same
1581+ D9C5 C1          >                        pop     bc
1581+ D9C6 C9          >                        ret
1581+ D9C7             >; Signs are opposite so we subtract
1581+ D9C7 ED 5B 72 92 >.MV50:                  ld      de,(varPp1)
1581+ D9CB 2A 11 C0    >                        ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)
1581+ D9CE B7          >                        or      a
1581+ D9CF ED 52       >                        sbc     hl,de
1581+ D9D1 38 08       >                        jr      c,.MV51                     ; if the result was negative then negate result
1581+ D9D3 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; get back the original sign
1581+ D9D4 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl                 ; and save result to P[2][1]
1581+ D9D7 EE 80       >                        xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign and exit A = flip of a
1581+ D9D9 C1          >                        pop     bc
1581+ D9DA C9          >                        ret
1581+ D9DB             >.MV51:                  NegHL
1581+ D9DB AF          >                xor a
1581+ D9DC 95          >                sub l
1581+ D9DD 6F          >                ld l,a
1581+ D9DE 9F          >                sbc a,a
1581+ D9DF 94          >                sub h
1581+ D9E0 67          >                ld h,a
1581+ D9E1 22 72 92    >                        ld      (varPp1),hl
1581+ D9E4 79          >                        ld      a,c                         ; the original sign will still be good
1581+ D9E5 C1          >                        pop     bc
1581+ D9E6 C9          >                        ret
1582+ D9E7
1583+ D9E7              ; rollWork holds Alpha intermidate results
1584+ D9E7 00 00 00     rollWork      DS 3
1585+ D9EA              rollWorkp1    equ rollWork
1586+ D9EA              rollWorkp2    equ rollWork+1
1587+ D9EA              rollWorkp3    equ rollWork+2
1588+ D9EA
1589+ D9EA
1590+ D9EA              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1591+ D9EA              ; based on MVEIT part 4 of 9
1592+ D9EA 3A 8B 92     ApplyMyRollAndPitch:    ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
1593+ D9ED 21 7E 92                             ld      hl,BET1                     ; and pitch
1594+ D9F0 B6                                   or      (hl)
1595+ D9F1 CA A2 DA                             jp      z,.NoRotation               ; if both zero then don't compute
1596+ D9F4                                      ;break
1597+ D9F4              ; P[210] = x * alph (we use P[2]P[1] later as result/256
1598+ D9F4 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; e = roll magnitude
1599+ D9F5 2A 0B C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKxlo)                ; hl = ship x pos
1600+ D9F8 CD F0 9F                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2-2 AHL = UbnkXlo * Alp1 both unsigned
1601+ D9FB 32 73 92                             ld      (varPhi2),a                 ; set P[2] to high byte to help with ./256
1602+ D9FE 22 71 92                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo * Alph1
1603+ DA01              ; A = Flip sign
1604+ DA01 3A 8D 92                             ld      a,(ALP2FLIP)                ; flip the current roll angle alpha and xor with x sign
1605+ DA04 21 0D C0                             ld      hl,UBnKxsgn                 ; and xor with x pos sign
1606+ DA07 AE                                   xor     (hl)                        ; so now  (A P+2 P+1) = - (x_sign x_hi x_lo) * alpha / 256
1607+ DA08              ; AP[2]P[1] =Y + AP[2]P[1] (i.e. Previous APP/256)
1608+ DA08 CD 75 D9                             call    APPequYPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 calculate APP = y - (x * alpha / 256)
1609+ DA0B              ; K2 = AP[2][1] K2(3 2 1) = (A P+2 P+1) = y - x * alpha / 256
1610+ DA0B 32 E9 D9                             ld      (rollWorkp3),a               ; k2+3 = sign of result
1611+ DA0E 22 E7 D9                             ld      (rollWorkp1),hl             ; k2+1,2 = result
1612+ DA11              ; P[210] = K2[2 1] * Beta  = (A ~P) * X
1613+ DA11 3A 7E 92                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; a = magnitude of pitch
1614+ DA14 5F                                   ld      e,a
1615+ DA15 CD F0 9F                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (P+2 P+1) * BET1 or by now ((UbnkXlo * Alph1)/256 * Bet1)
1616+ DA18 32 73 92                             ld      (varPp2),a                   ; save highest byte in P2
1617+ DA1B 22 71 92                             ld      (varP),hl
1618+ DA1E              ; Fetch sign of previosu cal and xor with BETA inverted
1619+ DA1E 3A E9 D9                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)
1620+ DA21 5F                                   ld      e,a
1621+ DA22 3A 7F 92                             ld      a,(BET2)
1622+ DA25 AB                                   xor     e                           ; so we get the sign of K3 and xor with pitch sign
1623+ DA26              ; Z = P[210] =Z + APP
1624+ DA26 CD AE D9                             call    APPequZPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6
1625+ DA29 32 13 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ; save result back into z
1626+ DA2C 22 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl
1627+ DA2F              ; A[P1]P[0] = z * Beta
1628+ DA2F 3A 7E 92                             ld      a,(BET1)                    ; get pitch back again for mulitply in original it was kept in Q so no fetch needed
1629+ DA32 5F                                   ld      e,a
1630+ DA33 CD F0 9F                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MULTU2 P2 P1 was already in hl (A P+1 P) = (z_hi z_lo) * beta
1631+ DA36 32 73 92                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; P2 = high byte of result
1632+ DA39 22 71 92                             ld      (varP),hl                   ; P (2 1 0) = UbnkXlo & Alph1
1633+ DA3C              ; A xor BET2,Zsign
1634+ DA3C 3A E9 D9                             ld      a,(rollWorkp3)               ; get K3 (sign of y) and store it in y pos
1635+ DA3F 32 10 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a                ; save result back into y
1636+ DA42 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; a = y sign Xor pitch rate sign
1637+ DA43 3A 7F 92                             ld      a,(BET2)                    ;
1638+ DA46 AB                                   xor     e                           ;
1639+ DA47 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; now xor it with z sign too
1640+ DA48 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ;
1641+ DA4B AB                                   xor     e                           ; so now a = sign of y * beta * sign y * sign z
1642+ DA4C F2 5B DA                             jp      p,.MV43                     ; if result is pve beta * z and y have differetn signs
1643+ DA4F 2A 72 92                             ld      hl,(varPp1)
1644+ DA52 ED 5B E7 D9                          ld      de,(rollWorkp1)
1645+ DA56 B7                                   or      a
1646+ DA57 19                                   add     hl,de
1647+ DA58 C3 75 DA                             jp      .MV44
1648+ DA5B 2A E7 D9     .MV43:                  ld      hl,(rollWorkp1)
1649+ DA5E ED 5B 72 92                          ld      de,(varPp1)
1650+ DA62 B7                                   or      a
1651+ DA63 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de                       ; (y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1)
1652+ DA65 30 0E                                jr      nc,.MV44                    ; if there was no over flow carry on
1653+ DA67                                      NegHL
1653+ DA67 AF          >                xor a
1653+ DA68 95          >                sub l
1653+ DA69 6F          >                ld l,a
1653+ DA6A 9F          >                sbc a,a
1653+ DA6B 94          >                sub h
1653+ DA6C 67          >                ld h,a
1654+ DA6D 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)                ; flip sign bit
1655+ DA70 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit
1656+ DA72 32 10 C0                             ld      (UBnKysgn),a
1657+ DA75              ; by here we have (y_sign y_hi y_lo) = K2(2 1) - P(2 1) = K2 - beta * z
1658+ DA75 22 0E C0     .MV44:                  ld      (UBnKylo),hl                ; we do save here to avoid two writes if MV43 ended up with a 2s'c conversion
1659+ DA78 3A 8B 92                             ld      a,(ALP1)                    ; get roll magnitude
1660+ DA7B 5F                                   ld      e,a
1661+ DA7C 2A 0E C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKylo)
1662+ DA7F CD F0 9F                             call    AHLequHLmulE                ; MLTU2-2 AHL = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
1663+ DA82 32 73 92                             ld      (varPp2),a                  ; store high byte P(2 1 0) = (y_hi y_lo) * alpha
1664+ DA85 22 71 92                             ld      (varP),hl
1665+ DA88 3A 8C 92                             ld      a,(ALP2)
1666+ DA8B 5F                                   ld      e,a
1667+ DA8C 3A 10 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKysgn)
1668+ DA8F AB                                   xor     e                           ; a = sign of roll xor y so now we have (A P+2 P+1) = (y_sign y_hi y_lo) * alpha / 256
1669+ DA90 CD 3C D9                             call    APPequXPosPlusAPP           ; MVT6 Set (A P+2 P+1) = (x_sign x_hi x_lo) + (A P+2 P+1) = x + y * alpha / 256
1670+ DA93 32 0D C0                             ld      (UBnKxsgn),a                ; save resutl stright into X pos
1671+ DA96 22 0B C0                             ld      (UBnKxlo),hl
1672+ DA99                                      ;break
1673+ DA99                                      ; if its not a sun then apply to local orientation
1674+ DA99
1675+ DA99 CD 19 D8                             call    ApplyMyRollToNosevY
1676+ DA9C CD 48 D8                             call    ApplyMyRollToSidevY
1677+ DA9F CD 77 D8                             call    ApplyMyRollToRoofvY
1678+ DAA2 3A C8 92     .NoRotation:            ld      a,(DELTA)                   ; get speed
1679+ DAA5 16 00                                ld      d,0
1680+ DAA7 5F                                   ld      e,a                         ; de = speed in low byte
1681+ DAA8 2A 11 C0                             ld      hl,(UBnKzlo)                ; hl = z position
1682+ DAAB 3A 13 C0                             ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                ; b = z sign
1683+ DAAE 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;
1684+ DAAF 0E 80                                ld      c,$80                       ; c = -ve as we are always moving forwards
1685+ DAB1 CD 3E CB                             call    ADDHLDESignBC               ; update speed
1686+ DAB4 22 11 C0                             ld      (UBnKzlo),hl                ; write back to zpos
1687+ DAB7 32 13 C0                             ld      (UBnKzsgn),a                ;
1688+ DABA C9                                   ret
1689+ DABB              ; .....................................................
1690+ DABB              ; Process Nodes does the following:
1691+ DABB              ; for each node:
1692+ DABB              ;     see if node >
1693+ DABB 00           PNXX20DIV6          DB      0
1694+ DABC 00 00        PNVERTEXPTR         DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1695+ DABE 00 00        PNNODEPRT           DW      0   ; DEBUG WILL USE LATER
1696+ DAC0 00           PNLASTNORM          DB      0
1697+ DAC1              ProcessNodes:
1698+ DAC1 AF               xor     a
1699+ DAC2 32 F2 C2         ld      (UbnkLineArrayLen),a
1700+ DAC5 CD 76 CF         call    CopyRotmatToTransMat             ;#01; Load to Rotation Matrix to XX16, 16th bit is sign bit
1701+ DAC8 CD 2C 85         call    ScaleXX16Matrix197               ;#02; Normalise XX16
1702+ DACB CD 58 D1         call    LoadCraftToCamera                ;#04; Load Ship Coords to XX18
1703+ DACE CD 25 D0         call    InverseXX16                      ;#11; Invert rotation matrix
1704+ DAD1 21 17 C3         ld      hl,UBnkHullVerticies
1705+ DAD4 3A 07 C3         ld      a,(VertexCtX6Addr)               ; get Hull byte#8 = number of vertices *6                                   ;;;
1706+ DAD7              GetActualVertexCount:
1707+ DAD7 4F               ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1708+ DAD8 4F               ld      c,a                              ; XX20 also c = number of vertices * 6 (or XX20)
1709+ DAD9 16 06            ld      d,6
1710+ DADB CD 89 A1         call    asm_div8                         ; asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
1711+ DADE 41               ld      b,c                              ; c = number of vertices
1712+ DADF FD 21 C0 C0      ld      iy,UBnkNodeArray
1713+ DAE3              LL48:
1714+ DAE3              PointLoop:
1715+ DAE3 C5           	push	bc                                  ; save counters
1716+ DAE4 E5           	push	hl                                  ; save verticies list pointer
1717+ DAE5 FD E5        	push	iy                                  ; save Screen plot array pointer
1718+ DAE7 78               ld      a,b
1719+ DAE8                  ;break
1720+ DAE8 CD 3F D7         call    CopyNodeToXX15                      ; copy verices at hl to xx15
1721+ DAEB 3A 77 C0     	ld		a,(UBnkXScaledSign)
1722+ DAEE CD D1 87     	call    XX12EquNodeDotOrientation
1723+ DAF1 CD 33 88     	call    TransposeXX12ByShipToXX15
1724+ DAF4 CD AC 85     	call	ScaleNodeTo8Bit					    ; scale to 8 bit values, why don't we hold the magnitude here?x
1725+ DAF7 FD E1        	pop		iy                                  ; get back screen plot array pointer
1726+ DAF9 CD C2 D7     	call    ProjectNodeToEye                     ; set up screen plot list entry
1727+ DAFC                 ; ld      hl,UbnkLineArrayLen
1728+ DAFC                ;  inc     (hl)                                ; another node done
1729+ DAFC              ReadyForNextPoint:
1730+ DAFC FD E5        	push	iy                                  ; copy screen plot pointer to hl
1731+ DAFE E1           	pop		hl
1732+ DAFF 3E 04        	ld		a,4
1733+ DB01 ED 31        	add		hl,a
1734+ DB03 E5           	push	hl                                  ; write it back at iy + 4
1735+ DB04 FD E1        	pop		iy								    ; and put it in iy again
1736+ DB06 E1           	pop		hl                                  ; get hl back as vertex list
1737+ DB07 3E 06        	ld		a,6
1738+ DB09 ED 31        	add 	hl,a                                ; and move to next vertex
1739+ DB0B C1           	pop		bc                                  ; get counter back
1740+ DB0C 10 D5        	djnz	PointLoop
1741+ DB0E              ; ......................................................
1742+ DB0E C9               ret
1743+ DB0F              ;-LL49-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1744+ DB0F              ;  Entering Here we have the following:
1745+ DB0F              ;  XX15(1 0) = vertex x-coordinate but sign not populated
1746+ DB0F              ;  XX15(3 2) = vertex y-coordinate but sign not populated
1747+ DB0F              ;  XX15(5 4) = vertex z-coordinate but sign not populated
1748+ DB0F              ;
1749+ DB0F              ;  XX16(  1 0)sidev_x   (3 2)roofv_x   (5 4)nosev_x
1750+ DB0F              ;  XX16(  7 6)sidev_y   (9 8)roofv_y (11 10)nosev_y
1751+ DB0F              ;  XX16(13 12)sidev_z (15 14)roofv_z (17 16)nosev_z
1752+ DB0F              ;--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1753+ DB0F              AddLaserBeamLine:
1754+ DB0F              ; this code is a bag of shit and needs re-writing
1755+ DB0F              GetGunVertexNode:
1756+ DB0F 3A 05 C3             ld          a,(GunVertexAddr)                   ; Hull byte#6, gun vertex*4 (XX0),Y
1757+ DB12 21 C0 C0             ld          hl,UBnkNodeArray                    ; list of lines to read
1758+ DB15 ED 31                add         hl,a                                ; HL = address of GunVertexOnNodeArray
1759+ DB17 FD 2E 00             ld          iyl,0
1760+ DB1A              MoveX1PointToXX15:
1761+ DB1A 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1762+ DB1B 23                   inc         hl
1763+ DB1C 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = x1 of gun vertex
1764+ DB1D 23                   inc         hl
1765+ DB1E ED 43 76 C0          ld          (UBnkX1),bc
1766+ DB22 0C                   inc         c
1767+ DB23 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1768+ DB24 04                   inc         b
1769+ DB25 C8                   ret         z                                   ; was c 255?
1770+ DB26              MoveY1PointToXX15:
1771+ DB26 4E                   ld          c,(hl)                              ;
1772+ DB27 23                   inc         hl
1773+ DB28 46                   ld          b,(hl)                              ; bc = y1 of gun vertex
1774+ DB29 23                   inc         hl
1775+ DB2A ED 43 78 C0          ld          (UBnkY1),bc
1776+ DB2E              SetX2PointToXX15:
1777+ DB2E 01 00 00             ld          bc,0                                ; set X2 to 0
1778+ DB31 ED 43 7A C0          ld          (UBnkX2),bc
1779+ DB35 3A 11 C0             ld          a,(UBnKzlo)
1780+ DB38 4F                   ld          c,a
1781+ DB39              SetY2PointToXX15:
1782+ DB39 ED 43 7C C0          ld          (UBnkY2),bc                         ; set Y2to 0
1783+ DB3D 3A 0D C0             ld          a,(UBnKxsgn)
1784+ DB40                      JumpOnBitClear a,7,LL74SkipDec
1784+ DB40 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
1784+ DB42 CA 4A DB    >                        jp      z,LL74SkipDec
1785+ DB45              LL74DecX2:
1786+ DB45 3E FF                ld          a,$FF
1787+ DB47 32 7A C0             ld          (UBnkX2Lo),a                        ; rather than dec (hl) just load with 255 as it will always be that at this code point
1788+ DB4A              LL74SkipDec:
1789+ DB4A CD 20 CD             call        ClipLine                            ; LL145 \ clip test on XX15 XX12 vector, returns carry
1790+ DB4D 38 71                jr          c,CalculateNewLines                 ; LL170 clip returned carry set so not visibile if carry set skip the rest (laser not firing)
1791+ DB4F              ; Here we are usign hl to replace VarU as index
1792+ DB4F 2A CF 92             ld          hl,(varU16)
1793+ DB52 3A 76 C0             ld          a,(UBnKx1Lo)
1794+ DB55 77                   ld          (hl),a
1795+ DB56 23                   inc         hl
1796+ DB57 3A 78 C0             ld          a,(UbnKy1Lo)
1797+ DB5A 77                   ld          (hl),a
1798+ DB5B 23                   inc         hl
1799+ DB5C 3A 7A C0             ld          a,(UBnkX2Lo)
1800+ DB5F 77                   ld          (hl),a
1801+ DB60 23                   inc         hl
1802+ DB61 3A 7C C0             ld          a,(UbnKy2Lo)
1803+ DB64 77                   ld          (hl),a
1804+ DB65 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; iyl holds as a counter to iterations
1805+ DB67 23                   inc         hl
1806+ DB68 FD 2C                inc         iyl                                 ; ready for next byte
1807+ DB6A 22 CF 92             ld          (varU16),hl
1808+ DB6D C9                   ret
